story:
Kodiak Leather. Made To Last.

Buffalo Leather Satchel

 

Premium Leather Journal

Add $30 to your current pledge to grab this awesome journal. It’s perfect for documenting your travels or to give as a gift!

  • 110 blank pages
  • 5" x 7"   

 

 

Buffalo Leather Satchel Color Options:

  • Dark Brown (shown in main image and video) 
  • Antique Brown (same leather color as duffel bag)
  • Kailua  
  • Black 
** We will send out a survey at the end of the campaign for you to designate your leather color choice**
 

Buffalo Leather Dopp Kit Color Options:

  • Dark Brown
  • Black
 

4 oz. Tin- Kodiak Leather Cream just added!

 

 

The Story

Kodiak Leather was founded in December 2014. With the idea of providing the ultimate bag for travelers, businessmen and missionaries alike, we set out to offer a unique and quality leather bag that would last our customers a lifetime.

Our goal is to provide QUALITY products to EXCEPTIONAL individuals like you.

We produce UNIQUE custom leather bags including duffel bags, satchels, messengers, dopp bags and other leather accessories. 

 

 

                 

    

 

 

 

The Project

Over the past couple of years, we have found that there is a definite need for the perfect leather bag. We have spent over two years figuring out what that bag would look like, and we are finally ready to produce it.

We have also realized that in order to meet the needs of our customers, we need to expand our product line and design and produce the products that have been asked for and suggested to us.

In response, we have created a new line of leather products that will meet those needs and suggestions! Sourced from 100% genuine buffalo leather.

Why Buffalo Leather?

  • Buffalo leather is superior to cow leather in several manners. According to Rocky Mountain Tanners, buffalo leather is more resistant to damage from ripping, stretching and excessive heat. It's also more breathable than cow leather, making it better for a wider range of temperatures. 
 
  • Buffalo leather is frequently used in military gear. Furniture and clothing benefit from buffalo leather's durability and ease of maintenance. Buffalo leather also has a distinctive texture that makes it sought-after for all sorts of aesthetic purposes. It possesses a "pebbly" appearance that works well for coats or briefcase covers. Buffalo leather can even be maintained with conditioners meant for cow leather; it requires no special care compared to other kinds of leather.
 
  • In it's natural state, the buffalo hide is thicker than the cowhide.

With your support and pledging towards our Kodiak Leather products, you will be making a HUGE difference in the Kodiak Leather manufacturing process, and will help us make these leather items available to everyone.

The new product line includes:

  • Buffalo Leather Satchel
  • Buffalo Leather Wallet
  • Buffalo Leather Dopp Bag

Buffalo Leather Satchel

 Great Bag, Great Features.  

  • Briefcase handle for easy carry 
  • Thick, durable buffalo leather 
  • Adjustable shoulder strap
  • Buckle straps with snap closures for quick and easy access 
  • Magnetic closure on front pocket 
  • 3 internal compartments + 2 Interior zippered pockets (1 on each sidewall) 
  • 1 exterior zippered pocket 
  • Interior strap to keep laptop secure 
  • Total of 7 pockets (2 outer, 5 inner)
  • 15" length big enough to carry almost any laptop
  • 4" width allows plenty of room inside bag for documents, cords, phone, laptop, books and other items
  • Size is 15" x 12" x 4"

 

 

 

 

 Buffalo Leather Duffel

 The perfect weekend bag, carry-on size.

  • Heavy duty handle for easy carry 
  • Exterior zipper goes down the sides of duffel, for larger opening to main compartment
  • Thick, durable buffalo leather (Veg. tan)
  • Adjustable & removable heavy duty shoulder strap 
  • 2 exterior pockets for quick and easy access (perfect size for passport, airline tickets or travel documents)
  • 1 Interior zippered pocket
  • Interior phone holder, 3 credit card pockets and 2 pen holders
  • Large interior compartment with nylon liner
  • DIMENSIONS: 20"L X 11" H X 10"D
 

Buffalo Leather Wallet

 Features:

  • 9 slots total for cards, including see through slot for ID (Left side)
  • Left and right inside pockets for multiple cards
  • 2 separate cash pockets (full width of wallet)
  • Genuine Buffalo Leather
  • 4.25" x 3.25" size
  • 4 color options - We've had a lot of interest in a black wallet and we are adding that to our color options!

 

 

These wallets are functional and slim, as long as you don't overload them!

Buffalo Leather Dopp Bag

 Features:  

  • 10.5" Length x 5" Width x 6" Height 
  • Interior zippered pocket is great for separation of smaller items 
  • 2 separate zippered interior compartments 
  • Genuine Buffalo Leather 
  • Interior Liner Ideal for shave kits or other toiletry items

 

 

Why Support Us?

  • In order to make these products come to life, we need to raise $5,000 to complete our first run of production.  If you pledge to this campaign you will be the FIRST to receive these products and you will be getting them for a MUCH lower price than they will cost once they are available to the public!  We understand that making a pledge is a big commitment and we WANT to reward you accordingly!!
  • Purchase a product that is GUARANTEED for LIFE.  All of our products come with a lifetime guarantee.
  • Leather looks better with age. Someday your Kodiak Leather product will tell a story of it's own.

The Rewards

  • Select the pledge that matches the item you want to pre-order.
  • If our goal is reached, you will be charged at the end of the campaign, and we will ship your reward as soon as it is made!
  • If our goal is not reached, your card will NOT be charged, and you will not receive the product.

Reward #1: Pledge $5 or more

Sincere THANK YOU and a shout out on our Instagram page!

 

 

Reward #2: Pledge $25 or more

Limited Edition Leather Wallet

 Reward #3: Special Orders

Want one of each of our awesome products? Maybe you want a satchel and a wallet, or satchel and a duffel bag? Whatever you choose, just add up the cost for each item and enter that amount into this box + shipping and we will get you each item you choose. *We will send out a survey once the project ends that will allow us to gather your product and leather color choices*

 

Reward #4: Pledge $50 or more

Limited Edition Kodiak Leather Dopp Bag

 

 

Reward #5: Pledge $159 or more - EARLY BIRD - First 25

Buffalo Leather Satchel: Dark Brown, Antique Brown, Kailua or Black

 

Reward #6: Pledge $169 or more - Early Bird LIMITED

Buffalo Leather Satchel: Dark Brown, Antique Brown, Kailua or Black

Reward #7: Pledge $179 or more

Buffalo Leather Satchel: Dark Brown, Antique Brown, Kailua or Black

 

 Reward #8: Double Up: Pledge $330 or more

Your choice of 2 Buffalo Leather Satchels, any color combination.

Reward #9: Pledge $475 or more

VIP Leather Collector's Package

You Get: 

  • 1 Buffalo Leather Satchel 
  • 1 Buffalo Wallet 
  • 1 Dopp Bag 
  • 1 Buffalo Leather Duffel 
  • 1 Kodiak Leather Cream 
  • ($668 regular price). You choose the color on satchel and wallet (Duffel and Dopp Bag are dark brown). $40 US Shipping. (International shipping is $100)

Reviews

"LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! I just received the Kodiak Leather Satchel, and i am blown away at the quality and detail work that was put into it. The leather is beautiful! The pictures posted really don't do it justice. I definitely recommend this product and will be ordering from this company again! They were so helpful and quick to respond to my messages." 

Ann T. -Etsy

"Absolutely beautiful bag. This will be a bag my husband can use forever! Beautiful crafted and he loves it!!!"

-Michelle R.  -Etsy

"My boyfriend absolutely loved his leather toiletry bag! Beautifully crafted and has that great leather smell. After purchasing, I'm surprising him with the duffel for his birthday." 

Christine M. -Etsy

"I ordered two bags and they both arrived looking amazing. The leather, the stitching and the lining are all high quality. The seller was also very helpful in customizing the tags. Made a great gift!"

Trenton M. -Etsy

Lifetime Warranty

Every Kodiak Leather piece is built for a lifetime of use. In fact, we believe in our craftsmen, our materials and our designs so strongly that we warranty them against defects in materials and workmanship. If there ever is a problem with one of our products just send it back and we will repair or replace it for free!

 

Thank you and feel free to contact us with any questions or comments!!

To see all of our custom leather products go to:

kodiakleather.com  or

https://www.etsy.com/shop/KodiakLeatherCo

story:
Hi we are SUFFER FOR YOUR ART CLOTHING.

Update:

We will be extending our campaign a further 20 days and are offering a new bonus perk please check it out.  

Please please contribute and support a small business. We have much more to give and wish SFYAC to see a successful future, so please don't read and scroll across to the next campaign. 

No matter how small a contribution, it's huge for us. 

These two are showing their support for Suffer For Your Art Clothing and you can do the same by sharing this page when you have visited. Thanks to all our contributors let's keep it going! 

 
We are a family run company that make clothing inspired by tattoos and the art of tattooing and a unique feature of our products is they are designed by extremely talented tattoo artists.
The company is run by two of us: David and Shu. We are married and have three beautiful daughters. I (David) am responsible for a lot of our web presence and designs you see. Shu is very creative and comes up with many of the concepts for our artwork which is then realized by tattoo artists from all over the world. We are both avid tattoo collectors and proudly own artwork from some of the greatest artists around and we felt the art that is produced by these tattooists is so good it belongs on clothing that people who dont want to commit to a permanent tattoo can own.

(A preview of one of our many new designs)


We are asking for £5,000

This figure will go towards several great new projects. 

1: Provide the opportunity for unknown artists to work alongside us and have their designs produced and released as part of our brand.

2: Production of several new designs already in the pipeline by established tattoo artists. 

3: Expansion of our already 'modest' advertising budget and conventions set up.

4. Production of SFYAC's first line in womens only fashion apparel.

Perks.

Our perks are unique in that we are the only company that offer them. They are our own products exclusive to us.

These perks include a gift bundle of SFYAC goodies, such as stickers, beanies, T-shirts and more. Exclusive perk T-Shirts and even a ticket to the world famous London Tattoo Convention these will be fulfilled once the final day of the campaign has passed and we will keep contributers notified on dates and statuses of perks throughout the campaign.

If our goal is not fully met the money that is raised will be used to fund the main objective of our campaign which is the investment in a new artists design.


(Some of our merchandise available as perks)

The Impact

Our project is valuable to the broader artistic community within  the realm of tattoos because we are a business that has relied upon our initiative and worked extremely hard to make a name for ourselves. We understand how hard it can be to achieve your goals without support and somebody believing in you.  

We started with a single T-shirt design at conventions surrounded by established businesses and learned quickly that we would never be taken seriously until we had worked hard and to do that, we invested some of our own personal savings to pursue this. This was not a decision we took lightly as we are a family with regular jobs outside of SFYAC. We also used the motivation from the embarrassment and disappointment of this first experience to seek out great artists and gain their support and input into our next steps. We are now in possession of several unique designs by extremely talented artists that we will be bringing to the public soon. We now are a feature at a lot of conventions where we have made some great connections with people within the tattoo community. 

(David and Shu at their 2nd London Tattoo Convention)

Risks & Challenges

One of the biggest challenges we face in what we are proposing is people not seeing us as worthwhile, valuable and a genuine business. 

We created SFYAC over 3 years ago and have been struggling to be taken seriously by peers and public alike. 

A common obstacle we have encountered is the financial restraints of being full time working parents and trying to release clothing featuring the designs of our artists. We also have other products which we would like to invest in, not just t-shirts and not just for men. We envisage a tattoo inspired clothing range tailored for women too, this would include dresses, vests and jackets, however to get a range of clothing out, we need contributions which will in essence give us the resources to kick start our business and then we too can start contributing back into the tattoo community.


Other Ways You Can Help

We are a normal married couple with children and obligations outside of SFYAC so we can fully understand if you cannot commit to a financial contribution, however it would go a very long way if you could; 
1). 'Like' our Facebook page and invite others to like us too!
2). Follow us on Instagram and Twitter...just for abit of variety:) 
3). Talk about us to everyone and anyone! Help us get the word out and tell your mum, dad, brothers, sisters,  grandmas,  grandads, cousins, nieces, nephews, BFF's, dogs, cats and budgies about SFYAC. A new tattoo inspired clothing line created by two happy go lucky people.

Thank you.x

story:
Please visit our new website for future orders here...www.footflops.com.  Thank you from the Foot Flops Team! 


Introducing Foot Flops™ 

Foot Flops™ are the first high-quality, heat-molded, orthotic and arch-supporting flip flops on the market. Foot Flops will provide users with instant comfort without the painful break-in time that comes with regular flip flops.


In The Press

We were inspired to create Foot Flops after experiencing all of the advancements made in insole technology. As avid skiers and snowboarders, we saw how comfortable heat-molded inserts are and instantly realized all the benefits they provided for our feet and overall body. We wanted this comfort to be available to you, and not just when you’re on the slopes. This is why we decided to create Foot Flops.

1. No break-in time = super comfortable straight out of the oven.

2.  Superior arch support = less back pain and foot lengthening over time.

3. Higher-end design and fashionable = you look super cool!

Foot Flops are Perfect for Every Place & Activity:

75% of Americans will experience foot problems at one time or another in their lives. Traditional flip flops do not address these issues in any way. Foot Flops are the solution to traditional flip flops!

How to Make Your Very Own Foot Flops: ( See Video )

  • Step 1: Preheat oven to 200 - 250 degrees F depending on desired mold depth.
  • Step 2: Insert  Foot Flops in oven for 5 - 7 minutes directly on middle rack 
  • Step 3: Pull out Foot Flops and step directly into the Foot Flops with your foot as close to center as possible. 
  • Step 4: Ensure Foot Flops are on a hard, even surface during molding 
  • Step 5: Rock your feet back and forth with equal weight for optimal mold 

Within 10-15 minutes they will be cooled down completely. We recommend wearing them for at least 15 minutes after the molding process.  Complete instructions will be included with your package.

Colors and Sizing:

An email will be sent out after our funding campaign is over to collect your color choice(s) and size(s).  A sizing chart will be sent with the email to help you get the exact size for Men's or Women's. Check out all of the killer color options below.

Foot Flops Color Options:

Leather Foot Flops:

Foot Flops is a Lifestyle:


Design & Manufacturing

There are many different factors that play a part in the performance of Foot Flops and the key ingredient is our patent pending thermoplastic layer (Thermo-Form™ foam). What we have succeeded in creating is the perfect materials that form completely to your feet with our patent pending HEAT™ technology.

We promise our product will have the same health benefits and comfort that have been used by many aftermarket orthotic insoles, at a fraction of the cost while keeping up with the newest trends in style and fashion.

Foot Flops are approved and recommended by renowned podiatrists, physical therapists and athletes alike. Our number one focus is to deliver a product that will make your life happier, one step at a time.

FAQ

When do I select my color(s) and size(s)? An email will be sent out after our funding campaign is over to collect your color choice(s) and size(s). A sizing chart will be sent with the email to help you get the exact size for Men's or Women's.

Can I pick different sizes and colors in the same order? Yes, for multi-pair rewards you can select different sizes and colors.

Can I order a half size? At this time, there are no half sizes; please round up. 

If left in a hot car or outside, will they melt or need to be reshaped? No. Once molded they hold their shape. The Foot Flops would have to be exposed to temperatures above 250 F to get back to a moldable form. This could only be done in a traditional oven as your vehicle should never reach that temperature. 

How often do Foot Flops need to be remolded? Just once! After their first molding, Foot Flops will hold their shape. Do they lose their shape in water? No. Foot Flops are actually perfect around the water and they float too! 

Can they be reheated to mold to another person’s foot? No. We don’t recommend reheating Foot Flops for another person. They are meant to be heated just one time for one specific person.

Meet the Foot Flops Team

Tom Fay Originally from Chicago, Tom Fay has lived in Jackson Hole, WY since 1992. During college years, Tom moved to Charleston, SC to pursue a career in the food and beverage industry and attended Johnson and Wales University. Tom literally lived in flip flops throughout those years frequenting the local beaches in his spare time. He knows the importance of having a comfortable yet supportive pair of sandals for everyday wear. Tom moved back to Jackson Hole and now owns a fun, quick service pizzeria that has been featured on the Food Network’s show Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives.

Jamie Mackay A Jackson Hole, Wyoming native, Jamie Mackay grew up accustomed to the Rocky Mountain region and all of the unique qualities and activities it has to offer. With a passion for outdoor life and its beauty, he acquired an eye for Western contemporary design and has traveled the world to learn more about his passion. As a result of his upbringing in a mountain town, Jamie developed a preference for THE best gear and clothing for his lifestyle. Ski orthotics became a must-have for instant comfort in the winter, but he wanted an instantly comfortable pair of flip flops going into summer. With constant scrutiny of the latest fads and releases, Jamie knew there could be a better flip flop with instant comfort, right out of his ski boots. He became passionate about his quest to make the best flip flop ever made.

Wes White Having grown up in the Southeast, Wes White practically lived in flip flops in his hometown of Atlanta, GA. After graduating from college, he moved out to Denver, Colorado to begin his career in finance-- and also to take advantage of all the Rockies had to offer. After a job change, Wes moved to Jackson Hole where he met Tom and Jamie with similar passions that began both a personal and professional friendship! Even in the colder climates out in Wyoming, Wes wears flip flops as much as possible, and he was excited to join the Foot Flops team to create the BEST pair ever offered on the market!
story_txt:
Please visit our new website for future orders here...www.footflops.com.  Thank you from the Foot Flops Team! Introducing Foot Flops™ Foot Flops™ are the first high-quality, heat-molded, orthotic and arch-supporting flip flops on the market. Foot Flops will provide users with instant comfort without the painful break-in time that comes with regular flip flops.

 Sunrise Model - Heat Molded

In The Press

 
We were inspired to create Foot Flops after experiencing all of the advancements made in insole technology. As avid skiers and snowboarders, we saw how comfortable heat-molded inserts are and instantly realized all the benefits they provided for our feet and overall body. We wanted this comfort to be available to you, and not just when you’re on the slopes. This is why we decided to create Foot Flops.
1. No break-in time = super comfortable straight out of the oven.
2.  Superior arch support = less back pain and foot lengthening over time.
3. Higher-end design and fashionable = you look super cool!
Foot Flops are Perfect for Every Place & Activity:


 Hit the Road with Foot Flops!

 Green Fade Grey - Great for any adventure
75% of Americans will experience foot problems at one time or another in their lives. Traditional flip flops do not address these issues in any way. Foot Flops are the solution to traditional flip flops!
How to Make Your Very Own Foot Flops: ( See Video )


 
 PLAY  

Subtitles & Captions


English — English
English — English العربية — Arabic Català — Catalan Čeština — Czech Dansk — Danish Deutsch — German ελληνικά — Greek Español (España) — Spanish (Spain) Español (México) — Spanish (Mexico) Suomi — Finnish Français — French Gaeilge — Irish עברית — Hebrew हिन्दी — Hindi Hrvatski — Croatian Magyar — Hungarian Bahasa Indonesia — Indonesian Italiano — Italian 日本語 — Japanese 한국의 — Korean Bahasa Melayu — Malay Norsk bokmål — Bokmål Nederlands — Dutch Diné bizaad — Navajo Polski — Polish Português (Brasil) — Portuguese (Brazil) Português (Portugal) — Portuguese (Portugal) Română — Romanian Русский — Russian Slovenčina — Slovak Svenska — Swedish ภาษาไทย — Thai Türkçe — Turkish українська — Ukrainian tiếng Việt — Vietnamese יידיש — Yiddish 简体中文 — Chinese (Simplified) 繁體中文 — Chinese (Traditional)

Add track 


Make your video accessible in other languages and to deaf and hard-of-hearing backers.



Step 1: Preheat oven to 200 - 250 degrees F depending on desired mold depth.

Step 2: Insert  Foot Flops in oven for 5 - 7 minutes directly on middle rack 

Step 3: Pull out Foot Flops and step directly into the Foot Flops with your foot as close to center as possible. 

Step 4: Ensure Foot Flops are on a hard, even surface during molding 

Step 5: Rock your feet back and forth with equal weight for optimal mold 

Within 10-15 minutes they will be cooled down completely. We recommend wearing them for at least 15 minutes after the molding process.  Complete instructions will be included with your package.
Colors and Sizing:
An email will be sent out after our funding campaign is over to collect your color choice(s) and size(s).  A sizing chart will be sent with the email to help you get the exact size for Men's or Women's. Check out all of the killer color options below.
Foot Flops Color Options:

 Original Kickstarter Green

 Original Red and Black

 Original Sunrise

 Pinstripe Sunrise Fade

 Pinstripe Sunrise

 Pinstripe - Rasta Flop

 Pinstripe Blue to Grey

 Pinstripe - Blue to White

 Pinstripe - Green to Grey

 Pinstripe - Green to white

 Original Black
Leather Foot Flops:

 Brown Leather

 Black Leather
Foot Flops is a Lifestyle:

 Slide Lake, Jackson Hole, WY

 Cliff Jump- Gros Ventre River

 Sunset on Shadow Mountain

Design & Manufacturing
There are many different factors that play a part in the performance of Foot Flops and the key ingredient is our patent pending thermoplastic layer (Thermo-Form™ foam). What we have succeeded in creating is the perfect materials that form completely to your feet with our patent pending HEAT™ technology.
We promise our product will have the same health benefits and comfort that have been used by many aftermarket orthotic insoles, at a fraction of the cost while keeping up with the newest trends in style and fashion.
Foot Flops are approved and recommended by renowned podiatrists, physical therapists and athletes alike. Our number one focus is to deliver a product that will make your life happier, one step at a time.

 Get Your Project Funded Today!
 FAQ
When do I select my color(s) and size(s)? An email will be sent out after our funding campaign is over to collect your color choice(s) and size(s). A sizing chart will be sent with the email to help you get the exact size for Men's or Women's.
Can I pick different sizes and colors in the same order? Yes, for multi-pair rewards you can select different sizes and colors.
Can I order a half size? At this time, there are no half sizes; please round up. 
If left in a hot car or outside, will they melt or need to be reshaped? No. Once molded they hold their shape. The Foot Flops would have to be exposed to temperatures above 250 F to get back to a moldable form. This could only be done in a traditional oven as your vehicle should never reach that temperature. 
How often do Foot Flops need to be remolded? Just once! After their first molding, Foot Flops will hold their shape. Do they lose their shape in water? No. Foot Flops are actually perfect around the water and they float too! 
Can they be reheated to mold to another person’s foot? No. We don’t recommend reheating Foot Flops for another person. They are meant to be heated just one time for one specific person.
Meet the Foot Flops Team

 The Team
Tom Fay Originally from Chicago, Tom Fay has lived in Jackson Hole, WY since 1992. During college years, Tom moved to Charleston, SC to pursue a career in the food and beverage industry and attended Johnson and Wales University. Tom literally lived in flip flops throughout those years frequenting the local beaches in his spare time. He knows the importance of having a comfortable yet supportive pair of sandals for everyday wear. Tom moved back to Jackson Hole and now owns a fun, quick service pizzeria that has been featured on the Food Network’s show Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives.
Jamie Mackay A Jackson Hole, Wyoming native, Jamie Mackay grew up accustomed to the Rocky Mountain region and all of the unique qualities and activities it has to offer. Even in the colder climates out in Wyoming, Wes wears flip flops as much as possible, and he was excited to join the Foot Flops team to create the BEST pair ever offered on the market!

story:
How many:

Reps can he do?

Titles can one guy have?!

T-shirts can we get on backs this time!

Competing is not easy. Breaking records is definitely not easy. Living life by the seat of your unwashed for 14 days pants isn't either - it's lucky however that Dave is always wearing fresh T's! Hot off the press right now are our new, limited edition 'HOW MANY?' DPT t-shirts. Grab yourself or a friend a T and/or Perk today to show everyone you're a supporter and have a never quit spirit too!

  • Custom design for the Arnold Classic 2015
  • Get behind Dave and support him on his quest
  • Wear it with pride and discover how many it takes you to succeed too!

“I want to be around people that do things. I don’t want to be around people anymore that judge or talk about what people do. I want to be around people that dream and support and do things.” 
― Amy Poehler (and pretty sure I've heard Dave say this too, not sure he knows Amy, though I'm sure they'd get along!)

Remember, Dave is motivated by each and everyone of you who support him. It drives him to put in all those extra hours and miles and deliver the results he's renowned for. Ask yourself: if you had a chance to help Dave continue to help people like you, would you take it? Or perhaps you just have lots of old shitty, same-same t-shirts, and need a new, better one? Why not get one of these?

What We Need & What You Get

Davo needs a helping hand to get over to America (and back!). When he competes in Melbourne he'll probably need petrol money but he will have accommodation at my house.

  • We're hoping to cover the cost of printing this years round of t-shirts (we weren't quick enough to take preorders and went ahead and ordered a bunch!) and any extra will be a bonus and help pay for flights and fuel. You'll see exactly where your money goes when you receive your DPT pack & also see Dave's photos on Instagram!
  • The generosity of people with the Mr Olympia t-shirts was amazing, and we will forever get a kick out seeing people wear our design and support Dave and his beliefs. 
  • While in the States Dave runs his 30-Day Challenge at an awesome gym by the name of Funk Fitness, and it truly is changing lives for the better.
  • We also have up for sale our 30-Day Challenge Recipe Books. A highly sought after item which we know you will enjoy!!

The Impact

To be honest, Dave looks like he's living the high life, but the truth is he is too generous with his time and his money (this is his sister writing this) and so any little bit of help he can get will help balance things out. Plus we genuinely love seeing people wear our gear - it's like the ultimate feedback. 

Risks & Challenges

Hmmm I'm told to write about risks & challenges now... only risk is possibly the waiting time. You'll have to wait for Davo to get back from his trip so he can duck down to the post office and send off your parcels :)

  • When it comes to Dave, I'm sure you've all exercised patience before.
  • I wonder if I'll get in trouble for writing all this?

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If your draws are already overflowing with snazzy t-shirts and your kitchen already stacked to the ceiling with recipe books, then we would love it if you could even just get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • Share share share!

And that's about it from me! Thanks for reading this far and supporting my brother. Proud of you all.

Sonia.

story:
Parce que l'amour de la lingerie conditionne ma vie chaque jour, il est temps de se mettre face au miroir et d'assumer ...

C'est avec beaucoup d'énergie et de créativité que je viens vous présenter mon projet .

Mes compétences et qualités

Riche d'une expérience d'une dizaine d'années au cœur de la lingerie, j'ai acquis une solide connaissance technique  en terme de produits, de ventes, de construction de collection et de négociation.

J'ai travaillé durant 7 ans dans les achats de matières premières et de produits finis,dans des marques de corseterie haut de gamme française.En accompagnant les stylistes au quotidien, ma sensibilité produit s'est affûtée,ma créativité,épanouie.Dotée d'une curiosité sans faille pour ce secteur, j'ai aussi pu me tester à la vente de détail et apprendre les 'points clés" d'une gestion de magasin et d'un bon service client .

Une expérience au cœur d'une centrale d'achats (toujours dans le secteur de la lingerie) m'a permis de maîtriser les chiffres ( rentabilité,marge, chiffre d'affaires, rotation de stock,...).

Mais ce qui fait ma force aujourd'hui, c'est que cette expérience a été complétée par une année de formation en conception produit ( modélisme lingerie /montage etc...) et par une personnalité de battante .

Je vous invite à visiter le blog de mes créations...

https://tessavaltessecreation.wordpress.com/

Créer pour créer n'est pas l'objet de ma requête, le Cœur a besoin de la Raison et il m'a fallu prendre du temps pour la réflexion .


L'idée Générale de mon projet

L'idée est donc de pouvoir développer une marque de lingerie Haut de gamme en proposant des produits "sur-mesure" et  spécifiques ( grandes tailles ,...) .Cette marque s'adresse aux femmes qui sont sensibles à ce qu'elle porte au quotidien,aux matières,à leur sensualité, au patrimoine ( utilisation notamment de dentelle de Calais, de soieries lyonnaises...),aux femmes qui recherchent la sensation d'un univers...l'univers d'une femme qui créée pour d'autres femmes .Un univers empreint à l'ancien,au souvenir, aux ouvrages d'antan.


Les produits développés ont aussi pour objectif de mettre la séduction, le raffinement au service des femmes qui ont été meurtries par un cancer du sein, pour qui la féminité est un besoin prioritaire dans le processus de reconstruction du corps et de l'Etre. Proposer des produits qui leur vont , intégrés au cœur des différents thèmes .



Pour concrétiser cela de la manière la plus "concrète", sans un investissement démesuré ( car la corseterie demande d'importants fonds dès la conception), mon projet est de reprendre un commerce de lingerie, qui puisse me permettre d'assurer un chiffre d'affaires qui sera réalisé avec la vente de produits de lingerie multimarques ( dans un secteur à potentiel), tout en proposant les produits de ma marques .Ceci devenant un concept de "Boutique Atelier" de lingerie corseterie .

Le but est de grandir petit à petit, en proposant un service de qualité en terme de vente , une expertise produit et conception produit,et une dynamique autour de cette boutique qui devient un atelier, un lieu de réunion , un lieu de vie et d'échange.

Les objectifs du projet

Objectifs à court terme :

- Générer du chiffres d'affaires avec les ventes et bien maîtriser la clientèle et ses attentes .

- Proposer une service de sur-mesure , avec intégration de la cliente dans le processus de création et de conception.

- Créer des "ateliers/réunions"  convivaux afin de cibler certaines clientes en recherche de produits spécifiques ( ex: un atelier ciblé "Grande taille" avec étude des besoins de la cliente, proposition et essayage de produit, tests de certains produits,présentation de marques spécialisées etc...)

Objectifs à moyen terme :

- Générer des bénéfices qui pourront être investit dans le développement d'une marque de lingerie ( avec plus de quantités en terme d'offre)

Objectifs à long terme :

-Développer un réseau de boutiques -ateliers pour promouvoir la corseterie Haut de gamme, le raffinement etc...

Les Besoins/Utilisation des dons

Aujourd'hui, j'ai besoin de votre aide, pour réaliser ce rêve qui n'en est pas moins très concret.Vos dons ont une valeur pécuniaire certes, puisqu'ils me permettront d'acquérir de l'apport pour des achats de marchandises, pour constituer la trésorerie qui me permettra d'évoluer , mais ils ont une valeur inestimable car ils représentent l'intérêt que vous porterez à la créativité et au rêve d'une personne .

- Construire un apport personnel

- Achat de marchandises ( produits finis et/ou matière première)

- Achat de deux machines industrielles 

Parfois,la vie prend son temps, parfois la patience nous quitte, et un jour, l'évidence est là ...Cette évidence est là aujourd'hui, les lignes de ce projet sont claires, les démarches en cours et la motivation sans faille ...

Alors merci à vous , d'avoir pris du temps pour découvrir ce projet .

story:
What is Verillas?
  At Verillas we strive to bring you artisan quality, hand made clothing and boots. We travel the world looking for the best materials, the best craftsmen, and the best quality. We strive to give you clothing and boots that you can proudly wear 10, 20, even 30 years from now. We care about what you wear and we want you to look great and to confidently know that the pair of boots you have on can and will last you for your epic travels and grand adventures.
  We at Verillas want to invite you to take part in our creative process by helping to fund the new collection of V-Kilts. Our new collection of V-Kilts are stylish, comfortable, and flattering, designed to help you look and feel great while displaying your own unique style. By taking part in this campaign, you get special rewards and discounts on our products while at the same time helping us order a new line of Kilts. Without your support, we won't be able to order any more of the garment and you won't be able to enjoy it.

What do you get? Your perks for helping us are...

$19  One hand made kilt belt

$19 One traditional faux leather sporran with Celtic knot imprint

$25 One Scottish Ghillie shirt in black or white. Size available: S-XXL

$35 One artisan quality real leather sporran with Celtic knot imprint

$49 One tartan two buckle skirt. Size available: S-L

$49 One Traditional Blackwatch men's 24" long kilt in blue tartan. Size available: 30-42 (Kilt sizes are 2-4 inches larger than US jeans sizes see sizing chart)

$49 One Traditional Blackwatch men's 24" long kilt in green tartan. Size available: 30-42 (Kilt sizes are 2-4 inches larger than US jeans sizes see sizing chart )

$99  One Verillas V-Kilt with utility pockets in black
 Size available: 30-42

$99  One Verillas V-Kilt with utility pockets in green
Size available: 30-42

$99  One Verillas V-Kilt with utility pockets in brown
Size available: 30-42

$99 One Verillas black Metal Gothic Kilt
Size available: 30-42

$119 One Verillas hybrid 2 color kilt in black & red
Size available: 30-42

 $119 One Verillas hybrid 2 color kilt in black & army green                                            Size available: 30-42

$149 Warrior Kit bundle - You get one Traditional Blackwatch kilt in blue or green tartan, one Ghillie shirt, one kilt belt, and one sporran package.

$199 King's Loot bundle - You get one V-Kilt utility your choice of kilt color and style a Verillas Tee Shirt S-XXL, and a genuine leather sporran.

$199 Pirate's Loot bundle - One genuine leather hand made 24" men's kilt with one adjustable kilt belt and one engraved Celtic knot buckle.
Kilt Size Charts
Size available: 30-42
 Help us make you look great.
Help us bring you the fashion you want You help us make our goal, we help you look great in the best clothing out there. Take advantage of the fantastic deals we are offering you here in this campaign to save money and look great. You help us fit the bill so we can order more of the products you love. We help you by saving you money and making you the style icon and envy of wherever you go. Sound good? Will you help us? Will you take advantage of this deal and make yourself look the best you can?
We have stretch goals as well, so if we make more than what we need, those of you who have pledged will end up with even more goodies.
We have stretch goals as well, so if we make more than what we need, those of you who have pledged will end up with even more goodies.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you want to help but don't feel like ordering anything, please share this campaign with as many people you can. Not only will your support and encouragement help make the Jacket Collection possible, but you might help someone else find that garment they've been looking for.
story_txt:
What is Verillas?   At Verillas we strive to bring you artisan quality, hand made clothing and 
boots. We travel the world looking for the best materials, the best 
craftsmen, and the best quality. We strive to give you clothing and 
boots that you can proudly wear 10, 20, even 30 years from now.
 We care about what you wear and we want you to look great and to 
confidently know that the pair of boots you have on can and will last 
you for your epic travels and grand adventures.  We at Verillas
 want to invite you to take part in our creative process by helping to 
fund the new collection of V-Kilts. Our new collection of V-Kilts are stylish,
 comfortable, and flattering, designed to help you look and feel great 
while displaying your own unique style. By taking part in this campaign,
 you get special rewards and discounts on our products while at the same
 time helping us order a new line of Kilts.
 Without your support, we won't be able to order any more of the garment
 and you won't be able to enjoy it.




What do you get? Your perks for helping us are...

$19 One traditional faux leather sporran with Celtic knot imprint

story:
Jump to >        Be There        |     Be Ready        |      Be Seen       |   Price List


Welcome to the Be S.M.A.R.T Initiative

Making Open-Water Swimming Accessible
and Safer for All Swimmers !


Want to take your car keys, energy gels, water, to be seen in the water by other swimmers, team-mates, boats and lifeguards, here is what you are looking for.

We designed the Be Smart products to give you peace of mind and confidence in & out the water, as a beginner, dedicated swimmer or experienced coach.

Everything is ready to start producing this summer, an international factory is waiting for our green light. They are already producing inflatable safety, medical and government approved devices on a daily basis.


But launching a new product range is expensive and that’s where you can help us. Thanks to your support we could raise the budget by the end of July and cover the initial tooling, producing and marketing costs.

It may sounds obvious, but it's important for us to precise that each person that is contributing to the BE SMART Initiative will receive the product that
they pre-ordered no matter the outcome of the campaign !

The faster we reach our goal, the faster we could send them back to you !


Click on the titles to know more about the BE S.M.A.R.T product of  your choice


            Be There                |             Be Ready              |             Be Seen      


More than light, Weightless in the water!
Well that's bold, but it's actually a reality. All our products are made of naturally floating materials, meaning that they have virtually no weight in the water.
No impact on your swimming experience and NO DRAG when inflated !


"Be Ready" is the simplest, most compact and practical inflatable flotation device to date, Inflate when you want, Float when you need!

Available in 2 sizes:

"Be Ready Mini 6L" 240 gr, keeps afloat a conscious swimmer of up to 100 kg.
  It only takes 2 to 3 deep breaths to inflate ! (less than 10 sec)

"Be Ready Maxi 11L" 300 gr, Keeps afloat up to 2 conscious swimmers at once.
  It only takes 4 to 5 deep breaths to inflate ! (less than 15 sec)

Find more details about the benefits of oral inflation in the extended description



"Be Seen Water Carrier" - The perfect training tool, 3 in One:

- Be Visible up to 1 mile off shore (1.6 km +/-) by the Lifeguards, Be Seen by boats, other swimmers and fast water vehicles,

- Take water with you even far from shore, compatible with all bottles or waterproof container from 0.5L up to 2 L,

- Inflatable buoy in case of... to give more peace of mind to your loved ones that came with you or stayed at home...




"Be There" - The First Insulated cooler bag that double as an emergency buoy! When loaded with 2 empty bottles of 1.5L it can help to keep afloat a conscious person while keeping soft drinks fresh for up to 4Hrs !



Your support will allow us to take our working prototypes into production, initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make our water-fun oriented products available to you and all the people that want to enjoy, share or discover the freedom of open-waters and avoid unnecessary drama in their life.



You like one of them ?
Want to pre-order and benefit from the reduced prices ?

Only 2 simple things to do:

Step 1 - Just click on one of the boxes on the right in the "Perks column" describing the Be Smart product you would like to get & follow the process...

Step 2 - Before the end of the campaign, remember to choose the additional Shipping Speed and Cost that fits your needs & follow the process... That's it...

If you are pre-ordering from Haifa or if you want to come and pick it up yourself no need for additional shipping cost...


We believe that your trust in our project at this stage deserves a special gift!

That's why all contributors until the end of this campaign, will be awarded a special VIP membership account on the Shop Online we are about to build, giving you 20% discount on all the BE SMART products and the new concepts we have in store for our swimmers as long as the brand will exist!


Thank you all for your support !








Designed with safety experts  and professional swimming coaches
for swimmers of all levels, ages and sizes.

All the Be READY and BE SEEN inflatable buoys already meet the same quality requirements as official PFD's (Personal Flotation Devices) available today,

using the same high performance / resistant materials (TPU) and accessories from leading official providers for the safety industry, e.g the same fabric and the same oral inflation tube that you could find on a life jacket.


So why should you support us?

- You want to participate to the design process and help us to create more
   solutions that answers to your needs in the water,

- You want your loved ones that swim a lot, long, far, to be safer in the water,

- You want to give your wife, husband, children, friends (...) more peace of mind
   when you go swimming in open-waters,

- You want to make more swimmers discover safely, the freedom of open-water
   swimming and be ready to help yourself or someone else in the water...

- or simply contribute to drowning prevention efforts within your community.



Jump Top:         > Be There      > Be Ready      > Be Seen         > Price List


"Be There"

What do we all need when we go out for a trip, a warm day on the beach
or barbecue by the lake? To Keep our drinks nice and fresh for hours ?

"Be There" - The first Insulated Drink Bag that double as an Emergency Buoy !



“Be There”  is a sturdy, soft drink insulated bag that can follow you in all your activities close to the water and keep fresh 2 standard bottles of 2 L for up to 4 hours.

It is also a tool for drowning prevention thanks to the illustrations and practical advices printed on both sides. The content can be adjusted to match the needs and priorities relevant to your community, check out the rewards to know more!

Our goal is for you to keep having a nice time by the water, to avoid an incident or simply “Be There” if necessary.

When loaded with 2 empty bottles, this emergency buoy can help to keep afloat a conscious person of 70 kg and more.

(Please keep in mind that our products are not meant to replace lifesaving devices, always wear a life-jacket when recommended)

3 Simple steps and your emergency buoy is ready to help a conscious person in distress in the water:



Specifications and Advantages :

- The bags are build out of recyclable materials (PE) that naturally float,
- 2 Be There bags (4 bottles) meet the minimum flotation capability of 6 Liters of air (buoyancy) enough to help a conscious person of 100 kg in the water,
- The Standard PET bottles that are used instead of an inflatable Nylon/TPU buoyancy chamber can resist the same minimum pressure of 100 PSI,
- If the buoyancy chambers (bottles) are damage, well it’s easy to replace them,
- It can be used in most situations involving people close to the water,
- It’s resistant to shock, tears, scratches, bites and other damages...
- It’s low cost makes it accessible to everyone from high to low income countries...




Inflatable Buoys and Advice with you when you need them most!


Early on during the design process of the prototypes, we started by collecting many testimonials from people, including some that are still afraid of the water many years later, forcing them to stay on the shore while their friends and family are having fun...

“I was 50 m from the shore with my boys blocked in the current and we didn’t know what to do ! We got lucky when someone came with a surf board to help us back to the beach."

One of the problem is that a lot of people feel that the existing products on the market don’t match with their activities, needs or budgets!

(Please keep in mind that our products are not meant to replace lifesaving devices, always wear a life-jacket when recommended)

That’s when we set out to provide answers to several of these issues at once with an adapted range of inflatable products.



Jump Top:        > Be There     > Be Ready       > Be Seen      > Price List


Meet the "Be Ready" inflatable buoys
(Patent Pending)


01 - To make personal flotation devices (PFD’s) as simple, accessible and
         affordable as possible, allowing you to Be Ready to help yourself or
        someone else in case of emergency!

02 - To design a product that is so compact and light
          that you don’t even feel it when you swim, surf, dive or even walk...

 


The “Be Ready PFD's” are covered with 2 "potentially life saving” tips easy to apply, directly printed on the fabric. The definition and selection of the content has been done with professional swimming coaches and lifeguards.

    Fighting the currents, hyper ventilating and exhaustion can easily lead
                                              to drowning incidents !

We designed our inflatable solutions specifically to empower swimmers and water enthusiast of all levels, to be able to help themselves or someone else in case of emergency...

All our products have a minimum of 6 Liters of inflatable volume, enough to help keeping afloat a conscious swimmer of 100 Kg.

The "Be Ready 11 L" can easily carry up to 2 conscious adults
at the same time !

03 - To combine in one simple action : Inflating  =  Floating  =  Relaxing,
         while providing you with practical advice at the moment you need it most,


It only takes an average of 9 to 15 seconds to inflate !

6L of Air = 2 to 3 deep breaths for most adults


04 - During our workshops with experts we understood that removing the CO2
         automatic inflator would actually bring you quite a few advantages:

- It makes the products much lighter, more compact and less expensive,

- No need to buy expensive CO2 cartridges to re-arm the product,

- No need to learn how to repack the product following complex steps of flops,

- No risk of damaging the product or hurting someone while providing assistance,

Exhaling deeply and inhaling slowly is one of the first advice always given by sport coaches, professional rescue, relaxation or stress experts all over the world.
Why ? Simply because breathing out as much as CO2 as possible will help you to relax rapidly, to slow down your heart beat, to stop feeling out of air and focus your mind on a simple task and not on the distressing situation.

       For each breath you take you instantly feel that you are floating !

Throughout the testing sessions with children, teenagers and adults, we confirmed that people start to feel the buoyancy from the first 2 breaths inside one of our products.

Keep in mind that this logic applies first to people that willingly entered the water, for example: swimmers, surfers, divers, etc...

“Be Ready Buoys” are also a great way to have fun in the shallows, to learn to swim with a friendly and soft product that can make the difference for less experimented swimmers while out in the water by themselves.

Remember, to always keep children under constant adult supervision while inside or near the water. Our products are not meant to replace lifesaving devices, always wear a life-jacket when recommended !


Jump Top:        > Be There      > Be Ready      > Be Seen      > Price List


Introducing the Be Seen - Water Carrier - 3 in One
(Patent Pending)


Designed by swimmers, with training experts to fit your needs and lifestyle as coaches, intensive swimmer or dedicated water enthusiast!

All the experts recommend staying hydrated while training.

Nothing new here, but paradoxically, swimming and surfing are 2 of the sports where people can stay in the water for hours, in the sun, without drinking, a few hundred meters for the shore...


The Be Seen water carrier is the perfect training tool combining all the advantages of the "Be Ready series" with additional functions, 3 in One:

- Flotation, an inflatable personal flotation device in case of emergency (PFD)
   8 L of buoyancy to help to keep afloat a conscious swimmer up to 125 Kg,

- Visibility above water, yellow body + 1 Red Flag to Be Seen by boats
   and lifeguards, 30*30cm, 50cm high,

- Water Carrier, including a pocket for energy bites and other small belongings
   while in the water (up to 2 water-proof containers of 0.5L to 2 L),


Since we started testing and training with the prototypes we receive a lot of positive feedback from the loved ones of our swimmers.

They shared with us how it gives them more peace of mind to know that their wife, husband or sons will not be alone, without any flotation aid in the water anymore.


Specifications:

All the products in the Be Ready and Be Seen Series have been developed following the same quality requirement as existing inflatable PFD’s:

- To provide a minimum flotation capability (buoyancy) of 50 N
  (6L of inflated volume),
- To fit most waist sizes from 70 cm up to 140 cm,
- The inflatable TPU chamber, nylon fabric coated with TPU can resist
  a pressure  of minimum100 PSI
- The nylon/TPU fabric is provided by one of the leader in the safety
  product industry
- The inflation oral tube equipped with a one way valve is a certified
  safety component
- The RF welding process is the same used to assemble inflatable
   life-jackets
- The buoys can keep afloat a conscious swimmer of 100 kg and above.




                                Filling the Gaps to keep the fun going!



Why we need your support?


We have been working on the Be S.m.a.r.t Initiative for the past year and we've come a long way. But now we need your help.
Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make our water-fun oriented products available to you and all the people that want to keep the fun going in the water and avoid unnecessary drama in their life.

We currently have several working prototypes and we're now focused on:

- Finalizing the accessories designs, graphics and packaging
  for the final products
- Confirming the supply chain process
- Preparing to create the Be SMART Initiative website to keep spreading
  the word !

So why should you support us?


- You want to become a Beta Tester and participate to the design process,
- You want your loved ones that swim a lot, far, to be safer in the water,
- You want to give your wife, husband, children... peace of mind when
  you go swimming for hours,
- You want to be ready to help yourself or someone else in case of...
- or simply contribute to drowning prevention efforts within your community.


Jump Top:        > Be There     > Be Ready     > Be Seen        > Price List

Welcome to the Be S.M.A.R.T Initiative,
Let's Keep the water fun together !


Thank you for your support !



Jump Top:         > Be There      > Be Ready      > Be Seen         > Price List

Specifications:All the products in the Be Ready and Be Seen Series have been developed following the same quality requirement as existing inflatable PFD’s:- To provide a minimum flotation capability (buoyancy) of 50 N  (6L of inflated volume),- To fit most waist sizes from 70 cm up to 140 cm,- The inflatable TPU chamber, nylon fabric coated with TPU can resist  a pressure  of minimum100 PSI- The nylon/TPU fabric is provided by one of the leader in the safety  product industry- The inflation oral tube equipped with a one way valve is a certified  safety component- The RF welding process is the same used to assemble inflatable   life-jackets - The buoys can keep afloat a conscious swimmer of 100 kg and above.                                Filling the Gaps to keep the fun going!Why we need your support?We have been working on the Be S.m.a.r.t Initiative for the past year and we've come a long way. But now we need your help.Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make our water-fun oriented products available to you and all the people that want to keep the fun going in the water and avoid unnecessary drama in their life.We currently have several working prototypes and we're now focused on:- Finalizing the accessories designs, graphics and packaging  for the final products- Confirming the supply chain process- Preparing to create the Be SMART Initiative website to keep spreading  the word !So why should you support us?- You want to become a Beta Tester and participate to the design process,- You want your loved ones that swim a lot, far, to be safer in the water,- You want to give your wife, husband, children... peace of mind when  you go swimming for hours,- You want to be ready to help yourself or someone else in case of...- or simply contribute to drowning prevention efforts within your community.
 Jump Top:        > Be There     > Be Ready     > Be Seen        > Price List
Welcome to the Be S.M.A.R.T Initiative,Let's Keep the water fun together !
Thank you for your support !Jump Top:         > Be There      > Be Ready      > Be Seen         > Price List

story:
TWILASH is the Swiss Army Knife of eyelash products that every woman should carry.  An engineered beauty tool that enhances and maintains your eyelashes, TWILASH replaces your entire arsenal of lash primping equipment.  TWILASH is the highest quality mascara, applicator/remover, curler and lash elongate all in one ... yes one!  TWILASH fits right in your hand for perfect control.  It maintains your lash health and prevents premature aging.

What you need to know about Curling Eyelashes and Removing Mascara

Curling Eyelashes


Removing Mascara



Who we are

We are a small group of engineers and creative people finding real solutions for the active woman, after all we are highly trained problem solvers. Our main challenge was to come up with a single solution that integrates and outperforms existing eyelash products  for enhancement, cosmetic and care. Are objective was not to find alternatives or partial solutions, our  goal was to figure out, design, and develop an engineered product that improves the life of the active women.  We are very passionate about TWILASH and so happy to see this ambitious project come to life. 


EARN A FREE TWILASH! SEE REWARD PROGRAM BELOW


Your contribution is very important to help us make people aware that a great product like this now exists. We have worked very hard to develop a product that truly works and is so simple to use. However, new and better concepts/methods need to be exposed to people so they can easily understand how it works and what it does. Please help us get the word out there!  

If your contribution exceeds our initial goal, we will take advantage right away to improve our manufacturing processes and tools to lower the over all cost. As you know new ideas require a lot of pricy customization, research and development. We have made it across the line to have the capability to mass produce TWILASH at a relatively high cost. We can only maintain this structure for a limited time without transferring the cost to the end user. Lowering the manufacturing cost is the right solution for all. 

We use the best and well recognized labs to manufacture our cosmetics components to match the level of sophistication of TWILASH. Prime quality is not cheap and ordering in bigger quantities will helps us maintain our fair prices. We believe in top quality at a reasonable price. If we have funds left we will not waste the opportunity to do this. 

So, what is TWILASH? Simple! Integration and outperformance of what you have today for your eyelashes. 


These are the main solutions TWILASH will be giving: 




Enhancement: Giving shaping memory to the eyelashes is not just the best way to make them alive, it also increases dramatically the beautifying capabilities of the mascara. Proper shaping in not just limited to looks, it increases mascara performance and application.

Natural Curling: Conventional curlers are a thing of the past. Let us forget about the spider leg look (bended and uneven) eyelashes and start enjoying natural, continuous curl and elongated eyelashes. The unique curling features will bring great results without the need of mechanical devices that only hurt the eyes, destroy the anatomy of the lashes and are difficult to clean, carry and maintain.

Alignment and Separation: Based on TWILASH's shaping memory capabilities, this product aligns and separates those rebel eyelashes. This process not just gives volume to the eyelashes before mascara, it also eases the application of it. It is proven that mascara cannot correct al imperfections and is limited to the state of the eyelashes. TWILASH improves results by enhancing the eyelashes prior to mascara.

Prevents Premature Aging and Irritations: TWILASH does not just seek beauty, it cares for you by helping to prevent premature aging, infections, irritations and raccoon eyes. 

 Compact, Portable & All in One: One device that can be taken everywhere with the power to do everything. 

Ergonomic: This is a contribution of physiology, engineering, biomechanics, industrial design, graphic design, statistics, and operations research. This means it is a product that fits naturally in the hand and operates effectively using only the body's cognitive abilities. 

Mascara & Make-Up Remover: The specially designed mascara remover brings the most effective and convenient way to remove mascara, especially water resistant mascara.   In combination with twilash, the cotton mechanically removes even the toughest mascara without rubbing sensitive and fragile skin areas. Avoiding these areas is the best way to fight premature aging.

Mascara: We did not reinvent mascara but did make sure to develop the highest quality mascara for you. Our formulas have been developed in California (USA) to equal the level of sophistication of TWILASH. Best of all, TWILASH and mascara come integrated in a single compact design, like the conventional mascara.

Engineered Brush & Applicator: Our engineered brush is designed to give optimal performance when it comes to mascara application and results. In addition, TWILASH is ergonomically designed to improve brush control when used as a mascara applicator. 



TWILASH is not just a beauty project. It is a CARE product that removes macara, does not damage your lashes and helps prevent premature aging. For more information on why TWILASH is such a great CARE product please Click Here


Check out how it works. Go to our video gallery.


What We Need & What You Get

How we will spend your contribution

  • Develop a series of videos including 3D clips to better explain the results obtained with TWILASH. 
  • Improve our tutorial videos by using better visual aids to better explain the enhancement, cosmetic and care processes. 
  • Diffuse our videos in social networks

How we will spend your contribution if we do not meet our goal

  • Diffuse our existing videos in social networks
  • Improve as much as we can our existing educational material

How we will spend your contribution if we exceed our goal

  • We will meet the priorities of our intended goal
  • Improve our tooling to make more efficient injection molds for our components
  • Lower our cosmetic and material cost by increasing our manufacturing volume

People that have tried TWILASH do not like it, they love it! We value your contribution and in exchange for our contribution we will give you our best....TWILASH before it hits the market.


HAVE WE ANSWERED ALL YOUR QUESTIONS? DID WE MISS SOMETHING? PLEASE DO NOT HESITATE TO ASK US AT kurrechaga@twilash.com 


EARN A FREE TWILASH! SEE REWARD PROGRAM BELOW


For you Contribution we are offering the following:

TWILASH (Compact)


Our products include a prime mascara. However we listen to you and understand that   you may already found a mascara that works and we are happy for that. We came up with a compact version that you can carry anywhere to take advantage of TWILASH's  enhancement and care power (mascara remover). Use your preferred mascara and improve your results. 

Contact lens users can benefit tremendously from TWILASH. Besides giving you a great naturally appearance, TWILASH increase the angle of entry when placing them. Beside making it easier, it also helps reduce contamination by giving you more working area. 

Gentlemen TWILASH is also for you! Men usually have longer and thicker lashes which makes it a nightmare when using contact lenses or even regular lenses. Enhancing your lashes will blow away the hassle while  enjoying an nice look in the process. For this reason we are developing a TWILASH just for you!


TWILASH + MASCARA (Black - Volume & Length)

Is it is not a curler, comb, mascara, applicator, or mascara remover.......it is all of above! Take it with you anywhere. 



TWILASH + MASCARA (Black - Volume & Length Water Resistant)

Water resistant mascaras are great to wear but painful to remove. Do not be shy to use a water resistant macara if you posses the power of TWILASH. 



TWILASH + MASCARA + REMOVERS

All the solutions at your finger tips. Enhancement, Mascara & CARE



TWILASH + MASCARA + REMOVERS + DESIGN HARD COVER BOOK (Personalized)

An engineering hard cover book that describes TWILASH in detail. This book will have a personalized thank you note and your name on it. You are part of this project and this is a great way to connect with it. 


The Impact

We put our hearts and souls to make this work the way we intended. Having a great solution is 50% of the success. Creating awareness of the benefits and showing how it works is the other 50%. We need your contribution to get to the finish line with a product that has been proven to work. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our product just can’t contribute, we understand. You can still helps us tremendously by sharing or campaign with other, in a nutshell this is what we are looking for. Click the social network icons to share this great solution!

story:
What is GeniCan?

GeniCan is the world’s first intelligent device for your garbage can and is Patent Pending.

It scans garbage to automatically create your grocery list, matches coupons to products, and optionally delivers items to your doorstep.

GeniCan works with garbage and recycling, translating barcodes and spoken word into a customized grocery list stored on the GeniCan app. It saves you time, hassle and money.

The GeniCan Vision

GeniCan is using technology to modernize the shopping process. We provide you with money-saving coupons and delivery options while seamlessly managing the inventory of your kitchen or pantry. 

The Campaign

The funds we raise on Indiegogo will go towards the production of the GeniCan device and to complete the mobile application. 

Simple.

  • Easy to install and use.
  • Automatically scans or uses voice prompts – you don't need to touch it!
  • Your shopping list available on your phone anywhere and anytime.

Saves Time. 

  • Automatically creates your grocery list.
  • Your grocery list is sorted aisle-by-aisle.
  • Notifies you when the garbage is full.

Saves Money.

  • Delivers coupons to your phone.
  • Eliminate excess trips to the grocery store (less impulse purchases!).
  • Automatic delivery with grocery delivery service partners.


Security

GeniCan stores all grocery list items independently from personally identifiable information, and we do not share individual grocery lists or provide data to delivery services (or any other party) without consent of the user.

GeniCan matches third-party coupons by UPC codes and product type information only, we do not use or send personally identifiable information.

About the team:

GeniCan is led by Rob Griffin, a 15-year veteran in product and business development with extensive experience launching products for a leading Fortune 50 technology firm. Rob is supported by Dan O'Donnell, Dave Pestka, and 7 others, encompassing expertise in hardware engineering, embedded software development, web software development, UI & 3D design, and manufacturing.


GeniCan is designed and the manufacturing partner is standing by to start production of this great product. We just need you to pre-order to help fund final design and production. Click above to pre-order, and tell your friends about GeniCan.


Thank You!
The GeniCan Team

Rob Griffin, Inventor & Co-Founder
Daniel O’Donnell, Co-Founder VP of Marketing
David Pestka, Co-Founder VP of Creative
Gary Dye, Sr. Software Engineer
Sara Tabor, Web & QA Engineer
Michael O’Donnell, Director of Hardware Engineering
Rick Morrison, Sr. Architect Services
Laura Mahoney, UI Designer
Andrew Wanke, 3D Designer
John Queenan, Director of Sales & Marketing

The company is headquartered in Newtown, Connecticut.

For more information please visit www.GeniCan.com

story:
I'm Dan Nelson, a writer and conceptual artist in Oakland, California. I work with music, language, lists, etc. This campaign is basically a pre-order of the All Known Metal Bands t-shirt. AKMB is a book that was published in 2008 that lists every heavy metal band name of all time. It sold 10,000 copies, Rolling Stone loved it, it won a design award, Amazon loved it and you probably love it too. This is the 6 year anniversary and I'm finally getting around to making a shirt that lists all the names from the book that start with "black." Hallelujah! Err, I mean, Hail Satan!


This campaign will also help me launch my new line of t-shirts called Custom Flotilla. If you've ever found yourself in need of a humorous t-shirt but don't want to look like a tourist in some baggy, scratchy shirt that says "Property of Alcatraz" or "1 Tequila, 2 Tequila, 3 Tequila, Floor", then Custom Flotilla is for you. We'll be making shirts that reveal you to be the clever, cool individual you really are.

These are 100% cotton American Apparel t-shirts that are silky smooth, nicely fitted, in men's style or girl's style. The AKMB shirt doesn't just pamper your torso, it's a clever-as-all-get-out garment that is a bona fide conversation starter. "What is that shirt? What does it say? Black this and black that? What does it mean?!" And then you can tell them what it means!


What You Get

My goal in this campaign is $1000, which means if 50 people get a shirt, we're in the black so to speak. $20 gets you a shirt if you live in the Bay! $25 gets you a shirt shipped to wherever the heck you hang your hat! $35 gets you two shirts so you can give one to a friend, to your mom, to your friend's mom, or that nephew who hates everything and never wears the oxford shirt you got him last Christmas. Etc.

When you order/contribute, PLEASE specify Men's or Girls' style and the size, from XS to XXXL. I have a size 42 coat, 16 neck and 35 sleeve, and am wearing a medium in the picture above, which shows a sample of the exact model shirt (men's) you will get.

If I don’t reach the entire goal of the campaign, I'll still make shirts for the folks who contributed. People, we cannot lose.


The Impact

I'm very excited to launch this t-shirt line because it's a way to make some dough AND infect popular culture with my crazy ideas. Ed Ruscha, Lawrence Weiner, Joseph Kosuth, they're lucky enough to have gallery representation, but why bother with that when you can make t-shirts? You will be helping my art career and you won't even be stuck with a crappy drawing.
  
People, I'm an artist and that is a tough racket to be in. Sometimes trying to get your art out there can feel like trying to get a child to eat broccoli. But t-shirts are the perfect medium: everyone needs them, especially black ones, and if they have some cryptic message that makes other people wonder if they're too dumb to get it, you've just rolled snake eyes in this crap shoot called life.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute to this, don't sweat it. And if you like this campaign, tell everyone you know who might like it. Tweet about it, Fakebook it, post it on LinkedIn, Use the Indiegogo share tools!


See the Custom Flotilla page on my website for mockups up future shirts! http://nelsondesign.virb.com/custom-flotilla-t-shirts
