story:
About Us

   So the three of us girls have been best friends since childhood. Growing up in southern CA we found ourselves in swimwear quite often. One day at a Las Vegas pool, we were discussing the camel toe and how it plagues all us girls. We decided right then and there that we would stop at nothing untill there was a solution. Girls have enough to worry about when it comes to putting on swimwear, let's cross the camel toe off that list. Remember a true lady never reveals too much!
 
 

What We Need & What You Get

   We have been working hard to cure camel toe. We have a manufacturer to produce our "camel toe solution". The LLC has been created and established along with all needed copyrights. We have hired a managment team with a great mix of talent and focus. Best of all, they have the right connections to major retailers that can make No No Camel Toe a household name.
 
   We are also currently collaborating with a well known youtube name (who has over 90 million veiws) to create a funny commercial that we hope will go viral. We are willing to make complete fools of ourselves in order to get the attention we need to launch No No Camel Toe. 
 
   This is where you come in.  We just need the funds to buy our first round of products and supplies. For your contribution we have thought out some very unique giveaways that will hopefully make you laugh. You should at least find yourself laughing at us, if not with us. 
 
   We plan to send out the video giveaways ASAP. The estimated completion date we have set for June is only for the giveaway products that we have to put through production. But we hope to get those out sooner than June as well.

The Impact

 
   How nice would it be to see more girls walking proudly in their swimwear. Imagine a beach where girls find no need to reach for a towel right after leaving the water. Every girl can relate to the issue of having a camel toe at one time or another. Wouldn't it be nice to never have to worry about it again. Camel toes not only affect those in bikinis.  Look no further than the girl taking yoga, dancers,  gymnasts, even the every day girl in slacks or shorts.  
 
   No No Camel toe works for every lady out there. All us girls have been guilty of doing "the check" at least once in our lives. Let's stop pretending there is no problem and just eliminate it. We finally found the solution and No No Camel Toe really works!

Other Ways You Can Help

   If you don't have the money to purchase a perk or would find watching us any longer absolute torture, thats ok. But you might know someone who will somehow find us amusing and we could really use thier help. You can even help by sharing the knowledge that the cure is on its way. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to pass the word. Thank you for your time!

Camel Toes Out!

But you might know someone who will somehow find us amusing and we could really use thier help. You can even help by sharing the knowledge that the cure is on its way. Please use the Indiegogo share tools to pass the word. Thank you for your time!

Camel Toes Out!

story:
Forecheck is the most innovative new Search Engine Optimization (SEO) and Website Analysis tool on the market. It’s an award winning stand-alone program that can crawl and return a massive amount of data at lightning speed for sites of any size, including ones with over 2 million URLs! And the generation of reports is extremely easy, useful and adaptable for clients, webmasters, agencies, SEO experts, individuals and teams of any sort. 

This campaign includes licenses and more for Forecheck that you will get within 24 hours (valid for English and German versions) with a rebate of up to 65% compared to the official retail price after this campaign has finished. This campaign also includes additional perks for SEO and/or Usability Optimization services from one of the oldest and most experienced SEO agencies in the world at seriously reduced prices.
You can combine perks as you like (you must check them out separately) . We can also send you an invoice for all your perks.


We are proud to announce that Forecheck has been nominated for the Best SEO Tool at the US Search Awards 2014! Please help us in making Forecheck the Best SEO Software for your needs. We are a privately held company and we have worked in the SEO business since 1997. We have spent tens of thousands of hours in developing Forecheck, we have hundreds of ideas (see our feature plans), but we now need your help - our future clients and our supporters. Because with you we can make the software better. And getting help from our future clients is a much better solution for us than money from an investor.


With your help we want to speed up our developing efforts and we want to make Forecheck the best SEO solution on the market - together with you. We want your feedback, your ideas, your needs in terms of your website, your SEO efforts and your daily business. Be part of it now!

Here are some of the main features of Forecheck:  

  • Lightning-fast website crawler
  • Hundreds of SEO analyses and reports
  • Supports all languages, coding, HTML entities and fonts
  • Analyzes any domain whenever and how often you want
  • Creates all SEO reports on the fly
  • Exports all data to Excel or CSV files
  • Full text search within all data, also within all source codes of all pages
  • Analyzes domains with > 2 Mn URLs
  • Analyzes domains using up to 1,000 threads


We are a certified Google partner (details about us further down). In 2013, Forecheck won an innovation award in Germany. Additionally, Forecheck was shortlisted at the European Search Awards 2014 for the best SEO tool. We have achieved these awards with a beta version of Forecheck that hasn't been released until now!


Today, Forecheck is already a unique and outstanding website analysis tool, an SEO optimizer, link checker, website tester and much more. But we are still developing great features and expanding its potential.

Want to give it a try? Download the demo version (here is the link for the German version) right now and test it yourself! Or take a look at our short fact sheet. Start right away! Pledge your perk and you will get a license key within 24 hours for unlocking Forecheck to a full version (the license key will work with the English and the German version). Do you need an invoice for your pledge? Of course! You can request one after you have submitted your perk. We will send you a link to a page where you can define all of your details such as the company name, licensee name, etc.

Not an SEO expert? No problem! Forecheck is a tool for SEO experts but also for newbies, decision makers and website owners who aren't programming nerds. Forecheck will provide you with much needed help at any time, a knowledge base for better understanding and recommendation requests.  You will find many details about all of the features, functions and reports in the Help file. The complete Help file is also attached to the software as a PDF file, which can also be downloaded here.

Here is what users are already saying:

"As a very powerful tool, Forecheck is a useful aid that works reliably even with large projects. Forecheck has been a valuable tool for our store relaunch and continuous website analysis," says Christian Giersch from cancom. cancom is a leading IT retailer in Europe.


Many other companies already use Forecheck as part of our beta testing program or for projects.


Here is what Digital River says about us:

"Since 2002, we have closely worked with cyberpromote as a partner in digital marketing. The solutions have always been efficient, and the implementation always smooth and straightforward. cyberpromote has always understood how to adapt their services to the needs of the market and create important values for Digital River and our clients."
          Conny Seitz, Director Client Services and Development

Forecheck runs on any Windows version starting with Windows XP SP3, 32-Bit and 64-Bit. It also runs on Linux and Mac systems when a Windows emulator is used (such as Wine or Crossover). 


We also successfully tested Forecheck within a virtual machine of Windows. If you want to be sure, download Forecheck and try it. 

Here is a video introduction to Forecheck:

There are 4 different versions available for different needs, mainly depending on the size of a website and the number of projects that can be stored:


You can see more details on our website.

With Forecheck, a site analysis can last from mere minutes to a few hours for extremely large ones. An analysis can be stopped, paused or continued at any point. Reports can be generated immediately and adapted as desired!

Below is an example of the Benchmark Report that shows the most important results, in this case for an analysis of Google.com. This analysis took 45 minutes, about 450,000 URLs were found and 35,572 URLs were processed:

A unique feature offered by Forecheck can be seen below: The rule-based Duplicate Content analysis. It not only finds all cases of duplicate content, but also the robots information (robots.txt and Meta-Tag robots) is taken into account as well as canonical links. Based on 7 rules, every case of duplicate content is explained which greatly helps towards finding and resolving problems:

Another example of a very unique feature: The full Text Search function that searches all data. In the following example we searched for "indiegogo" within all pages of the Google.com analysis and found 3 results:

This search function allows you to search for the tracking code of a web analytics tool within all of the available source code so that you can check if the tracking code has been correctly implemented in all the pages. Or you can search for missing pictures for products within a Shop (since missing images in some shops don't create a 404 error message but rather show a template picture for which you can search).

Have to change a phone number on your website  and don't know where it is? Or an email address? Or perhaps you would like to search within the website of a competitor since you want to know if he is using your brand? These are just a few examples. The functions of Forecheck go far beyond SEO and enable many new possibilities for webmasters.

Another example: Google recently stated that redirects for mobile devices must lead to a corresponding mobile page. But how can you check that? This can easily be done with Forecheck! Forecheck is like a Swiss Army knife for everyone that deals with a website or is in the SEO business.

The list of features and analyzed data is long (see more details at the Forecheck web site), so in order to get a full impression of the functions, reports and available data, please try Forecheck yourself (here is the link to the German version).

The export functions (CSV or Excel) allow you to export what you see. If you want to export all of the raw data or the newly created report and its defined filters, go for it!

See the strange chars? Yes, Forecheck not only fully supports Unicode, it also converts all chars, all HTML entities and coding into the correct Unicode letters. And it does not matter if a website is written in UTF-8 or any other charset because Forecheck understands all of them!

Whether you can contribute or not, we would greatly appreciate your partnership in spreading the word and letting the world know about Forecheck by using the IndieGoGo share tools, blogging and so forth.

Have Thirst - Rank 1st

We know you have a hard job. We want to make it easier and more fun for you! With our FC Fan+ perk, you can get the limited edition of our original Munich Oktoberfest 1 liter beer mug and a Forecheck T-Shirt shipped to you! So watch out for the FC Fan+ perk, which is also included in some of the other perks! Sad but true: The mug comes without the Forecheck beer...

SEO Audit Perks

Some perks contain an SEO analysis and audit. Depending on the perk, it can be either a quick or deep SEO analysis for your website. We have performed such SEO analyses and website optimization for 17 years. A website analysis or audit is quite complex and contains many different aspects.

You can get more in-depth details about these services on our website. We can define upfront the parts of such an analysis as well as the effective date of an analysis. We are also able to send you a detailed offer and contract for this. Of course, Forecheck will be an important part of such an analysis, but there are additional factors which need to be analyzed such as backlinks, strategies, competitors, product feed optimization and much more. 

Please understand that within this campaign, you will receive an analysis much cheaper than the costs when normally combined with a Forecheck license. This is a special offer only for this campaign and won't be offered again! We have performed hundreds of analyses for numerous companies around the world, for example Digital River and their clients. Please contact us if you have questions, would like to define the details or receive a contract. Write an email to indiegogo@forecheck.com. We can also setup an individual perk just for your needs (including licenses and/or SEO or Usability services).

Usability Audit Perks

For several years we have also offered services for Usability Optimization. Options like heuristic analysis methods, A/B testing, user tests, eye-tracking and mouse-tracking simulation are extremely effective methods.

Eyequant, for example, is a unique technology that enables precise eye-tracking analysis with the Eyequant algorithms. Within seconds you get the results of an expensive eye-tracking analysis. Here is a sample of an optimization of a product page with the eyequant technology:
PDF File  or  Powerpoint File

Mouse tracking is another method that gives you detailed aggregated data of the user experience. As with the SEO audits, you can find more details on our website about these services. Write us upfront at indiegogo@forecheck.com to define the details or request a contract. 

What happens with your money?

First, you will get a license key for your pledge within 24 hours. You can start working with Forecheck right away when a Forecheck license is part of the perk. And what happens to your money? We will use it to add more features and functions as we stated in our plans for the future.  For this we want to hire at least one additional software developer to speed up the process. The more money we get, the more we can invest in more developers, the faster you will get more functions and features within the upcoming updates of Forecheck!

One important next step is the integration of keywords into every project/analysis. Keyword-related analysis and optimization potentialities are an important part. Additionally, a content optimization feature will be released within the next few months. 

If you pledge for an SEO and/or Usability audit, we will define the details and the schedule upfront or shortly after you have pledged.

But we also want to hear about your ideas and needs! You are not only a first mover by supporting Forecheck, you will also be a future user for generations (hopefully). 

We believe in a one-stop place for analyzing everything you need to make your website perfect. This may also include more usability analyses as well as  cooperation with other companies. But still, we want Forecheck to be the #1 solution for webmasters, SEOs and everyone who deals with websites and want to make them better. Better rankings in the search engines, better usability and no errors!

About us

We are a privately held company with offices in Munich, Germany (cyberpromote GmbH) and Wilmington, US (Forecheck LLC). Established in 1997, we were a pioneer in search engine optimization and search engine advertising. Later we added services around usability optimization and webanalytics. We started our business with the first SEO software tool in Germany called RankIt!! Later we began developing Forecheck as an in-house SEO solution since we couldn't find a software that met our needs.

We did hundreds of SEO and Usability projects with companies of different sizes and branches. Since 2002 we also served clients around the world through partners like Digital River. 

Help us and be part of the first movers that join our campaign. Stay ahead in the SEO business and share your opinions and ideas with us!

story:
The Where Clothes Story

Throughout my life, creating art in one form or another has been my driving force. In college, I fell in love with screen and block printing. While using these techniques to make t-shirts for bands and local events, it wasn't long before I became frustrated with the lack of environmentally sustainable fabric to print on. Intent on a more resourceful medium, I found an old sewing machine and taught myself how to use it. I began collecting vintage tablecloths, curtains, linens, and out of date clothing all headed for landfill. I gave these items a new purpose, first through printing and later through more nuanced reconstruction and design. These items became the original women’s wear line I dubbed Where Clothes in 2009.

My line helps renew some of the 90 million pounds of clothes that end up in landfills each year. The fashion industry is one of the world’s largest polluters, and uses the second largest amount of water compared with all industries. But as the climate changes, so too will trends. Where Clothes expects to lead others in distilling the concept of design to its creative element: to take what we already have and create something new. By basing all aspects of my line from my Vermont studio, Where also avoids outsourcing to other countries where unfair labor and dangerous working conditions are rampant.

Over 1200 Dead in Bangladesh Garment Factory Collapse. Photo from A.M. Ahad/Associated Press.

Where Now

After a positive response from the initial launch of Where Clothes, I have expanded my line to meet my customers' needs. With a professional lookbook, I can spread my market globally to places like Australia and South America, where the sustainable/ethical fashion movement is booming. I have many devoted partners signed on to help me achieve my goal; all that’s left is the funding...that’s where you come in!

The Where Clothes Workshop

Where Will the Funding Go?

I am in the midst of designing a collection composed entirely of upcycled and vintage fabric, including rare antique lace. This collection will be professionally photographed and made into a lookbook. I have the photographer, models, stylists, and the location lined up for the shoot. Your funding will help cover materials, modest travel expenses, compensation for those involved, and printing/mailing fees. Once we finish the lookbook, I will be able to vastly increase my market share by presenting my designs and vision to boutiques and editorials around the world.

Photo by Brandon LaLonde. Modeled by Juliana Foley.
 

Rewards

Photo Shoot Pins, Magnets and Mirrors ($10-$20)

Hand pressed pins, magnets, and mirrors, each with a unique image from a Where Clothes photoshoot.

Treasure Map Onesie or Kids Tee ($35)

Treasure Map Baby Onesie or Kids Tee, made from organic cotton and a hand drawn screen print. You choose the color and size.

Upcycled Vintage Leather Belt Pouch ($50)

Belt Pouch, made from upcycled vintage leather, embroidered/appliqued/beaded. Pouch has 2 belt loops on backside, allowing it to be hooked onto a belt, carried as a clutch, or used as a wallet or phone case. Women's, men's and unisex styles available.

Crop Top ($50)

Crop Top, made from vintage fabric. You choose the fabric option and size!

Antique Doliy Tee or Tank ($75)

Antique Doily Tee or Tank, made from upcycled jersey knit and an antique doily. You choose a color, size, and style!

Treasure Map Tee or Dress ($75)

Treasure Map Tee or Dress, made from upcycled jersey knit with a hand printed Treasure Island inspired map image. Hand dyed. Any color combination you can dream up is available! Glow-in-the-dark option.

Rugby Dress ($100)

Rugby Dress, made from vintage men's polo shirts. Each dress is one-of-a-kind! You choose the size, colors and patterns will vary depending on vintage shirts available.

Thank You!

Thanks to everyone who has looked at my page, donated, and spread the word. Your encouragement is greatly appreciated and essential to the growth of Where Clothes. Any support not only contributes to Where's growth, but also endorses ethics and sustainability in the fashion world.

Thank you also to Rebecca Kopycinski for filming, directing, and editing this video!

Thanks to Guitar for letting me use the beautiful song "Ayako" in the video. Check out more of his music at www.sunkiss.de/.

Thanks to Ash LaRose, Brandon LaLonde, and Brendan McInerney for the photos used on this site and on the button rewards. And to Deirdre Collins, Jacs Fishburne, Juliana Foley, Althea Freeman-Miller, Beth and Lawson Valyou, and Lucy Wild for modeling!

Belt Pouch, made from upcycled vintage leather, embroidered/appliqued/beaded. Pouch has 2 belt loops on backside, allowing it to be hooked onto a belt, carried as a clutch, or used as a wallet or phone case. Women's, men's and unisex styles available.
Crop Top ($50)

Crop Top, made from vintage fabric. You choose the fabric option and size!
Antique Doliy Tee or Tank ($75)

Antique Doily Tee or Tank, made from upcycled jersey knit and an antique doily. You choose a color, size, and style!
Treasure Map Tee or Dress ($75)

Treasure Map Tee or Dress, made from upcycled jersey knit with a hand printed Treasure Island inspired map image. Hand dyed. Any color combination you can dream up is available! Glow-in-the-dark option.
Rugby Dress ($100)

Rugby Dress, made from vintage men's polo shirts. Each dress is one-of-a-kind! You choose the size, colors and patterns will vary depending on vintage shirts available.
Thank You!
Thanks to everyone who has looked at my page, donated, and spread the word. Your encouragement is greatly appreciated and essential to the growth of Where Clothes. Any support not only contributes to Where's growth, but also endorses ethics and sustainability in the fashion world.
Thank you also to Rebecca Kopycinski for filming, directing, and editing this video!
Thanks to Guitar for letting me use the beautiful song "Ayako" in the video. Check out more of his music at www.sunkiss.de/.
Thanks to Ash LaRose, Brandon LaLonde, and Brendan McInerney for the photos used on this site and on the button rewards. And to Deirdre Collins, Jacs Fishburne, Juliana Foley, Althea Freeman-Miller, Beth and Lawson Valyou, and Lucy Wild for modeling!

story:
We are using Indiegogo.com as a platform to raise money for our website release fashion show is September during New York Fashion week. We need help providing our customers with the best and most efficent online boutique, getting a venue for our fashion show and model casting, products for our gift bags, and all of the backsatge production cost that creates a smooth fashion show. 

 

Help us launch ClosetHaven.com! ClosetHaven.com is a website where women can get inspired and obtain the fashion and style that touch the runways of New York, London, Milan and Paris. Women will be able to browse one of a kind hand picked fashion pieces, get introduced to up and coming designers, get involved with helping women in need and take a look inside the closet of fashion insiders.


Closet Haven is not just about Fashion. It's about inspiration! Women inspiring women. Whether it's a story about how a stylist struggled to become a well known figure in the industry, or about a young girl who was motivated by Closet Haven's makeover project, Closet Haven was made to help and inspire women all over the world!

 

Inside Haven Boutique;

Browse hand picked fashion pieces that are affordable and fashionable.

A Fresh Look into Designer Feature;

A platform for up and coming designers where designers feature their product and give the world a view behind the scenes in the life of the designer and collection.

What's going on?! Events;

Here you would find out about fashion shows, charity events, or seminars and events catered towards the mentorship of young woman with self esteem issues. In our Makeover project women and young girls will have the opportunity to receive free makeovers, a photoshoot and clothes. 

Blog;

Step inside the closet of fashion insiders. Here you will find blog entries about style and fashion from the closets of fashion insiders from across the world!

Bracelet RC21 Summary

Two years in the making--Patent Pending--Multiple Fashionable Designs

The RC21 Bracelet is GPS and 911 Emergency Ready!

This amazing bracelet was designed to protect women when they're most vulnerable--first dates, nightclubs, lounges, business travel, even those with active restraining order.  In over 95% of assault cases the cell phone was not accessible.  The RC21 Bracelet is the answer.

I have spent over 20 years in global marketing representing Fortune 500 companies and some of the most innovative entrepreneurial visionaries.  Moving over from marketing consultant to inventor has been a natural crossover due to our marketing expertise as micro-demographers studying female consumers.  Being able to bring the RC21 to market, with the help of designers in the UK and China, and to create a grassroots foundation with Indiegogo contributors--is an amazing opportunity and I thank each of you for considering being part of this exciting venture. 

The RC21 is the result of my 20 years as an expert  studying the woman consumer. Along with my best selling book, "The Theory of SWAG: A Young Woman's Guide to Success & Wealth", and now the RC21 Bracelet, are why we believe this will be a global success and want you part of our beginning.  My profile at LinkedIn establishes by business foundation www.linkedin.com/pub/robert-acosta/26/40a/b59/.

We are ready with the prototype and ask your financial support if possible, if not, your promotional support is extremely important.  The component is being designed to fit in a variety of bracelet styles as well as purse buckles, belt buckles, and broaches.

Please Register at our website so we can keep you updated and be part of our drawings for giveaways as we progress.  We also welcome your comments to post.  Thank you.        
                          -Robert Charles-

Funding & Perks

We only need $15,000 to complete the Prototype and have multiple options in bringing the RC21 to market which includes a major global beauty product brand and private equity investors.  If we raise more than our goal, we will focus on global distribution without private investors and maximize promotional visibility with our beauty brand interests.

The most exciting perk in our stable will be the RC21 itself with a variety of style bracelets being offered for sale to our contributors at a reduced price.  We will offer promotional perks exposing the brand and create a great email list inviting our supporters to major events that will support and protect women.  Our plans include Las Vegas locations to the Playboy Mansion to benefit charities that protect women.  Yes, we want your contribution but your support and your network of friends and family are valuable to push the RC21 to market.  

    The Impact

    • In 95% of assault cases on women the cell phone was not accessible. By creating the RC21 Bracelet in various fashionable styles from formal to casual, the safety feature will be easily accessible and send an immediate signal for help. 
    • Our designers have already designed the RC21 component to be placed on purse buckles, belt buckles, broaches and other ornamental accessories all serving one purpose to protect women.

    Risks & Challenges

    The challenges will be manufacturing and distribution options to ensure penetration of the American market holding to the most reasonable price so the average urban woman can afford the RC21.  We have options in the cost of jewelry casings with mold prices quite reasonable, so we anticipate the retail price under $65.  We do not anticipate great risks since the cell phone industry is well established across the U.S., and despite law enforcement's support of the RC21, we need to ensure that the response time to the RC21 signal is equal to a voice dialing 911.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    We recognize that not all of our supporters can contribute money.  As a marketing and PR specialist for over two decades, your voice to friends, relatives, social network reach, are equally valuable--so please, do not let money deter you from being part of the ground floor to this wonderful opportunity. Tell everyone you know to register at our website and be part of something amazing from day one.  We will be having drawings of people sharing their stories on "how they got the word out about the RC21".  Join us today!

We all need support and encouragement and what little you can do will go a long way. Help Diamond Lush make it to NY Fashion Week. It'll truly be a dream come true!

story:
Ben Appenheimer (aka- Benny Apples) is the kind of guy you want to be around. He's a caring, musical genius. (Ever seen him play stand-up bass like it ain't no thang?!)

He's one steady and reliable dude and a great friend. He's good at listening, and offers wise advice if he feels he has some to give.

Ben is The ultimate handyman, the guy you want to unclog your toilet, and the one with the least offense hair-do.

Ben is good at laughing at your jokes even if you're not funny.

Benny likes to spoil his wife and tends to work extra hard so she can buy jeans. But Ben needs some boots! And he needs your help!

It's Benny's birthday- let's band together and buy Benny some boots!

story:
As Seen In:




"When sun protection is this easy (and looks this good) there should be no more excuses. We’re hooked!"    - InStyle 

"The Endless Summer Scarf pulls quintuple duty: It can be worn as a scarf, shoulder wrap, hood, or skirt, plus it's made from a sun-protective fabric with a UPF 50+ rating."       -The Huffington Post


Our founder, Summer Kramer, was diagnosed with melanoma skin cancer at age 26.  If you or someone you know has been affected by cancer, then you know just how serious it can be.  But we're not here to look to the past, we're looking to the future.  And by joining our SPFy {Spiffy} Revolution, your contribution will help make a difference - in your own life, and in the lives of countless others - by getting amazing clothing and accessories for YOU and helping fund cancer research for ALL!!

Last year we introduced SummerSkin Sun-Protective Clothing with a successful crowd-funding campaign that raised over $15,000.  With those funds, we were able to launch our website and ramp up production of our 2013 line.  As part of our launch, in June of last year we hosted a benefit for the Skin Cancer Foundation at which we raised over $1,500 dollars for cancer research in just 3 hours!

This year, we're thinking BIG - with brand new styles for our line (above, scroll down for high res images) and bigger donations to the charities we support (below). To that end, we're adding men's and women's sunglasses, new hats, as well as additional patterns and styles to our line, and we want YOU to be the first to get your hands on them at A FRACTION OF THEIR RETAIL PRICE!!

There are multiple perks available ranging from $15 on up to whatever you're willing to contribute.  Each contribution level comes with an associated perk with savings amounting to roughly 50% off of our normal retail prices, so it essentially becomes a buy-one-get-one-free type of deal. 









ON TOP OF ALL THAT, we've designated the OHSU Knight Cancer Institute (named for Nike co-founder and philanthropist, Phil Knight and his wife Penny) as our beneficiary, to help fund their melanoma research program.  Initially, we'll be donating $1,000 for every $10,000 raised, but we're hoping to raise a lot more than that...

With your help, as the amount raised increases, so will the percentage that we donate, starting at 10% and increasing all the way up to 20%!!


Quick Links:  SPFy Revolution? |  Why SummerSkin? |  Our Beneficiary
OHSU Knight Cancer Institute  |  What You Get   |   Product Images



                          How SPFy are you?

You're probably well aware that SPF (Sun Protection Factor) is the rating that's applied to sunscreen. The higher the rating, the better your skin is protected from the sun's damaging UV rays.  With textiles, SPF becomes UPF, or Ultraviolet Protection Factor, and the same principle applies: the higher the rating, the better the sun protection.  A sunscreen of SPF 30 has essentially the same protection as a shirt with UPF of 30.

A standard white cotton t-shirt typically has a UPF rating of about 5.  Most people wouldn't bother slathering on a sunscreen with an SPF of only 5, in fact, most people typically use a sunscreen with an SPF of 30 or higher.  The Skin Cancer Foundation states that: "UV radiation causes up to 90 percent of the visible changes commonly attributed to aging, such as wrinkles, brown spots, and sagging skin."

Skin damage from the sun is cumulative over your lifetime, so we want to encourage you to be as SPFy as you can when you're outside in the sun. Wearing your SummerSkin will help protect your skin from wrinkles, premature aging, and most importantly, skin cancer.

How SPFy are you?



There are multiple perks available ranging from $15 on up to whatever you're willing to contribute.  Each contribution level comes with an associated perk with savings amounting to roughly 50% off of our normal retail prices, so it essentially becomes a buy-one-get-one-free type of deal.



Our video above might be a little silly, but skin cancer is no joke.  Skin Cancer is the most common type of cancer in the world, with over 3.5 million diagnoses every year, and increasing.  Furthermore, melanoma is one of the deadliest forms of skin cancer:

  • EVERY 8 MINUTES one American is diagnosed with melanoma.
  • EVERY HOUR melanoma takes a life.
  • Melanoma is the most common cancer for 25-29 year-olds.
  • 1 in 5 Americans will be diagnosed with skin cancer in their lifetime.
  • A person’s risk for melanoma doubles if he or she has had more than five sunburns.

We've spent years on fabric R&D and found the highest quality fabrics that provide unparalleled sun-protection with a luxurious feel, and no chemical treatments.  SummerSkin's goal is to provide you with fashionable sun-protective clothing, that doesn't announce to the world that "HEY, I'M WEARING SUN-PROTECTIVE CLOTHING!"

The UPF of fabric is affected by the thickness of the fabric, the tightness of the weave, and the color. The trick is to balance the sun-protective qualities with the comfort and style of the fabric.

SummerSkin garments have the highest UPF rating possible, UPF 50+, and are classified by the FTC as "excellent sun protection," blocking over 98% of UV rays.  We follow stringent industry guidelines and testing standards set forth by the American Society for Testing and Materials (ASTM), and the American Association of Textile Chemists and Colorists (AATCC).

Delicate fibers lend themselves well to blends for sun-protective clothing as they can be combined with other materials, such as cotton and spandex, to create a tightly woven fabric that is light-weight, breathable, and incredibly soft.  Our blends are composed of bamboo viscose, spandex, cotton and tencel to achieve the highest possible UPF rating, with inherent sun-protective qualities without chemical treatments.

Most of our competitor's lines focus on rash guards for swimming or bulky  cover-ups for your next safari exhibition,  but SummerSkin stands alone as a line exclusively devoted to comfortable, luxurious clothing - tops, dresses, pants, and versatile scarves - that hang beautifully and feel incredible, providing UPF 50+ sun-protection, without  sacrificing style.

Quick Links:  SPFy Revolution? |  Why SummerSkin? |  Our Beneficiary
OHSU Knight Cancer Institute  |  What You Get   |   Product Images


Oregon Health & Science University has revolutionized cancer treatment once; now they’re poised to do it again. This time, they’re taking on the biggest unmet need in cancer treatment: finding smarter, foolproof ways to detect cancer early. OHSU’s Knight Cancer Institute has launched an unprecedented
$1 BILLION EFFORT to transform early detection and save countless lives.




We encourage you to read about the Challenge issued to OHSU by Phil and Penny Knight and all of the amazing things that the OHSU Knight Cancer Institute is doing in the field of cancer research. 

For more information, please visit their website here.




Some people just can’t contribute, and we get that, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help in other ways.  Here are a few non-monetary ways you can help:

  • Share our campaign with your friends and relatives on social media!  We're giving away special prizes for the Top 10 people who's friends contribute the most to this campaign!

  • Link to this campaign on social media using hashtags like #SummerSkin, #SPFyRevolution, and #HowSPFyAreYou

  • Ask your favorite shops and boutiques in your area to carry SummerSkin!

story:
Help Nic Win His Gold Medal

Nicholas Lai-Cheong, a 24 year-old athlete from Whitby, Ontario, Canada is going to be winning a gold medal in the Olympics very soon…

Well, not until the Olympics hit RIO in 2016 and not without your help first!

Nic must be on a plane headed across the world by the end of August 2014, so that he will have time to train properly for twelve full months to reach his desired level of skill and qualify for the 2016 Olympics by winning 5 International Tournaments in 2015.

What we are going to do is help raise him a minimum of $20,000 over the next 60 days to help fund his living expenses while in Indonesia, the costs for his professional training and coach, as well as the expenses for the International Tournaments.

Nic's Story

Nic has been playing badminton for 7 years, 5 of which were spent playing professionally. Back in 2009, Nic lived in Indonesia and was training on a daily basis to become the best badminton player the world world has ever seen. He was able to complete one year’s training with many honours and successes from his fellow peers and coach, but had to come back home to Canada because he did not have enough funds to continue. Ever since coming back to Canada, he has been trying to get back to Indonesia and accomplish his goal.

He wrote the following to share his story:

Nicholas Alexander Lai-Cheong
Born: August 15, 1989
When I was a kid, I found that I was pretty decent at sports. I could throw a basket ball and once in a while it would go in. In hockey, I could maneuver and steal the puck from the opposing team with little effort. In high school, I even earned the nickname "Great Wall of China" for my defensive skills. Though I didn't pursue these sports, I was pretty good for a kid with no training. But this high opinion of myself changed when I was 16 years old in grade 11 gym class. This was when I first picked up a badminton racket and every time I swung it; I'd pull out my shoulder, every time I took a step, I'd sprain my ankle. Never in my life have I felt more defeated by anything. So I popped my shoulder back into place and said to myself, "No! I'm not going to let this game beat me!" This was because I didn't want something else tell me what I can and cannot do. Because, even though you may lose to your opponent, you can only be truly defeated by yourself.
It's funny though, that as soon as you mention you have a goal, everybody wants to put obstacles in front of it. As soon as I started training, I was met with nay-sayers saying things like, "You'll never beat him" or "You're not good enough". But I had already made up my mind and was determined to see it through until I had this game beat. I was determined to prove to them and to myself that it's not the most talented guy who wins or the guy with the most potential that wins. It's the guy with the most perseverance that wins!
Even after I hit my goals and sought after higher heights, I felt like people don't learn because no matter how good I got, they still said the same thing, "Nic, you're never going to make it", "it's impossible". So I made it a mission to shut these people up once and for all. I didn't want anybody to say things like that about me ever again or about anything ever again. At this point, I changed my goal from not just becoming good at this sport but to be the greatest of all time. This way, nobody will be able to say, "Nic can't beat this guy" or "He doesn't have what it takes". When you have a strong voice in your head screams to keep going, it makes it really hard to hear the whispers of weak minds.
Though the goal may be the same, my views about badminton have changed since then. It's no longer about having to prove to others or myself what I'm worth, no longer searching for approval from outside sources. Now, it's about realizing my maximum potential as a human being and honestly expressing myself through badminton. "It is like a finger pointing away to the moon. Don't concentrate on the finger or you will miss all that heavenly glory." (Bruce Lee: Enter the Dragon 1973). The "finger" in this case is winning, it's the fool's idea of glory. The "heavenly glory" is becoming better at the game day by day and becoming a better person in general. So now to me, badminton is a process of continuing growth. I plan to keep growing until I reach my ultimate goal; to be the greatest badminton player of all time.
How I plan on achieving this dream is to train in Indonesia for a few years straight to truly realize my maximum potential as a human being. Indonesia is well known in the badminton community as having among the strongest badminton players in history. So by training with some of their top players, I can then hone my own skills and put them to the test in local and international competitions. Come 2016, I will then be ready to put my skills on full display as I take on the champions of badminton across the world at the Rio 2016 Olympics.

What Your Donation Will Do

Nic has the skill and potential to win. All he needs is the financial support to allow him to do what he does best. Play badminton.

So far Nic has been able to save $3000 to cover his initial flight to Indonesia and was recently sponsored by Victor Badminton. However, he is still left with costs for his training, living expenses, transportation, and each competition he plays in will need funding for hotel, entry fees, and other miscellaneous costs at an average of $1000 a tournament. Nic must win 5 to qualify for the Olympics.

Due to time constraints and in order to maximize results, Nic in 2015 will compete in the following in order to qualify for the Olympics:

  • Malaysia Open

  • Singapore Open

  • Indonesia Open

  • U.S. or Canada Open (only one will be chosen)

  • PanAm Games (if on Canadian National Badminton Team)

  • All England Open

  • World Championships

You can visit www.bwfbadminton.org and look at their "Tournament Calendar" to view the list of current competitions for this year as a reference.

In order for him to accomplish his goal and stay independent, we need to raise Nic a minimum of $20,000. Anything over and above the desired goal will allow him to continue his training for longer.


How You Can Help

Please donate! Without your help, Nic cannot get the appropriate training, time, or even afford to get to the tournaments necessary to qualify for the Olympics. Everything counts and is greatly appreciated. Not to mention we have some great Badminton-themed perks!


The Perks

Thank You Package

Includes Novelty Bird and handwritten Thank You note.


Victor Brave Sword LYD


The BRAVE SWORD-LYD is specially designed for Olympic gold medalist Lee Yong Dae. The diamond shaped frame reduces drag and allows the racket head to cut through the air like a sword. This  results in a more agile frame. The inner wave structure further reinforces the racket frame for stability. The all new BRS-LYD is dedicated to Olympic Glory.


Victor Meteor X-80 


The MX-80 is a head heavy stiff racquet. This is a great racquet for people who have a big swing and are looking for control. Loads of technology in this frame makes it one of the most responsive racquets on the planet.


Unisex Polo Shirt

         


Equipped With:

Anti-Bacteria & Anti-Smell: The antibiotic and ordorless capabilities of VICTOR's fabrics restrain bacteria caused by perspiration that remains in the fabric, helping to reduce gamey smells for a more airy atmosphere.

Anti-Static: Antistatic technology intertwined in VICTOR's fabrics diminish static electricity in dry environments, making clothing less clingy with liberated movement.

Perfect-Dry: Perfect Dry fiber that will help you feel fresh and comfortable.  The structure of VICTOR's Perfect Dry fiber absorbs and transmits sweat from the core, dries fabric quickly, emits heat and takes in cooler outer air to keep skin dry.


Victor Track Suit

Jacket: 

Equipped With - Anti-Static: Antistatic technology intertwined in VICTOR's fabrics diminish static electricity in dry environments, making clothing less clingy with liberated movement.

Pants: 

Equipped With - Perfect-Dry: Perfect Dry fiber that will help you feel fresh and comfortable.  The structure of VICTOR's Perfect Dry fiber absorbs and transmits sweat from the core, dries fabric quickly, emits heat and takes in cooler outer air to keep skin dry.


 

Show Your Support

To help spread the word and make some noise about Nic's campaign, follow Nic on Twitter @NicLaiCheong and share this campaign via your favourite social media accounts!

Want more on Nic's journey? Just visit www.niclai.com for all the latest updates and follow-ups done while Nic is in Indonesia after this campaign is a success!


THANK YOU!
story_txt:
Help Nic Win His Gold MedalNicholas Lai-Cheong, a 24 year-old athlete from Whitby, Ontario, Canada is going to be winning a gold medal in the Olympics very soon…Well, not until the Olympics hit RIO in 2016 and not without your help first!Nic must be on a plane headed across the world by the end of August 2014, so that he will have time to train properly for twelve full months to reach his desired level of skill and qualify for the 2016 Olympics by winning 5 International Tournaments in 2015. What we are going to do is help raise him a minimum of $20,000 over the next 60 days to help fund his living expenses while in Indonesia, the costs for his professional training and coach, as well as the expenses for the International Tournaments.Nic's StoryNic has been playing badminton for 7 years, 5 of which were spent playing professionally. Back in 2009, Nic lived in Indonesia and was training on a daily basis to become the best badminton player the world world has ever seen. He was able to complete one year’s training with many honours and successes from his fellow peers and coach, but had to come back home to Canada because he did not have enough funds to continue. Ever since coming back to Canada, he has been trying to get back to Indonesia and accomplish his goal. He wrote the following to share his story:Nicholas Alexander Lai-Cheong  Born: August 15, 1989When I was a kid, I found that I was pretty decent at sports. I could throw a basket ball and once in a while it would go in. In hockey, I could maneuver and steal the puck from the opposing team with little effort. In high school, I even earned the nickname "Great Wall of China" for my defensive skills. Though I didn't pursue these sports, I was pretty good for a kid with no training. But this high opinion of myself changed when I was 16 years old in grade 11 gym class. This was when I first picked up a badminton racket and every time I swung it; I'd pull out my shoulder, every time I took a step, I'd sprain my ankle. Never in my life have I felt more defeated by anything. So I popped my shoulder back into place and said to myself, "No! I'm not going to let this game beat me!" This was because I didn't want something else tell me what I can and cannot do. Because, even though you may lose to your opponent, you can only be truly defeated by yourself.It's funny though, that as soon as you mention you have a goal, everybody wants to put obstacles in front of it. As soon as I started training, I was met with nay-sayers saying things like, "You'll never beat him" or "You're not good enough". But I had already made up my mind and was determined to see it through until I had this game beat. I was determined to prove to them and to myself that it's not the most talented guy who wins or the guy with the most potential that wins. It's the guy with the most perseverance that wins! Even after I hit my goals and sought after higher heights, I felt like people don't learn because no matter how good I got, they still said the same thing, "Nic, you're never going to make it", "it's impossible". So I made it a mission to shut these people up once and for all. I didn't want anybody to say things like that about me ever again or about anything ever again. At this point, I changed my goal from not just becoming good at this sport but to be the greatest of all time. This way, nobody will be able to say, "Nic can't beat this guy" or "He doesn't have what it takes". When you have a strong voice in your head screams to keep going, it makes it really hard to hear the whispers of weak minds.Though the goal may be the same, my views about badminton have changed since then. It's no longer about having to prove to others or myself what I'm worth, no longer searching for approval from outside sources. Now, it's about realizing my maximum potential as a human being and honestly expressing myself through badminton. "It is like a finger pointing away to the moon. Don't concentrate on the finger or you will miss all that heavenly glory." (Bruce Lee: Enter the Dragon 1973). The "finger" in this case is winning, it's the fool's idea of glory. The "heavenly glory" is becoming better at the game day by day and becoming a better person in general. So now to me, badminton is a process of continuing growth. I plan to keep growing until I reach my ultimate goal; to be the greatest badminton player of all time.How I plan on achieving this dream is to train in Indonesia for a few years straight to truly realize my maximum potential as a human being. Indonesia is well known in the badminton community as having among the strongest badminton players in history. So by training with some of their top players, I can then hone my own skills and put them to the test in local and international competitions. Come 2016, I will then be ready to put my skills on full display as I take on the champions of badminton across the world at the Rio 2016 Olympics.What Your Donation Will DoNic has the skill and potential to win. All he needs is the financial support to allow him to do what he does best. Play badminton. So far Nic has been able to save $3000 to cover his initial flight to Indonesia and was recently sponsored by Victor Badminton. However, he is still left with costs for his training, living expenses, transportation, and each competition he plays in will need funding for hotel, entry fees, and other miscellaneous costs at an average of $1000 a tournament. Nic must win 5 to qualify for the Olympics. Due to time constraints and in order to maximize results, Nic in 2015 will compete in the following in order to qualify for the Olympics:
Malaysia Open
Singapore Open
Indonesia Open
U.S. or Canada Open (only one will be chosen)
PanAm Games (if on Canadian National Badminton Team)
All England Open
World Championships
You can visit www.bwfbadminton.org and look at their "Tournament Calendar" to view the list of current competitions for this year as a reference. In order for him to accomplish his goal and stay independent, we need to raise Nic a minimum of $20,000. Anything over and above the desired goal will allow him to continue his training for longer.How You Can HelpPlease donate! Without your help, Nic cannot get the appropriate training, time, or even afford to get to the tournaments necessary to qualify for the Olympics. Everything counts and is greatly appreciated. Not to mention we have some great Badminton-themed perks!The PerksThank You PackageIncludes Novelty Bird and handwritten Thank You note.Victor Brave Sword LYDThe BRAVE SWORD-LYD is specially designed for Olympic gold medalist Lee Yong Dae. The diamond shaped frame reduces drag and allows the racket head to cut through the air like a sword. This  results in a more agile frame. The inner wave structure further reinforces the racket frame for stability. The all new BRS-LYD is dedicated to Olympic Glory.Victor Meteor X-80 The MX-80 is a head heavy stiff racquet. This is a great racquet for people who have a big swing and are looking for control. Loads of technology in this frame makes it one of the most responsive racquets on the planet.Unisex Polo Shirt         Equipped With:  Anti-Bacteria & Anti-Smell: The antibiotic and ordorless capabilities of VICTOR's fabrics restrain bacteria caused by perspiration that remains in the fabric, helping to reduce gamey smells for a more airy atmosphere.Anti-Static: Antistatic technology intertwined in VICTOR's fabrics diminish static electricity in dry environments, making clothing less clingy with liberated movement.Perfect-Dry: Perfect Dry fiber that will help you feel fresh and comfortable.  The structure of VICTOR's Perfect Dry fiber absorbs and transmits sweat from the core, dries fabric quickly, emits heat and takes in cooler outer air to keep skin dry.Victor Track SuitJacket: Equipped With - Anti-Static: Antistatic technology intertwined in VICTOR's fabrics diminish static electricity in dry environments, making clothing less clingy with liberated movement.Pants: Equipped With - Perfect-Dry: Perfect Dry fiber that will help you feel fresh and comfortable.  The structure of VICTOR's Perfect Dry fiber absorbs and transmits sweat from the core, dries fabric quickly, emits heat and takes in cooler outer air to keep skin dry. Show Your SupportTo help spread the word and make some noise about Nic's campaign, follow Nic on Twitter @NicLaiCheong and share this campaign via your favourite social media accounts!Want more on Nic's journey? story:
Vern Clothing is a socially conscious clothing brand that works directly with Guatemalan artisans to sell high quality handmade products in the United States. Vern Clothing works exclusively with weaving cooperatives, pays the weavers a fair wage, and donates ten percent of gross profits back to a non-profit in Guatemala that does community capacity building in economically struggling villages.


Matthew and I launched Vern Clothing after I spent two summers in Guatemala volunteering with a weaving cooperative and learning Spanish. After my first summer, I realized that these artisans with whom I was working were extremely skilled but their products were not reaching the US markets.


We founded Vern Clothing in order to design products that would connect the fashion conscious U.S consumer with Guatemalan artisans.  



Vern has had a lot of initial success. We’ve had over three thousand unique visitors to the site, an exciting number of sales, and we have four boutiques carrying our items with the Colgate University Bookstore soon becoming the fifth. We have received an encouraging amount of positive feedback and used the revenue that this success has generated to improve our products.  Our designs are tested and popular.  Our vision for Vern is to expand our retail and wholesale business.

We need your help now to start production of our newest items. We’ve launched this crowdfunding campaign to help pay for the initial deposit for production of our new collection of ties, bowties, scarves, and belts. 


What We Need & What You Get

  • We've spent months prototyping and improving these these products. Our products are high quality, handmade items from Guatemala that support the people who make them.
  • With four boutiques already carrying our sample items, and an astounding amount of positive feedback about our products, we are confident that they are high quality and popular with Americans and other Western markets.
  • For a 5 dollar contribution, you'll receive a handmade Guatemalan bracelet and for a 25 dollar donation, you'll receive a Bright Scarf, tie or a bow tie of your choice. 

The Impact

Vern Clothing was founded in order to improve the lives of Guatemalan artisans by providing them with a steady flow of income from their handicrafts. We work directly and exclucely with the weaving cooperatives producing our items, we pay the weavers a fair wage and donate ten percent of our proceeds to an NGO that does community capacity building in Guatemala. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can’t contribute? No problem! Help us out by:

  • Visiting us on Facebook and liking our page to keep updated on our progress
  • Follow us on Twitter or Instagram to keep in touch with the Vern Team!

story:
PLEASE HELP US TO RAISE FUND FOR ETOUNS CLOTHING LINE... THANKS

 

AIDEZ NOUS A LEVER DES FONDS POUR LA LIGNE DE VETEMENTS ETOUNS... MERCI

We're excited to introduce you to ETOUNS brand.

It's not just another clothing line, it’s an original, innovative and authentic brand. Something that you've never seen before.

We make T-shirts, polos, shirts and caps for men and women...

ETOUNS clothes are a state of mind, a way of life, a philosophy.

Providing something fresh and authentic that combines originality and imagination together.

A world of elegance exclusive for both women and men of today.

The brand ETOUNS is away from its immediate environment, it's replaced by visionary creations, especially the happy and pleasant thoughts, hopes and ambitions.

 
T-Shirt for women
 
 
Polo for women

 

 
Shirt for men
 
Shirt for women

 

 
Polo for men

 

Nous sommes heureux de vous présenter la marque ETOUNS.
ETOUNS est une marque originale, innovatrice et authentique. Une marque que vous n'avez jamais vu auparavant.
Nous faisons des T-shirts, des polos, des chemises et des casquettes pour hommes et femmes ...
Les vêtements ETOUNS sont avant tout un état d'esprit, une façon de vivre, une philosophie.
Nous avons l'intention d'offrir quelque chose de frais et d'authentique qui allie à la fois originalité et imagination.
Un monde d'élégance exclusif pour les femmes et les hommes d'aujourd'hui.
La marque ETOUNS est loin de son environnement immédiat, qu'elle remplace par des créations visionnaires, qui évoquent des pensées heureuses et agréables, d'espoirs et d'ambitions.

 
Polo homme
 
Polo femme

 

 
polo homme
 
 
T-shirt homme
Casquette

 

 
Polo for women

 

 

"Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful."  - Joshua J. Marine

So let’s all together overcome this one…
Thanks for your contribution, and we believe that together we can do it....
LET'S GO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

story:
CLUB DEGREE JEANS

Who We Are 
Club Degree is a socially conscious group of denim designers that aim to satisfy the need to mix style with social consciousness. 

Club Degree's Inspiration 
We embrace changes in fashion and outlook on life. What was socially unacceptable fifty years ago, like gay marriage, or even mixed marriages, is accepted as a part of life today in most places. There are times, however, when changes create conflict and some well meaning citizens are caught in the middle of a case of divided loyalty. Case in point, wearing jeans below the butt. Some well meaning kids want to keep up with the latest fashion trends but they are pulled in the other direction by others who believe that the style is obscene and degrading. What is a kid to do if he wants to fit in with his buddies but he also wants to please his parents? 

The Solution 
Club Degree has found the best solution. Meet Club Degree Jeans. It sits on the waist but looks like it falls under the butt! Crazy? Impossible? Not for the designers at Club Degree! Check out our before and after pictures: 


What Is So Special About Club Degree Jeans? 
Design 
Stand out from the crowd! Be in vogue and classy all at the same time. With our patented design, no other company has such a unique style. Turn heads wherever you go.

Quality Materials 
Club Degree Jeans are made from the best materials that stand out and gives the customer a rugged but high end look. The jeans look expensive but they go for under One hundred fifty bucks!

Comfort

It's the most comfortable pair of jeans you would ever wear! No need to be pulling up every two seconds, but still looking cool.

Built To Last 
Basketball court at 10am, skateboarding until noon, Jones beach at 3pm, the part-time job at Lenny's at 5, bowling at 11pm, DJ into the mornings.........and still standing. That's a pair of stylish Club Degree Jeans.

"Born In The USA" Baby! 

Every pair of Club Degree Jeans will be designed and tailored right here in the great U S of A ! Check the tag on the pair that you're in right now and see where it was made. Malaysia? Indonesia? India? Pakistan? 
Why the USA? Three words: Jobs! Jobs! Jobs! It' about time that these jobs return to the USA.

We intend to make it profitable to have our jeans made in the USA by selling directly to consumers through our own website and by selling at reduced wholesale prices to retailers.



Size and Colors 
Club Degree Jeans come in standard sizes starting from waist 28. Extra tall or wide? No worries. We got your size too. The colors range from faded for the park to dark blue for date night. 

Corporate Responsibility 
The Best Way To Teach is By Example 
We at Club Degree Jeans Aim to teach our youth that it is possible to be trendy and fashionable while remaining socially responsible. With privilege comes responsibility. 

Preserving The Environment 
Club Degree Jeans recycles all unused materials and there is no waste. Fabric cuttings accounts for most of our waste. This will be recycled to make greeting cards and accessories. Virtually nothing goes to a landfill. The use of fossil fuels and gas emissions is reduced since the jeans will be manufactured locally. 

How I Did It 
My Team Includes:   

· An experienced Apparel Consultant

· Pattern Makers from PA - Pattern Design Unlimited

· Fit Models who provide us fit feedback

· ICNYC - who works in video, package design, photography, branding and promoting                                                                                                    

· Legal and Financial Consultants

· PR Web – who will handle our press releases  

Reward Program / Photos

Preparing for Production 

As you can see from the video, photographs, prototypes are ready. We simply need funding to begin mass production. 

Your Support 
Your support for this project will begin a social revolution. The world will witness the marriage between style and social respectability. Here is your opportunity to contribute to our youth by teaching them how to stay in vogue with a sense of class. 

Why Indiegogo? 
Club Degree chose Indiegogo as a medium for launching our revolutionary product because that's what we have in common: a revolutionary way of thinking. We wanted to associate ourselves with a movement that used creative and innovate ways to help those who need financial support in pursuing a dream or in promoting an idea/concept. 

Closing 

Club Degree Jeans is an innovative attempt to merge style with social consciousness. It teaches our youth to maintain high standards without depriving them of their desire to be trendy and fashionable. Comfort, durability and quality are not compromised. Support this project if you support bringing jobs back to America, teaching youth by example, preserving the environment and Indiegogo's quest to finance projects that are creative and make a difference. Thank you for your support. 

The Club Degree Team

story:
Help fund our summer 2012 shirt collection.

When beginning Foster we had a simple goal; to create a business that is focused from the ground up on "doing the right thing". Everyday people are faced with making decisions both big and small that have an affect on those around them. Businesses are faced with these decisions as well; however, the choices made by businesses tend to have a much larger impact on not only people, but also the environment. 

Most businesses exist solely to make a profit. We have drawn inspiration from the few businesses and organizations that make an extended effort to do the right thing by focusing on fair labor standards, taking steps to be more sustainable or environmentally friendly, and donating a percentage of profit to charity. We've recognized that the next step is to build a business that can be trusted to live up to each of these and look good doing it. That is why we've created Foster.

Foster Apparel is brand which puts the well being of the world first in an effort to measure our success in much more than profit. We want to lead by example and prove it possible to put people and the environment first, while remaining successful as a business. To learn more about us visit Fosterapparel.com

How it Works...

1. Our products are manufactured in a socially responsible facility where all employees are treated fairly.

2. We utilize materials which are better for the environment such as organic cotton, bamboo, or hemp.

4. We devote an entire 50% of our profit to helping others through charitable projects and donations.

5. In order for our aid to be most effective, our customers choose the next cause to receive support from Foster through a voting process.

 

(In 2012 we will be supporting Adaptive Action Sports (AAS); a non-profit dedicated to helping those with permanent physical disabilities live beyond their limitations through action sports.)

(Remember this is a fundraiser. No money raised here will be donated. It will only be used to produce our summer 2012 collecion and to grow our business.)


          IF YOU ARE ORDERING A SHIRT OR

        MAKING A CONTRIBUTION (SEE BELOW)


1.)

               Choose a reward on the right side of this page

                            and enter your information.


2.)

                     If your reward is a shirt or hoodie:

       Click the "comments" tab at the top of this page and leave

        a comment containing your Shirt Size, Desired Logo, and

                                Color Choice (Below)

                      (example) Size L, Logo 1, Color A


HOW YOUR CONTRIBUTION HELPS...

 

We have set out all groundwork for this project. We have artwork, a screen printer, a manufacturer, and a small following of interested supporters. We've even landed a stockist in Philadelphia, PA for the summer 2012 season! (Community Bikes and Boards)

 

The next step is to put it into action. Your contribution will provide us with funds to print our summer 2012 run of tees (to be stocked in Community Bikes and sold at our online store). We believe the world needs more businesses like Foster. With your contribution we will be one step closer making that a reality.

As a perk to being a contributor, you will be able to choose your own logo and shirt color. Above are options for backer rewards tee shirts and hoodies. Items are made in the USA from 60% viscose hemp and 40% organic cotton. They will be printed simply with the FOSTER logo to help promote our brand.

 

( There are a limited number of items in certain sizes and colors. If the color or size you choose happens to be unavailable you will have the option of choosing a new color or waiting for the backorder to be shipped.)

Help fund our summer 2012 shirt collection.
When beginning Foster we had a simple goal; to create a business that is focused from the ground up on "doing the right thing". Everyday people are faced with making decisions both big and small that have an affect on those around them. Businesses are faced with these decisions as well; however, the choices made by businesses tend to have a much larger impact on not only people, but also the environment. 
Most businesses exist solely to make a profit. We have drawn inspiration from the few businesses and organizations that make an extended effort to do the right thing by focusing on fair labor standards, taking steps to be more sustainable or environmentally friendly, and donating a percentage of profit to charity. We've recognized that the next step is to build a business that can be trusted to live up to each of these and look good doing it. That is why we've created Foster.
Foster Apparel is brand which puts the well being of the world first in an effort to measure our success in much more than profit. story:
My Story

My name is Julie Phelps and I am a Toronto-based fashion redesigner of the clothing line JOOL. 

JOOL is a collection of vintage pieces carefully reclaimed and redesigned into modern and unique works of art. Every piece is different just like each one of us. My love of fashion, the earth, and my relentless creative streak, has led me down this path to reinvent fashion intended to inspire unique personal style. Through my eyes, the JOOL customer is an eco-vintage-fashionista with a modern flare. 

All JOOL pieces are sourced locally, redesigned, sewn, and distributed by me. Not only are most of my garments upcycled, a large majority of my notions/trims/thread, etc. have been donated or recycled as well. Nothing goes to waste!

After being accepted into FAT - ALTERNATIVE FASHION WEEK in Toronto, I decided to start this campaign to raise funds to support the production of my line and fees for the fashion show. This is an amazing opportunity to launch my clothing line into the fashion world and gain the exposure I need to take JOOL to the next level!

http://www.alternativefashionweek.com/


The Impact

I feel there is a growing need for environmental awareness and sustainability in many areas of life, including the fashion industry. With the popularity of vintage clothing and eco-friendly fabrics and practices, I feel JOOL has a definable place and consumer in the fashion world. The JOOL customer is looking to express individuality while also remaining eco-conscious about their clothing choices.

JOOL proves that you can be unique, eco-gorgeous, retro and fashion forward, all at the same time!!


What I Need 

With the money that is funded for my campaign, it will go towards the following:

$500 - entrance fee to show 10 outfits at FAT-Alternative Fashion Week
$500 - production of the 10 outfits
$300 - accessories
$200 - promotion materials: flyers, business cards, labels

If I don't receive the full funding amount for the show, the portion that is raised will go to the entrance fee. I will still go ahead with participating in FAT even if the full funding is not raised. I am busy with freelance work and also work p/t time. The money raised on IndieGoGo will definitely help considerably to make the show an even greater success!

 

What You Get

If you make a donation to my campaign, here are the perks you are offered:

$25 - JOOL Neckpiece made from upcycled T-shirts. Very chic and eco-friendly!
$50 - JOOL Neckpiece and a 50% off coupon for any JOOL Item. 
$100 - JOOL Neckpiece and a coupon for a FREE JOOL Item.
$250 - JOOL Neckpiece, a coupon for a FREE JOOL item, and one FREE complimentary Wardrobe Organization session. I will come to your home and organize your closests/dressers and offer style advice!

JOOL Neckpieces - these are examples only. These particular ones may not be in stock. However, I can make any colour your prefer!!








Other Ways You Can Help

Feel free to spread the word through email, Facebook, blogs or Twitter using the share tools above! 
My online shop http://www.jool.etsy.com/
Join my Facebook Fanpage under JOOL. 
Follow me on Twitter @Jule4Jool
See http://www.alternativefashionweek.com/ for more details/ticket info. for the show. 

I am also currently looking for unique stores/boutiques that would be interested in consigning or wholesaling my line. Feel free to contact me at www.joolclothing@yahoo.ca for inquiries! Thanks!

story:
Short Summary

When Fat Shark launched its HDO drone racing goggles earlier this year, many pilots were excited about the new OLED technology used in the headset. Others pointed out that they missed the ultra-wide field of view available in previous generation goggles.

So: we're firing up the old manufacturing line one last time to bring back the industry favorite HD2: Terminator Edition.

The HD2 features a 50° field of view, which is the widest field of view for any micro-display goggle on the market. The only drawback to that image is that it's so big that it's difficult to get fully in focus; many pilots report seeing blurry edges at the edges of their HD2 screens.

The HD2, like like HD3 and all goggles before it, also uses an LCD chip as its core display technology. So while the image may be bigger, it's less crisp and colorful than the OLED display in the HDO.

For those that don't care about those drawbacks, the HD2, Terminator Edition (T2) may be for you.

Like the HD2, the T2 has an identical, 50° field of view LCD screen. But the T2 has also been updated for the modern pilot. That includes:

  • An updated expansion bay for power-hungry modules like the Rapidfire
  • An updated DVR interface (just like the HDO) for better image capture
  • A USB-chargeable battery

The T2 also features special, limited edition branding.

How is This Different From The HDO?

Great question! The T2 has a wider field of view than the HDO but uses older imaging technology to create its image. In short, you'll see a slightly bigger image in the T2 that may be blurrier around the edges and that won't be as crisp and responsive as an image out of the HDO.

What We Need & What You Get

Each T2 goggle purchased in this campaign will be drop shipped directly to you from Hong Kong. We'll only do one production run based off of this campaign; after that, no more T2s will be built.

Tooling and parts have already been allocated from our suppliers. Fat Shark needs 45 days from the close of the campaign to fire up the production line, reprint packaging and sort out the shipping. After that, the T2 will once more return to obscurity.

All that we need from you is a minimum of 500 units ordered so we can justify the order to our factory. If retailer demand shows up, we'll also include a batch of retailer units in this production run.

Shipping to G7 countries is calculated at checkout but any duty and import taxes are your own responsibility. Please budget accordingly.

Risks & Challenges

The good news is that this isn't Fat Shark's first attempt at making drone goggles. We've got the suppliers, factory and infrastructure lined up. All that we need is market demand.

As with any consumer electronics product there is always a risk of delays at the factory or shipping-related challenges. But we'll do our best to deliver the product within a 45 day window of the campaign's close. And you can always reach us here, on Facebook or at support@fatshark.com to get a status update.

story:
Advance Apparel is dedicated in creating innovative garments that improve our every day's life. So navigation jacket would do just that when emergency arises, such as when one of your teammates got scramble in the area where there has not internet connection and desperately need help from one of your teammates. Navigation jacket can able to track them by using your mobile application and monitor their heartbeat so that your teammate will know whether you are safe or not.

Detail Specifications


  • Waterproof front-zip closure
  • Long sleeves with velcro cuff to adjust size
  • Water-repellent, windproof, breathable, keep warm
  • Embroidery logo on left chest
  • 100% Nylon taslon
  • 100% Polyester lining
  • Zip hand pockets
  • Detachable hood

Technologies

Imagine a hiking trip that takes days and weeks to travel in a remote area where it is no easy access to information and help from anyone other yourself and your teammates? The Navigation jacket would provides not only the comfortability but also the technologies you need to survive in a tough terrain in any given moment.



Three years warranty & Authorized repaired center

Garments that subscribed in our Indiegogo campaign will cover up to 3 years warranty and will repair any defect at free of charge.

FAQs

Does it work on cloudy days?
Yes! In addition to the solar power panel, Searcher jacket powered by 1.5V batteries for up to 3 to 6 months.

What sizes are available? 
Currently they are available in sizes M - L in Mens and Womens.

Are the jackets under warranty?
Yes there is a three year warranty.

Are they going to be machine washable or do they need to be dry-cleaned?
Suggest to be dry cleaned.

Do the jackets wrinkle when balled up?
We designed the jacket to travel with you anywhere -- on a long flight or packed in your backpack. The fabric is pliable and able to be squished and scrunched. 

Are the jackets waterproof?
Yes, they are waterproof. Jackets are best in the light rain or with melting snow while skiing or snowboarding. 

When do I choose my jacket color and size?
At the end of the campaign we will reach out to you where you will choose the color and size of the jacket you purchased.

How do I get in touch with your team?  
You can message us on here or email us at sales@aatechwear.com.

I would like a refund. How do I do this?
Contact us at: sales@aattechwear.com

For other products, please visit us at

www.aatechwear.com
