story:
Woodies started because standard sizing doesn't make sense like it used to. Getting perfect fitting clothes, made especially for you has never been easier and more accessible.

We recently introduced incredible 3D measuring technology that makes getting your measurements easier than ever, and now, we're excited to launch chinos!

Not savvy with a tape measure? Our guess is probably not. To this point, getting custom clothing meant taking your own measurements (a daunting task), but fear no more!

We partnered with a team of engineers and scientists to solve this problem. After studying thousands of body measurements, and millions of data points we've come up with a super accurate and easy way to get measurements. With as little as your height, weight and shirt size we can build a 3D model of you and extract all your measurements (in seconds). Take a look here.

 Infuse your personal style into these pants. Unsure on the ideal combo of customizations? We're more than happy to help! 

We are proud to offer our loyal backers wholesale pricing on chinos. Because we sell directly to you, there are no retail markups. We uphold an incredible standard of quality and sell our chinos at a fair price. 

We started Woodies just over 2.5 years ago. We had a simple vision... To give guys perfect fitting shirts at a price within reach. With that vision we launched our first campaign.

We've stayed bootstrapped and have grown steadily, holding fast to outstanding quality and amazing customer service (check the reviews). 

Looking for a great shirt? Head on over to www.woodiesclo.com.

 

Risks and challenges

We believe in complete transparency and in open communication with our backers.

We have some experience under our belt and we are confident that we can live up to the timeline that we've posted. We work with an experienced team of tailors and manufacturers who have been making some of the best chinos for reputable brand names.

However, unforeseen delays in production may arise, but we will deliver 100% on our product.

story:
Timelessness infused with casual Southern California sophistication comprises the essence of the Esquivel brand — luxury for everyday wear. Creating each piece individually allows for unique, one-of-a-kind styles to exude elegance and quiet sensibility that lives through generations. The art of handcrafting with leathers sourced from the finest tanneries in the world is not something that is taken lightly.

Esquivel is more than a name — it is over two decades of refined finesse crafted into each product. Every piece tells the story of a commitment to artistry that allows Esquivel to always transcend fashion traditions and reinvent the aesthetic for the current wardrobe. Gorgeous lines and polished textures confidently carry clients throughout their day; Esquivel not only represents style — it represents effortless beauty and allure.

 

 

Child hunger is a cause very close to my heart, so I designed a bag to give back.

It brings me joy to say each X tote is handcrafted here in Southern California, providing jobs to our community and hope to those we help feed.

When you buy an X tote, you can be sure it was crafted by a team of highly qualified craftsmen. Made with hand-cut canvas and leather, each bag is produced with utmost care, stitched with an experienced, keen eye, and delivered with a promise of satisfaction.

The process is simple: every bag bought will be a hungry family helped. You can proudly carry your tote knowing you've crossed out a year's worth of hungry weekends for a grateful family.

And thanks to the bag's signature Esquivel "X", everyone else will know it, too.

Read more about the logistics for helping hungry families in the "Giving Children Hope: Doing Our Part" section.

 

George Esquivel is a designer and craftsman based in Southern California, but his designs can be seen in worldwide boutiques — as well as on notable celebrities clients, such as Emma Stone, LeBron James, Madonna, Gwen Stefani, Elon Musk and Brad Pitt.

Primarily a shoemaker, George has satisfied personal clients and select retailers for over two decades, proof of which can be seen in Vogue, Forbes, Haute Living, and The Los Angeles Times.

George weaves his passion for quality and durability into every piece of his work — and each piece tells its own, unique story.

George operates out of an atelier in Orange County, California, working with the finest tanneries in the world and producing limited amounts of all of his designs to ensure quality.

As a very hands-on kind of guy, he couldn't be more excited to be a part of the process of developing your personal X Tote.

 

George was raised primarily in poverty. His mother worked as a cleaning lady and took many odd jobs to support him and his 4 siblings while his father was unreliable, in and out of jail, dealing drugs, and addicted to drugs. To put it simply, food was scarce; his mother would sometimes take food donations from people who hired her, but the quality of this charity was often subpar — and if George's father were to come home high, he was known to scourge what little food there was for his own, selfish benefit.

With the basic human necessity of food not always a certainty, George remembers feeling bitter and resentful towards people just because they were eating. After spending his entire childhood watching his mother struggle to feed him, he is now determined to relieve stress from low-income families currently experiencing the same kind of daily pain. 

In his own words: “I’ve been blessed enough now. It’s my duty to give back.”

 

Giving Children Hope is a local California organization dedicated to serving vulnerable children and families. GCH also helps around the world and recently sent 80,242 pounds of relief supplies for Hurricane Harvey, 34,919 pounds of relief supplies for Hurricanes Irma and Maria, and 38,446 pounds of relief supplies to Mexico after the earthquake. GCH has a perfect four-star rating on Charity Navigator. As a former homeless child, George is thrilled to partner with GCH’s “We’ve Got Your Back” program, which donates backpacks full of food to homeless kids in Orange County. 

Each child in the “We’ve Got Your Back” program is given enough food to last 3-4 family members through the weekend, when the children do not have access to free and reduced lunches at school. The program has been active and successfully feeding over 4,000 individuals for 10 years.

Each X Tote sale will mean 56 of these backpacks full of food; in other words, each tote is over a year’s worth of weekend meals for a needy family.

These 56 weekends of food can happen thanks to a 10% donation from each X Tote sale. It's George's sole mission to make sure everything from his workshop is built to his top-shelf standard, and because each X Tote will be crafted with the same care and excellence as any other haute Esquivel product, the same overhead and production costs will apply.

So, as of now, each X Tote is helping ONE family for a year. But, with your help, we can donate even more! More X Tote sales means more of a percentage to charity, as seen below. After all, 56 weeks is a good amount of food – but we can always do better, together.

 

Your gift gets doubled - the X Tote is the gift that gives back to people in need. It's the perfect gift for the holidays! If you order as a gift, please contact us at info@esquivelshoes.com to let us know where to send it when ready. We will also send you a link to a card you can send recipients for the holidays informing them of your generous gift!

 

HOLIDAY PURCHASE: If you ordered this as a gift, please contact us at info@esquivelshoes.com. to let us know where to send it when ready. We will also send you a link to a card you can send recipients for the holidays informing them of your generous gift! Thank you.

 

 

Risks and challenges

We’re a team that has been making bags and shoes since 2001; this is not our first rodeo. We’ve already lined up our supply chain and produced a sample run. Estimated delivery is March 2018, but depending on the demand of the product the delivery date will vary.
story_txt: Timelessness infused with casual Southern California sophistication comprises the essence of the Esquivel brand — luxury for everyday wear. Creating each piece individually allows for unique, one-of-a-kind styles to exude elegance and quiet sensibility that lives through generations. The art of handcrafting with leathers sourced from the finest tanneries in the world is not something that is taken lightly.Esquivel is more than a name — it is over two decades of refined finesse crafted into each product. Every piece tells the story of a commitment to artistry that allows Esquivel to always transcend fashion traditions and reinvent the aesthetic for the current wardrobe. Gorgeous lines and polished textures confidently carry clients throughout their day; Esquivel not only represents style — it represents effortless beauty and allure.  Child hunger is a cause very close to my heart, so I designed a bag to give back.It brings me joy to say each X tote is handcrafted here in Southern California, providing jobs to our community and hope to those we help feed.When you buy an X tote, you can be sure it was crafted by a team of highly qualified craftsmen. Made with hand-cut canvas and leather, each bag is produced with utmost care, stitched with an experienced, keen eye, and delivered with a promise of satisfaction.The process is simple: every bag bought will be a hungry family helped. You can proudly carry your tote knowing you've crossed out a year's worth of hungry weekends for a grateful family.And thanks to the bag's signature Esquivel "X", everyone else will know it, too.Read more about the logistics for helping hungry families in the "Giving Children Hope: Doing Our Part" section. George Esquivel is a designer and craftsman based in Southern California, but his designs can be seen in worldwide boutiques — as well as on notable celebrities clients, such as Emma Stone, LeBron James, Madonna, Gwen Stefani, Elon Musk and Brad Pitt.Primarily a shoemaker, George has satisfied personal clients and select retailers for over two decades, proof of which can be seen in Vogue, Forbes, Haute Living, and The Los Angeles Times.George weaves his passion for quality and durability into every piece of his work — and each piece tells its own, unique story.George operates out of an atelier in Orange County, California, working with the finest tanneries in the world and producing limited amounts of all of his designs to ensure quality.As a very hands-on kind of guy, he couldn't be more excited to be a part of the process of developing your personal X Tote. George was raised primarily in poverty. His mother worked as a cleaning lady and took many odd jobs to support him and his 4 siblings while his father was unreliable, in and out of jail, dealing drugs, and addicted to drugs. To put it simply, food was scarce; his mother would sometimes take food donations from people who hired her, but the quality of this charity was often subpar — and if George's father were to come home high, he was known to scourge what little food there was for his own, selfish benefit.With the basic human necessity of food not always a certainty, George remembers feeling bitter and resentful towards people just because they were eating. After spending his entire childhood watching his mother struggle to feed him, he is now determined to relieve stress from low-income families currently experiencing the same kind of daily pain. In his own words: “I’ve been blessed enough now. It’s my duty to give back.” Giving Children Hope is a local California organization dedicated to serving vulnerable children and families. GCH also helps around the world and recently sent 80,242 pounds of relief supplies for Hurricane Harvey, 34,919 pounds of relief supplies for Hurricanes Irma and Maria, and 38,446 pounds of relief supplies to Mexico after the earthquake. GCH has a perfect four-star rating on Charity Navigator. As a former homeless child, George is thrilled to partner with GCH’s “We’ve Got Your Back” program, which donates backpacks full of food to homeless kids in Orange County. Each child in the “We’ve Got Your Back” program is given enough food to last 3-4 family members through the weekend, when the children do not have access to free and reduced lunches at school. The program has been active and successfully feeding over 4,000 individuals for 10 years.Each X Tote sale will mean 56 of these backpacks full of food; in other words, each tote is over a year’s worth of weekend meals for a needy family.These 56 weekends of food can happen thanks to a 10% donation from each X Tote sale. It's George's sole mission to make sure everything from his workshop is built to his top-shelf standard, and because each X Tote will be crafted with the same care and excellence as any other haute Esquivel product, the same overhead and production costs will apply.So, as of now, each X Tote is helping ONE family for a year. But, with your help, we can donate even more! More X Tote sales means more of a percentage to charity, as seen below. After all, 56 weeks is a good amount of food – but we can always do better, together. Your gift gets doubled - the X Tote is the gift that gives back to people in need. It's the perfect gift for the holidays! If you order as a gift, please contact us at info@esquivelshoes.com to let us know where to send it when ready. We will also send you a link to a card you can send recipients for the holidays informing them of your generous gift! HOLIDAY PURCHASE: If you ordered this as a gift, please contact us at info@esquivelshoes.com. to let us know where to send it when ready. We will also send you a link to a card you can send recipients for the holidays informing them of your generous gift! Thank you.  Risks and challengesWe’re a team that has been making bags and shoes since 2001; this is not our first rodeo. We’ve already lined up our supply chain and produced a sample run. Estimated delivery is March 2018, but depending on the demand of the product the delivery date will vary.

story:
What is Dropmake?

Dropmake is the first system for create 3D labels that can be placed everywhere.  In a few minutes without having to handle any chemical you can create attractive, durable labels in 3D.

Every Dropmake Kits contain:




Easy, clean and faster

In each unit have everything you need to print and create 3D labels. No need to make mixtures of chemicals or waiting for hours to see your finished tags. In just seconds you will see the result and put them anywhere. 


Are resistant to rain, they adhere to metal and plastic, you can create perfect keychains and talk to everyone who sees your tag with our smarttags.

Every idea has a special size

There's no big o small project you can't do with Dropmake. The Box Kit and Envelope Kit contains all the materials needed to develop and customize your designs.

Box Kit

Envelope Kit

          



How it works?

Design

To create your own designs with Dropmake you can do it with our outlines for design programs or with Dropmake App*. 

Whatever you choose always will design the best way:

  • Download Outlines for Mac® & Pc
  • Download our selection of thousands templates, frames and backgrounds
  • Design with the Dropmake App

 *Dropmake App need your support to be available.


Print

When you finish your design, place the Dropmake sticker sheets on your printer to get a perfect result. 

Support for print on dropmake.com


Create

Put the clear dome sticker on your printed designs and in a few minutes you will create a 3D label with Dropmake. Choose your favorite finish and the shape that best highlight your work. You have 5 shapes in many sizes availables,17 models in total!

LOOK ALL >>

LOOK ALL >>

LOOK ALL >>

LOOK ALL >>

LOOK ALL >>

LOOK ALL >>

LOOK ALL >>


Web

Visit www.dropmake.com for see all models and including in kits.




Why Dropmake?


Dropmake team consists of people who are dedicated to the world of graphic arts, who have developed a labeling system with a professional finish for our clients and personal work.

The DIY kits domed labels available in the market are complicated, you have to handle chemicals and if you follow all the steps, you do not ensure that the end result looks like desired.

Dropmake is easy to use and excellent end result makes it a very useful tool for all types of people, as it adapts to any project.

These are the reasons that lead us to want to share our unique 3D labeling. When you see it for the first time, you will have more ideas to use it. Go make!


Objectives

The funds raised in the campaign made the molds, dies, packaging, distribution and technical improvements in the production process.

The ultimate goal is Dropmake App!
An application that lets you design and print your labels from Dropmake.com


Your Support

If you want to collaborate with dropmake, you can purchase the badget that best suits your projects. But you can also help more people know by sending us a tweet to support our 

hagstag #suportdropmake.



FAQ

Works on any computer?
Yes, you can use your usual design programs to suit Dropmake. No matter if you use PC or Mac.

I need a specific program to use?
No. You can design your labels in your usual program design, using the downloadable outlines of Dropmake. With the support received indiegogo create Dropmake App from which you can make your 3D labels directly .

What is the difference between the Envelope Kit and Box Kit?
The only difference is the size of your projects. If you want to use Dropmake with a small project, select Envelope Kit check as enhance your designs. But if your project requires more elements label, select Box Kit and stock up on all 3D labels you need.

They are resistant to the outside 3D ​​labels?
Yes! Dropmake is resistant to water, heat, wind , ... Where to put your Dropmake will stay until whenever you want !

I can use my normal printer to Dropmake?
Yes. The standard size sheets Dropmake make it compatible with all types of printers,laser print or inkjet print. Just adjust the tray to the sheet size and the printer does the rest.


CONTACT

www.dropmake.com

hello@dropmake.com


Thanks for watching!

story:
Announcement: To end our campaign, we are offering the opportunity to buy a timeless piece of art created by Austin artists.  The artists used our rucksacks as their canvas to create these amazing bags.  There has never and will never be another bag like it.  Profits go to the artist for their work.  

Artists have been a part of the ReCREATE ATX, HOPE, Empty Kingdom, and Underground Connections.  They are also designers and creators of SprATX clothing, http://spratx.com/.

Perk Name: ReCREATE

Perk Name: SXS

Perk Name: Mouf



EbenGroup is a social company that designs durable rucksacks. For every rucksack sold, a bag full of school supplies is donated.


Hello There,

Fancy seeing you here. What it do? We are glad you decided to stop by. We are EbenGroup, and it's nice to meet you.

We want to break a world record and solve a social issue at the same time. And we want to do it in Cambodia in the Fall of 2014 by delivering the most amount of school supplies in a 24 hour period! And the sweetest part about that is, you're coming with us! We want you to see the difference you make. If you donate $5,000-$10,000, we are taking you on a 10-day trip to change the world and make history. This donation covers the cost of your airfare, living expenses, activities, and a survival EbenPak.

If you are thinking, whoa, you haven't even taken me to dinner yet? Here's a little more about us.  We are a group of individuals who believe that business can be used as a vehicle to break poverty cycles and restore nations. Our concept is simple: We make high-quality rucksacks. For every rucksack sold, we donate a sister rucksack full of school supplies to a child in need. In addition, we allocate 10% of our profits to help children gain access to education.

We also believe in providing our partners (that's you) with the highest quality rucksacks. The way we see it, if you can depend on our bag, you can depend on us to fulfill our mission.

Just like no man is an island, neither is a company. We need YOU to reach thousands of children and change lives. It is our hope that when you decide to join us, you will become more than just a customer. We are seeking partners.

                   

Make no mistake; it is our goal to win you over. We want to tell you success stories, take you with us to deliver school supplies, show you the true impact your contributions have on the millions of children who are being denied access to an education. Most of all we want you to be the voice of EbenGroup. After all, you are probably better at telling stories than we are.

We don't know who you are, where you are from or how you take your coffee, but we do know that your compassion for others very much mirrors ours. And for that, we believe that we can call you partners and friends. Your support is more than just financial for us. 

Anyone can cut a check. We need you, the original EbenGroupies, to help us spread the word. So come, join us, and help us carry the movement.

Working on your behalf,

Emily Whitson

Check Out The EbenPak

At EbenGroup, we believe in providing the best. This is a bag that you can travel the world with, take to school, the beach or even to your local coffee shop. Each EbenPak is made out of 18oz canvas and genuine leather with brass hardware, making it a fashionable option for a durable bag. The interior is fully lined and has an open laptop sleeve that will fit a 17-inch laptop. The back of the rucksack is padded and the straps are made from tubular webbing for added comfort. Each rucksack features a map stitched on the inside flap to signify the destination of your sister bag. Whether you’re going around the world or around the corner, carry the movement (and your things) with an EbenPak.




The Founding of EbenGroup: Rock of Help

In 2009, Emily Whitson spent a summer in Ethiopia serving disadvantaged youth struggling to obtain the simplest of truths – an education. The strife of the students resonated deeply with the visiting American and upon her return stateside, she embarked on a journey that would become a movement beyond her personal moralities to connect peoples, countries, artists, and activists to move as one towards the aid of students fraught with difficulties in war-torn third world countries.

“When I returned home, I knew I wanted to maintain the relationships I made with the schools and the kids in Africa,” recalled Emily Whitson. “I decided I wanted to help them with some of their educational needs in any way that I could.”

Being a college student at the time and studying Entrepreneurship, Emily parlayed her business learning into a working concept and founded *Ebenezer Group (EbenGroup). The premise was basic: create a product that beneficially impacts the world.The answer was as simple as the product is basic. A rucksack. “I was searching for one for my own travels- something durable that would stand up in the harshest of environments,” said Emily. “After we nailed the product, everything else just fell into place.”

For every rucksack, or EbenPak, that EbenGroup sells they give one away stocked full of school supplies to a student in need. In addition to the school supplies, EbenGroup donates 10% of their profits to help build schools in developing countries.

A year after EbenGroup’s inception, Emily added two more team members, Yohanna Tamez and Candace McCreary. “The company’s needs were expanding and I just got so lucky to be able to add Yohanna and Candace to the team,” added Emily. “Both bring such exceptional apparel design talents and business acumen. But most of all, they embrace the shared mission of EbenGroup – to serve these kids through education.”

*Ebenezer Group, LLC (dba EbenGroup), is a design company headquartered in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. Profits are used to help children gain access to education and educational supplies in developing countries ravaged by war. EbenGroup's products are made with the highest quality of materials and are designed to last a lifetime. To find out more about EbenGroup connect with the company online via their website: www.ebengroup.com.

Carry the Movement.

story: The Jacket you'll need all year around EVERYTIME you fly at 35,000 feet!
story_txt:
The Jacket you'll need all year around EVERYTIME you fly at 35,000 feet!

How to get your BauBax?
1. Back this project.2. Click on the Perk you want and enter your payment information.3. You will then receive a survey via email 3 days from your pledge asking you for your jacket preference and shipping details.4. Once the survey is submitted to us, the jacket will be shipped to you within 2 weeks!

List of Features:NECK PILLOW:
Built-in Inflatable Neck Pillow that easily hides inside the hood of the jacket. Innovative valve technology allows 2 SECOND INFLATION.
Simple and easy - ONE PRESS DEFLATION:
 
EYE MASK:
Always have an eye mask when you need it. Travel eye mask built inside the hood.
 
GLOVES:
Built-in gloves that easily slide in and out of the sleeves, to keep you warm and cozy when you're on the go.
 
EARPHONE HOLDERS:
Built-in Earphone holders always keep your earphones untangled and ready for instant use.
 
BLANKET POCKET:
All BauBax jackets come with a pocket to carry the proprietary BauBax Blanket that'll keep you warm and cozy when you're traveling. BauBax Blanket is sold separately. 
 
KOOZIE DRINK POCKET:
No more fumbling with your Drink and your Laptop on a plane table tray. With our insulated neoprene Koozie Drink Pocket, keep your hot drinks warm, cold drinks cool and your hands free for work.
 
TABLET POCKET:
A 10 inch pocket to carry an iPad or any full size tablet to free up space in your carry-on or purse and for more convenient plane boarding.

ZIPPER = TELESCOPING PEN:

Your zipper is now smart, useful and social. It's a 1 inch pen that extends to 4 inches - great way to make new friends.
 
ZIPPER = STYLUS:
The bottom of the telescoping pen has a soft tip Stylus to ensure you always have a Stylus handy.
 
SMARTPHONE POCKET:
Easily accessible Smartphone pocket that offers a seamless connection to your earphones.
 
SUNGLASS POCKET:
Easily accessible sunglass holder in a pocket to keep your sunglasses safe and handy.
 
MICROFIBER CLOTH:
Built-in Microfiber cloth for cleaning sunglass lenses.
 
PASSPORT POCKET:
Passport size chest pocket designed for quick access to boarding pass and ID while traveling.
 
HAND WARMING POCKETS:
Multi-layered hand warming pockets for extra warmth.
 
 DETACHABLE PILLOW:

All 4 BauBax Jackets come with a detachable pillow - You would agree that your sleeping postures are different on airplane's Aisle seats vs Window seats (because of the wall support). Hence, a detachable pillow that is useful for different sleeping postures while traveling.
 
DETACHABLE HOOD:
BauBax Bomber and Blazer come with a detachable hood. 
 
The hood of the Wrinkle Free Blazer can be quickly detached to turn it into a Business Jacket, making it a professional Suit.
 
SUPREME QUALITY FABRIC:
We have identified and secured the best quality fabric manufacturers who are suppliers to the world's top apparel brands.

Choose your color and size
FABRIC DETAILS: 60% Cotton, 40% Polyester. Machine washable.
SIZING CHART: (IN INCHES)

FABRIC DETAILS: 100% Polyester, with water-repellent coating. (it’s not waterproof , it’s water-repellent). It'll come in handy for sudden light rain. Machine washable.
SIZING CHART: (IN INCHES)


FABRIC DETAILS:  100% polyester Soft Shell fabric with a smooth outer surface that easily slides away snow. Machine washable.SIZING CHART: (IN INCHES)

FABRIC DETAILS:  70% Polyester, 30% Rayon. Fabric treated with wrinkle-free solution. Requires professional dry cleaning.SIZING CHART: (IN INCHES)
 
  
About Us
BauBax came into existence by husband and wife team, Hiral Sanghavi and Yoganshi Sanghavi.  Traveling for work and leisure Hiral purchased over 9 travel pillows in less than 3 months’ time. Yoganshi, the lead designer, invented the jacket + travel organizer now branded as BauBax. The only problem here wasn't just the pillow!
Powered by this original idea, Hiral and Yoganshi, sat down together and brain-stormed their way to a travel jacket which had multiple features and which addressed a lot of inconveniences that travelers faced.
Thank you!
We want to extend a sincere “Thank you!” to our previous backers and return customers.  Without your support, we would not be where we are today.  Because of the foundation you helped us build, we are able to become a small company who cares about their customers.  We started out as a joint venture between two people and have grown a team of 15 employees. Our backers stood by us as we weathered through our rapid growth and provided us with valuable feedback that we welcomed.  We get better each day because of supporters like you.
 
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQs)
INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING:
We offer worldwide shipping (except Myanmar) to our International Backers. International shipments may be subject to import taxes, duties and customs fees, which are levied once your package reaches the country of destination, and are the responsibility of the recipient.  
EXCHANGE POLICY:
If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then the jackets shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your jackets for any reason, we’ll happily do that but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our jackets at highly discounted prices, we won’t be able to accept returns. Please make sure the items are unworn and unwashed. Also, all items must be in the condition you received them with all hangtags still attached. 
We accept exchanges up to 30 days of you receiving the jacket(s).
All exchanges must have an RMA (Return Merchandise Authorization).  Shipping your order back without an RMA reference number will cause a delay in processing.
To initiate an exchange, go to https://baubax.supportsync.com/
Click on “Submit a Request” and fill out the online form.  We will respond back with your RMA reference number and further instructions on how to return your jacket back to us.
REFUND POLICY:
Indiegogo will honor a refund if you do happen to change your mind within 2 days of backing our campaign. 
Unfortunately, we do not offer refunds or returns on items received as Indiegogo perks.Crowdfunding allows us to build our brand by collecting backer assessments, investing in improvements for our current project, and supply funding to our future designs.  Supporting us as a backer, you pledge your support by choosing a perk/reward and is not a retail purchase.  Look at it as a way of supporting a really awesome idea and having the privilege to try a new conceptual product.  
Help! I have not received my jacket from the previous campaign
To ship your jackets, we will need a completed survey from you to know which jacket(s) you want and where to ship them.
In case we have not received your survey, we will be resending a new survey form to your e-mail that was used to back the previous campaign.
If your e-mail has changed, kindly send us a message at support@baubax.com with your backer ID, name, and previous e-mail and we will handle the survey from there!
Thank you

story:
"Meditation takes you beyond the mind's noisy chatter into the pure awareness that is the source of all your happiness, inspiration, and love."  -Deepak Chopra

Mala Naturals started out as a beautiful dream. The thought of creating such a sacred piece of art that helped bring you closer with your inner being  was captivating.  I soon realized that this could not be just a passing thought. I felt compelled to craft these pieces for people to start finding inner peace and self-love.  

Our small but powerful company is based in sunny San Diego, California. Anyone who has been there (or near any coastline) knows the true beauty of the ocean. Many of our malas are crafted with inspiration from beautiful, fiery sunsets, to the calming blue ocean, along with deep greens of the sea plant life.

We are a brand new company and we need help! In order to help people expand their happiness I need your help starting this company. Every penny that is raised will go towards the following:

  • Thousands of beads! Semiprecious stones, rudraksha seeds, and wooden beads to name a few. We want to provide the best quality products possible for our customers.
  • Website upgrade! We really need a clean professional look.
  • Product photography and packaging! Who doesn't want things to look good?

We are starting from the ground up and we appreciate you taking your time to look at our campaign page! If you cannot donate anything at this time we would absolutely love it if you spread the word about Mala Naturals!

We hope you all have a wonderful, and blessed day!


Emily Owens (Founder)

and

Tavahi Owen (Co-Founder)

story:
• Cause Moblie Wallet is an app that gives 1% of everything you spend to the charity or school of your choice and costs you nothing to use. 
  • It allows you to use your smartphone like a credit card or debit card.
  • Your contribution to this campaign will allow us to complete the app and testing.
  • Cause Mobile Wallet is not available for download yet. A few weeks after we conclude the crowdfund campaign, we will officially launch the app and it will be available to everyone for FREE. 
  • Read below to find out more about how this amazing new app can change the world for the better…forever!

Click on one of the boxes to the right to donate and buy cool stuff! ------------------->

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your support for this crowdfund allows us to complete the Cause Mobile Wallet app.

This app is designed to move 1% of all of your purchases to the charity of your choice or your child's school.

It's so simple! This is how it will work...

Step 1:

Download the Cause Mobile Wallet app (coming soon).

Step 2: 

Enter your credit or debit card account number (and ditch the plastic...there's no need anymore!).

Step 3:

Pick a charity or your child's school you'd like to support & begin purchasing as usual.

The results could change the world.

We are building an app called Cause Mobile Wallet. It is a FREE app for your iPhone or Android device that lets you use your smartphone just like a credit or debit card.

However, unlike a credit or debit card, 1% of everything you buy using Cause Mobile Wallet goes to the charity or school of your choice. And not one extra penny comes out of your pocket!

 

YOU SHOP & YOUR CAUSE GETS SUPPORTED

It’s just that easy to do a good thing.

IMAGINE...you can make the world a better place just by doing the things you do every day!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why we need YOUR Help

Your contribution goes towards the completion of the app and the necessary beta testing that follows. Not only will you be contributing to the creation of something that can change the world, but you will also be considered one of the founding pioneers and recognized accordingly on our website.

What Cause Mobile Wallet is NOT:

  • It's not a card reader attached to your phone
  • It's not a fundraiser
  • It's not a one time donation

It’s a way for charities and schools to get what they’ve never had before...a sustainable flow of income!

With Cause they can have the much needed funding to concentrate on what is most important like…FINDING A CURE, SAVING A LIFE, EDUCATING OUR CHILDREN, and MAKING THE WORLD A BETTER PLACE!

How it Works

Pick your Perk & Join the Movement!!

All items will ship before the holidays, so grab something for yourself and spread the love to friends and family with unique, specialized gifts. 

Other ways you can help

Even if you can't give to our crowdfund, you can still help! Just spread the word that we are out there. Use the Indiegogo share tools or let your friends on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram know that we are here and what we are doing.

So we ask you...are YOU down for the cause?

Together, we can change the world for the better...forever!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQs

Q: Where can I download the app?

Once we launch the app, which will be in the next few months, you will be able to download the app from the iTunes Store or Android Marketplace.

Q: Where does the 1% donation come from?

The 1% donation from each purchase that you make using Cause Mobile Wallet comes from the merchant service fee. Each time a merchant processes a payment made with a credit or debit card, that merchant is charged a percentage of the transaction amount for the service of verifying and processing the transaction. Cause Mobile Wallet has eliminated several steps and “middle-men” within this process which enables us to charge merchants a similar amount to what they are normally paying to process a credit or debit card and give 1% of the transaction amount to the charity or school of your choice.

Q: Where does the 1% donation go?

100% of the donations made using Cause Mobile Wallet go to whichever charity or school that YOU choose from our list. It is that simple! 

Q: Do I get to keep my credit card airline miles and bonus points?

Yes! You will accumulate and keep your airline miles and bonus points just as you would if you had used your regular credit or debit card (providing that your credit or debit card has those rewards.). The difference is that with Cause Mobile Wallet, in addition to keeping your miles and points, 1% of the transaction amount is donated to the charity or school of your choice! It's a WIN WIN!

Q: Is it safe to use?

Yes. Your credit/debit information is stored securely with your unique, personal PIN. If your phone is ever lost or stolen no one will be able to access your Cause Mobile Wallet information or be able to make a purchase without your code. We use a secure payment method that utilizes highest security standards as required by the card processing industry.  For more information regarding card security standards, please visit www.pcisecuritystandards.org.

Q: Do I get a write-off for my donations?

If you are a consumer using the app to make purchases, No…remember, you aren’t actually making the donation, you are telling the merchant to make a donation and who you want it to go to.

If you are a merchant, then yes, you will be able to claim the transaction fee as a write-off just as you normally do with all credit and debit card transactions.

Q: Does Cause Mobile Wallet work with school fundraising programs like "scrip?"

Yes, because our donation comes from the merchant service fee, it does not interfere with scrip program or any rewards programs. In fact it complements these programs to generate more money for the school or charities you truly care about.

story:
SUMMARY

mustbkarma is a brand devoted to promoting a positive lifestyle through our merchandise. Our motto is “Think good thoughts. Do good deeds.” When purchasing from mustbkarma you will not only get a fun and unique branded product but support our humanitarian efforts. We dedicate 40% of our profits to She's the First.

We are trying to raise money to print more branded designs on t-shirts as well as expand our product offering plus aid our marketing and distribution efforts to grow our brand.

We have big dreams to put our brand on the retail map as well as do our part in making the world a better place.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT? 

We are a private label with a trademark on our logo. 

We want to make people pause and reflect as they see our designs: to remember to CHOOSE to be positive. 

We stand behind a great cause and have dreams of doing much more as we grow.

OUR STORY

A few years ago, on a trip to India with our daughters, we saw the reality of being born a girl in India and the unique challenges that faced these young girls from the moment they are conceived and at every moment of their existence. The difference between the comforts and opportunities our daughters had and the lack thereof for these girls was staggering. In the land of karma, these differences could be simply written off as “it must be their karma” but we felt it was our karma to be there at that moment, to witness the life unfold and to realize that karma is to right a wrong, not to merely observe it. We were determined to do something about what we had witnessed and to make a difference by helping girls like the ones we met that day.

Since then, we have had many experiences in the efforts to help. We have collected funds for a school for tribal kids in India so they could purchase school supplies and toys. We also supported a private orphanage in Madras which has adopted “unwanted girls,” often with special needs. 

But we wanted to do more and we wanted to promote the kind of thinking that encourages us to be “bigger” than we think we are.

We created the brand, mustbkarma with that in mind. The first illustrations – “Love”, “Care”, “Connect”, “Peace” and “Transcend” – were designed by our daughters, Anita, at age 9, and Leena, at age 12.

We decided to start our product line by creating t-shirts with unique designs and positive messages that show you can look at life optimistically while making a difference.

We wanted to create a brand that would promote building good karma through good deeds: “opportunities for doing good are limitless” was our new mantra. And we wanted to use a part of our sales to help more girls around the globe. For that reason we chose She’s the First as our partner in making a difference (www.shesthefirst.org), pledging 40% of our profits.

We hope that through education and support our brand can help in raising generations of wise, independent and strong women.

With many projects in the works we are excited about mustbkarma’s future. We hope you join us in our mission to inspire and encourage through our brand.

We have printed the first 9 designs, made many marketing efforts and are getting a lot of positive feedback. But, of course, as a new business we need funding to print many more of our designs, expand into sweatshirts, fun yoga clothes, pets’ apparel, and accessories. Everything is set up and running smoothly: we come up with ideas which are drawn by professional artists and then printed – all we need is your help!

We hope to share some good karma!

WHAT WE HAVE

Our t-shirts are currently 100% cotton, higher quality and flattering. We plan to expand to blends to tailor to the exercise crowd.

All processes are in place: from design to fulfillment. We are a small operation right now but we have prepared and planned for the future when we have a large order volume. 

1.  We have a number of excited artists who love to work with us and bring our designs to life

2.  We have a great local reliable printer that doesn’t just print our t-shirts but is involved in almost every other process 

3.  We fulfill our orders ourselves right now but have a fulfillment center lined up for the future 

4.  Btw, we print our own labels on these t-shirts – so it’s OUR brand all the way!

WHAT WE NEED

So far, we've had to print minimum quantities which means our profits from sales have been minimal, if any. We need funds to print more than just minimum quantities in order to place our t-shirts with yoga boutiques and schools, gyms and at festivals. 

 

We don't have much of a marketing budget but realize marketing is the key to success. Marketing is expensive. To gain more exposure, we need to advertise and attend the more expensive events such as the Yoga Journal conferences which alone can cost as much as $1000 to be a vendor.

We have donated t-shirts to events and charities, hence taking a loss on those. We will need to reprint those items.  

We have been asked to produce exercise-friendly t-shirts made from special exercise-friendly fabrics which are more expensive, hence require a bigger budget.

We need funds to expand our product selection to totes, yoga mats and accessories, yoga pants, gym towels and duffels bags and more.

We have 3 designs waiting to be printed: Evolution (highly anticipated),

Ascend and one without a message which is a surprise – it’ll be out first design with a dog on it and it’ll speak to “living in the moment”.

Last but certainly not least, we want to expand our pet line to include different designs and sizes. Jackson (below) would like all his friends to wear one of our t-shirts.



THE IMPACT

We estimate that about 3K will allow us to print the 3 new designs on t-shirts and a few accessories such as totes and yoga mats.

Once the designs are printed we will place them with yoga studios, boutiques and fitness gyms as well as continue our online distribution and festival attendence.

Anything over the goal will be used for a more intense advertising, PR and marketing effort.

If we do extremely well and go far beyond the goal, we can apply the extra money to expand our product line even further and bring to life the many other designs still waiting in the pipeline.

When you contribute $35, $50 or $100 you will be receiving our t-shirts to enjoy, wear and spread the good energy!

Your contribution will not only support our brand but partake in a bigger idea behind our product: promoting positive thinking and helping others in need.

The next designs, particularly Evolution, have been highly anticipated by our customers and fans, so it will be your money that will finally bring this design to life and propel our company into the new dimension of future growth and success.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Visit our site at www.mustbkarma.com and buy a t-shirt!

Like us on Facebook at facebook.com/Mustbkarma

Spread the word among your family and friends!

Send us helpful links and suggestions.

We appreciate any good energy sent our way as well. Sometimes a positive thought is worth more than gold.

Thank you all!

story:
Hi there!

 I'm Zubaida and I'm a Nigerian born, Canada based Fashion Designer. The last two years of my life have been dedicated to learning the tricks of this trade, and I'm starting this campaign because I want to take the Z.Z brand to the next level.

So far, I have been my own team, and although i've been able to manage my business on a small scale, my aim for the next year would be to  mass produce my designs and hopefully hold a fashion show here in Toronto. 

After getting turned down by so many designers, I was lucky to meet a factory owner who agreed to mentor me. She has been so instrumental to my growth as a new designer, and has produced for so many brands/companies (i.e Pink Tartan, Holt Renfrew to name a few), and we recently negotiated a deal for production (Produced in TORONTO - How amazing right?)  But to be able to do that, I need $$$. I need your support to make my dream a reality. With these funds, I'll be able to launch my website, sample my new collections, hire a professional photographer for campaigns, pay manufacturing costs (incl. fabric and trims), and put together a fashion show. 

 In Summary:

From quality pieces, to great packaging, I ultimately want to create that customer experience for my clients.. but most importantly, I want to be able to empower women through my brand, by teaching them that they hold the power to defining what 'beauty' means to them, and the clothes they wear are an expression of that, because true beauty comes from within - may sound cliché but it is very true. My motto is co-creating beauty with my clients, because they are beautiful, as are my pieces.

And what will you get in return for your generous contributions?

 Limited Exclusive Pieces in Luxorious Wax Prints.

The Timeline

In case of 100% funding our plans are:

·  After 40 days the funding phase will end.

·  The production will take 2-5 weeks; and as soon as your item is ready, it will be shipped to your doorstep 

Other Ways You Can Help

If You can't contribute or don't want to risk it but like the idea, then please let others know:

·  Share this page.

·  Like the "Zubaida Zang" brand page on Facebook

·  Tell Your friends about it

(n. b If you would like to contribute via pay-pal, Please email your contribution to info@zubaidazang.com. Thank you!)

Your Size

After contribution I will ask the size and fabric choice you need by email. 




 ADDED due to popular demand:
story_txt:
Hi there!
 I'm Zubaida and I'm a Nigerian born, Canada based Fashion Designer. The last
two years of my life have been dedicated to learning the tricks of this trade,
and I'm starting this campaign because
I want to take the Z.Z brand to the next level. 
So far, I have been my own team, and although i've been able to manage my business on a small scale, my aim
for the next year would be to  mass produce my designs and hopefully hold
a fashion show here in Toronto. After getting turned down by so many designers,
I was lucky to meet a factory owner who agreed
to mentor me. She has been so instrumental to my growth as a new designer, and
has produced for so many brands/companies (i.e Pink Tartan, Holt Renfrew to
name a few), and we recently negotiated a deal for production (Produced in TORONTO - How amazing right?)  But to be able to do that, I need $$$. I need your support to make my dream a reality. With these funds, I'll be able to launch my website, sample my new collections, hire a professional photographer for campaigns, pay manufacturing costs (incl. fabric and trims), and put together a fashion show. 
 In Summary:

From quality pieces, to great packaging, I ultimately want to create that customer
experience for my clients.. but most importantly, I want to be able to empower women through my brand, by teaching them
that they hold the power to defining what 'beauty' means to them, and the
clothes they wear are an expression of that, because true beauty comes from
within - may sound cliché but it is very true. My motto is co-creating beauty
with my clients, because they are beautiful, as are my pieces.
And what will you get in return for your generous
contributions?
 Limited Exclusive
Pieces in Luxorious Wax Prints.

The Timeline
In case of
100% funding our plans are:
· 
After 40 days the
funding phase will end.
· 
The production will
take 2-5 weeks; and as soon as your item is ready, it will be shipped to your doorstep

this page.

story:
Bloggers Love...  is an innovative London based events company created by myself just over a year ago. My events are organised specifically for bloggers, to introduce them to both established and up and coming fashion and beauty brands. Bloggers Love events include, fashion shows, product showcases, gifting lounges and beauty bars, which allow guests to make connections, enjoy complimentary treatments, receive product samples and knowledge, all within a glamorous and relaxed atmosphere. As previously mentioned I have just celebrated the one year anniversary, of my company, by showcasing the top ten fashion brands to watch for 2014. I am also the creator of the hugely successful, first ever Bloggers Fashion Week, (as featured in Company Magazine: http://www.company.co.uk/fashion/bloggers-fashion-week) which launched in March 2014 and I'm currently planning the second season, which is confirmed to take place this coming September.


My events have been featured on numerous blogs, national publications including and have been supported by various influential, UK celebrities. Please feel free to take a look at the website: http://www.bloggerslove.co.uk/#!events/c1m62


It has been an amazing experience to grow my company, create new event ideas, and enjoy the community like atmosphere, at all of the events.


At the moment I am restricted in terms of the frequency of the events and having to use different locations, which aren't always convenient or suitable.

I have realised that this is the right time to launch a permanent location; The Hub. The Bloggers Love...Hub, will be a stylish location just for bloggers, that will allow brands to connect with them on an everyday basis.

Each room/section will be used for different activities:

-Fashion Shows

-Gifting Suites

-Product Showcases

-Live Blogging Booths (for bloggers to be able to work on their blogs in a stimulating and creative environment and vlog)

-Bloggers Beauty Bar

-Fashion Closet (for bloggers to be able to borrow outfits for events and blog features)



With the increasing influence of bloggers, having a permanent physical location, will allow brands who value the positive impact a blog post can have on their reputation and sales, an opportunity to  showcase their latest products and collections in a variety of ways, to a large community of bloggers. 

The Hub will be open to bloggers and brands every single day, to provide a creative atmosphere, for building connections within the blogging community, providing fantastic promotional opportunities for new businesses, along with a constant stream of beauty and style.



Be A Part of the Bloggers Love Hub!

With your help I need to raise a total of £3000.

Even if you can only contribute £1 to this campaign, it would be amazing.

If everyone that visits this page contributes at least £1 The Hub will become a reality!

The money will go towards securing a permanent Central London location that can be converted into the ultimate bloggers hub. 

It will also go towards, suitable equipment for brands to showcase their collections, including mannequins, clothing rails and beauty stations. Tablets will be also be provided for bloggers to use while they are at The Hub.

The Hub will become an extension of the events I have already done and I aim to have bloggers involved in the day to day running of The Hub. From past events, I have learnt that having a team of bloggers involved with projects, ensures that we are able to provide everyone, with a service that would be most appealing to them, which in turn creates maximum promotional opportunities for the brands who showcase.


If all of the funds that I am are attempting to raise do not get collected, I will still launch The Hub, initially on a smaller scale. If the fundraising goal is exceeded I aim to get more equipment for aspects such as video filming, and fashion show staging, lighting and seating, so that bloggers and brands alike, will be provided with the best experience imaginable.



Other Ways You Can Help!

Please spread the word! Feel free to share my campaign with your family, friends and colleagues.

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Dem JudoTeam Oldenburg gehören 140 große und kleine Budoka an. Der Verein wurde am 8. Mai 2007 gegründet, ca. 80 % unsrer Mitglieder sind jünger als 10 Jahre. Oldenburg in Holstein liegt zwischen der Hansestadt Lübeck und der Insel Fehmarn und hat 10.000 Einwohner.

2009 waren wir längst zu viele, um noch im Saal des Roten Kreuzes trainieren zu können. Mangels Alternativen waren wir dankbar, eine nicht mehr betriebene Sporthalle Baujahr 1928 von der Stadt übernehmen zu können. Erwachsene Mitglieder und viele Elternteile haben dazu beigetragen, dass wir inzwischen eine gut funktionierende Heizungsanlage, zeitgemäße Elektrik, brauchbare Sanitäreinrichtugen und Farbe an den Wänden haben. Die Fenster sind nun ein zu großer Happen, deshalb wollen wir die fast 80.000 € in vier Etappen sammeln, der Fensterbauer schafft es auch nicht in einem Rutsch.

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Die insgesamt 16 Fenster der Halle müssen nach den Vorgaben des Denkmalschutzes ausgetauscht werden. Die aktuelle Verglasung bietet weder Wärmedämmung noch Bruchsicherheit. Ein zeitgemäßes Glas kann aber nicht von den alten Rahmen aufgenommen werden, der aber möglichst umfangreich erhalten werden muss. Die Folge ist viel Handarbeit und damit verbunden relativ hohe Kosten. Dafür haben wir dann Fenster, die sicher, energieeffizient und schön sind.

Als Unterstützer werden Sie unabhängig von der Höhe Ihrer Spende auf unserer Homepage und unserer Facebook-Seite gewürdigt. Spenden Sie mehr als 10 €, so danken wir Ihnen mit einer persönlichen Postkarte. Ab 50 € gibt es auch noch ein T-Shirt als Dank, dass Sie sich so sehr mit unserem Verein identifizieren. 

Bei einer Spende von mehr als 200 € werden wir Sie in unserer Halle verewigen. Die Fenster werden mit Messingtafeln versehen und auf einer dieser Tafeln wird dann Ihr Name stehen. Toilettenfenster beschildern wir aber nur auf ausdrücklichen Wunsch!


Die Folgen

Die denkmalgeschützte Sporthalle eines gemeinnützigen Sportvereins schlägt zwei Fliegen mit einer Klappe: Der Sport wird gefördert, indem wir bessere Trainingsbedingungen erhalten und die Kultur durch den Erhalt des Baudenkmals in seinem ursprünglichen Erscheinungsbild.

Sehr gerne würden wir Sie persönlich bei uns begrüßen. Dazu werden Sie sicherlich nicht erst zum 10jährigen Vereinsjubiläum 2017 oder zum 100. Geburtstag unseres Dojos 2028 eine passende Gelegenheit finden.


    Risiken & Herausforderungen

    Ehrenamtlich Arbeit stellt natürlich immer eine große Herausforderung dar, denn Beruf und Familie wollen ja auch noch zu ihrem Recht kommen. Hier ist das Risiko aber recht überschaubar: Wenn wir genügend Geld haben, sanieren wir ein Fenster, und wenn es dann wieder reicht, das nächste. Wirtschaftlich also ein sehr überschaubares Vorhaben, nur die Zeit ist schwer zu kalkulieren. Aber wenn es etwas länger dauert, stört es die Funktionalität nicht allzu sehr.

    Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

    Geld ist nicht alles. Wenn Sie in unserer Nähe wohnen, können Sie natürlich gerne mit anpacken. Sonst hilft aber auch ein Blick auf die Facebook-Seite oder zu Twitter und das fleißige Teilen unseres Links.

story:
Hi!

Thank you for your interest in this Unapologetic adventure. As an Indie Designer/Fashion Blogger attending NY Fashion Week 2014 is a definite must on my vision board of miracles and goals. Your kind words, sincere wishes, and  supportive DONATION will help this dream come to life! Funding includes fashion show attendance, press coverage and production fees, travel accommodations, and more!

I am cheerfully excited to share the journey with you! This fashionable quest will consist of daily video journals, momentous snapshots, and an official recap of the entire adventure including interviews with fashion notables, and runway explosions! And of course, ROCKING my very own designs as we explore the city that never sleeps. Hey, we never know where fashion icons may be- it's a must we're always ready and UNAPOLOGETIC!

Thank you in advance for your time, kindness, and positive intention towards SUPPORTING NY Fashion Week: Unapologetic Adventures! Please SHARE!

Glitter Kisses,

E. Unapologetically!

beunapologetic.blogspot.com

@BeUnapologetic

story:
A note from Nary.... 
Thank you for your interest in my Campaign!

I have been on my creative journey since I was a homeless teenager at 14. My focus on design has been the light that has led me away from a troubled childhood, to New York and driven me to stay on course despite tremendous personal and professional challenges.

This re-launch of my brand has allowed me to personally focus on what and who I am as a designer. I am focusing more on my Laotian heritage and modernizing the sensuality of the culture and tastefully balancing elements for the confident, modern woman for whom I design. The design and development for NARY MANIVONG takes place in New York City, employing skilled sample and pattern makers in New York's Garment Center.

I still keep a note that I wrote during my darkest imes on the street with me "Nary, You could do it, Believe" with me at all times and it inspires me to move forward. My story was documented in the film "Dressed" and I am grateful that others could hear my story and so moved by the support. (Dressed-themovie.com)

Risks and Challenges: I have been in the fashion industry for 14 years, seeing the highs, lows, non-stop challenges and have used these experiences to learn, strengthen my focus and expertise of my craft and business acumen. The monies requested are to be used for fabrics, thread, trims, models, garment sample costs, pattern making, filming, equipment and lighting rental, producing the collection in a NYC factory, rent, transportation and support staffing create create my Fall/Winter 2013 debut collection. Take a look in the gallery to see my designs and a look into my life.

Thank you! 
With respect and gratitude, 
Nary Manivong

story:
är Gloves use the best technology on the market

 

About ViralOff®️ self-cleaning treatment

An innovative technology that reduces the need to wash the gloves.

The latest treatment technology from the Swedish company Polygiene®. Applied to textiles, including face masks, ViralOff® has been certified by ISO 18184:2019 and ATCC VR-1679 (H3N2) tests. The active ingredient is a biocide, based on the reaction mass of titanium dioxide and silver chloride.

After every use just put the är Gloves in the bag and they will self-clean in 2 hours.

 

About Eco Acqua Zero™

A cutting-edge fabric treatment that lets you enjoy your daily life comfortably.

Eco Acqua Zero™ is a fluorine-free water repellent technology. Based on special hyper-branched polymers, this hydrophobic environmentally-friendly & PFOA-free textile treatment provides a water-repellent performance with low impact on breathability. It also helps remove moisture from inside the gloves, transporting it to the surface where it can evaporate.

 

Touchscreen friendly

Use your phone or tablet like you always do.

är Gloves are touchscreen-friendly, so you can browse Instagram, answer emails or share your favorite photos as usual. In public transport, airports or restaurants.

 

Be Safe. Be Stylish. Be Comfortable.

är Gloves are the ideal partner for every occasion in our daily urban lives. We designed är Gloves for ourselves, for our need to have stylish accessories which will protect us every step of the way.

Now it's time to share them with YOU.

 

är Gloves are designed for everyday use

In public transport

In public transport, you are touching surfaces which were touched by thousands of people before you. 

 

For withdrawing money from ATMs

Even in the digital age, sometimes we need to withdraw cash from ATMs. Most ATMs aren't cleaned daily. You never know who withdrew money before you.

 

For quick commuting on share-scooters

E-scooters became a part of transportation in every big city around the globe. They are charged every day, but they aren't always cleaned.

 

är Gloves are design with cars in mind

Cars are part of our every day lives, from a quick taxi ride to the airport to grabbing a parking ticket.

 

For Shopping

Do you need a quick snack or a big trip to the mall? är Gloves has you covered.

 

Single-use plastic gloves destroy our planet

75% of plastic gloves will end up in landfills, or floating in the seas. Using the är Gloves helps you protect yourself and also helps protect the environment.

“Plastic pollution was already one of the greatest threats to our planet before the coronavirus outbreak,” says Pamela Coke-Hamilton, UNCTAD’s director of international trade. “The sudden boom in the daily use of certain products to keep people safe and stop the disease is making things much worse.”

 

This Isn't Our First Protective Product

We are är, a team of fashion designers, engineers and experts in manufacturing with one common idea: Create eco-friendly protective and stylish accessories for everyday use, for everyone.
 

After a few months of hard work, we successfully launched our first product är Facemask with är Nanofilters. Both of these products combine cutting-edge technologies with stylish design. The Nanofilters cleans the air you breathe. The ViralOff®️ treatment (the same as on är Gloves) has a self-cleaning function.

 

 

 

What's in the Box

Every pair of är Gloves comes with an är Doypack. är Doypacks have been designed to keep out all light, dust, water, air and odors. This provides an ideal environment for your är Gloves when you are not using them.

 

 

Production in Europe

All our production is based in the EU. We monitor every detail of the production process to make sure it meets our quality standards.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Can I clean my är Gloves?

Yes, of course, but we recommend washing the gloves as little as possible so that they can retain their unique properties provided by the ViralOff® treatment. For best performance and sustainability, wash only when absolutely necessary, by hand with gentle soap and lukewarm water.

 

How do I know my är Gloves will be the right size?

You can check out the size guide above. är Gloves are elastic, so we recommend measuring your hand correctly. If the gloves are too big for you, this can cause problems with using touch-screens.

 

How do I store the är Gloves when I am not using them?

Keep är Gloves in a dry and clean environment away from direct sunlight. For best results, use the original resealable container that came with the gloves. är containers have been designed to keep out all light, dust, water, air and odors. This provides an ideal environment for storing the är Gloves. Within two hours, the gloves will clean themselves, thanks to ViralOff® technology.

 

Do är Gloves protect me from getting infected?

är Gloves are made of cutting-edge technologies such as ViralOff® and Eco Acqua Zero™, but we cannot guarantee that you will not get sick.

 

Are the är Gloves appropriate for medical use?

Even though we think the är Gloves are pretty spectacular, we do not recommend using them in hospital settings as a protection of the members of various health teams, as they are simply not suitable nor made for such use. Most medical gloves are disposable, single-use gloves but the är Gloves are designed to be worn by people to use in everyday life. It is, therefore, inadvisable to wear the Gloves if you are in frequent contact with infectious patients. The är Gloves should not be considered a medical product under any circumstances.

 

Do you offer worldwide shipping?

Yes, we offer shipping to all countries.

 

Does your product contain or come into contact with latex?

är Gloves are made entirely without latex.
