story:
Let’s face it- there is a problem with plastics (what’s in that stuff!??).  Plastics create a worry for parents- a worry of whether their child is being exposed to harmful chemicals like BPA or phthalates.  In the market today, many children’s flatware is made from plastic.  The ones that are made from stainless steel are made overseas, which create a whole other problem (environmental footprint with shipping, contaminated metal, worker conditions)!  

We sought out to find a solution.  Kleynimals Flatware will provide a solution to this “kitchen conundrum,” providing parents with a groundbreaking non-toxic, stainless steel, environmentally friendly, USA-made flatware collection for children.  Contemporary and inventive, Kleynimals Flatware is beautifully designed with the cute faces of our "Kleynimals animals" and with your child’s health in mind.

Our goal at Kleynimals is to provide parents with the sound knowledge that they are purchasing a product that is:

  1. Safe for their children’s health 
  2. Environmentally friendly
  3. Made in the USA
  4. A practical keepsake that can be used daily and washed in the dishwasher

                                                           


 


Why Stainless?

  • Non-toxic- Stainless steel eliminates the worry over chemicals like BPA or phthalates.  And because Kleynimals flatware will be made in the U.S., parents can be sure that kids are not putting lead or cadmium in their mouths.
  • Dishwasher safe- Stainless steel is non-corrosive and rust-resistant.
  • Easy to Clean- Stainless steel is a more hygienic option since it has easy cleaning properties, which is the reason it is used in hospitals, kitchens, and laboratories. 
  • Longevity- Impact resistant and long-lasting
  • Green- Stainless steel is 100% recyclable and the average stainless steel product contains over 50% recycled material. 


The Inspiration for Kleynimals 
My name is Kirsten Chapman, and I am a mom of two boys, currently ages 10 and 7.  I invented Kleynimals - Clean Key Animals in 2008 because my youngest son put everything in his mouth.  I wanted a safe toy for his "oral fixation," and I could not find anything that satisfied either of us (safety for me, something akin to keys for him).  Stainless steel toy keys seemed like a logical toy to me.  They could be made of a safe material that could provide that cold metal feel and texture he seemed to desire.   


It took me two years to get my product to market as I navigated the new-to-me world of inventing, manufacturing, and marketing a children's product.  I was truly inspired to create a product that made parents feel confident that they were purchasing a safe product from a company that never compromises on integrity.  Hopefully, you take the time to watch my video and see that my toy keys have been an absolute labor of love.  Kleynimals have never been a money making proposition.  They have always been about providing the best product in the "right way."  Thus, to be honest, the only compromise has been on my end, with both my finances and my time.  



Kleynimals- ready to grow 
For the past 4 years, I have "piecemealed" my product together, getting parts from Chicago and Wisconsin shipped to me in Annapolis, Maryland.  A local organization that works with developmentally disabled people (The Providence Center) helped me assemble and wash my product.  A local welder welded and buffed the ring.  It was a hugely labor intensive process and it took a lot out of me, as the time investment on my end was huge.  
Thankfully, I recently learned that Sherrill Manufacturing was back in operation in upstate New York.  When I first looked to find a manufacturer for Kleynimals back in 2008, it made sense to me that I should find a flatware manufacturer.  However, after searching long and hard, I learned that NO ONE was making flatware in the USA, even if it was an American company.  Everything was manufactured overseas.  Thankfully, Sherrill started up the plant in NY again, and now that is where Kleynimals are made. I always hoped to create a Kleynimals "Line," but I did not have the time, nor did I have the manufacturing capabilities to keep up with any kind of demand prior to finding Sherrill.  Now that Kleynimals are assembled and welded in one stop (the ring is still from Wisconsin), I am excited to be able to introduce a new product!

Sketches of our Kleynimals Flatware featuring Eli the Elephant, Gus the Giraffe and Leo the Lion.


Made in the USA
Thankfully, there is a big focus on finding products Made in the USA now, and bringing manufacturing jobs "back to America."  But, when I first set out to make Kleynimals, that was not necessarily the case.  I feel passionately about making more safe products in the USA, thus providing more options to parents who think it's important to provide their babies with trustworthy products and who value supporting the American economy with their purchases.  


The making of our first prototype at Sherrill Manufacturing. 

Honesty is hugely important to me, so at the risk of "oversharing," I will share with you the financial situation for me with Kleynimals.  When I started Kleynimals, I did so with personal money and a gift from my parents.  I have always tried to run Kleynimals really "leanly," and have never been in a position to pay myself.  All of the revenue I make goes back into the company.  I have had a couple of barely profitable years, that essentially just mean that I owe money in taxes!  My former manufacturing process did not always produce ideal product, which meant I ended up having to recycle a lot of product that did not meet my high standards.  As a result, I was spending a lot of money on product that I could not sell, which is never good for the bottom line. 
As far as revenue and sales go, while the people that know Kleynimals love Kleynimals, not enough people know about them.  But honestly, with the manufacturing process the way it was, I was almost nervous to have a "big break," as I wasn't sure that I could meet the demand.  

Truly, a "labor of love"
So, given all of that, why do I continue with this business that doesn't generate personal cash flow?  I do it because I love it.  I thrive off of the positive feedback I receive from parents who tell me that Kleynimals are a family favorite.  I LOVE hearing the jingling sound of Kleynimals on a plane or in another public setting.  While most people wouldn't notice it, I can hear the jingle from a mile away and I am then on the lookout for the Kleynimals loving baby!  It makes me so happy to think that Kleynimals are bringing joy to a child and that parents can feel confident in their safety.  

What I need from you
So, since I don't make enough money to pay myself, I also don't have the company funds to invest in new dies to make the new product, as well as the first batch to manufacture them.  

If I can generate $22,000 in donations for this idea, I will have enough to back the first 1000 sets of Kleynimals flatware.  The majority of the funding will go towards the dies, which will be a fixed asset that I can use time and time again to produce more sets of flatware.  

If I do not reach the entire goal, the funds will still go towards this effort to make Kleynimals flatware.  However, it may delay the time in which I can launch the product, as I will have to seek another revenue source in the meantime.  


Exciting perk offers
Don't miss out on our perks:
Donate $200 and get a free flatware set
Donate $100 and get a free engraving on your Kleynimals (toy keys only)
Donate $50 and get free shipping on your next Kleynimals purchase 
Donate $25 and 5 of those dollars will go to our nonprofit partners (Healthy Child, Healthy World, and World Wildlife Fund)

New perk offers!
Donate $400 and get a progressive baby and child flatware set of 6 (feeder spoon, baby fork and spoon, child fork, spoon and knife). Will be shipped when flatware is ready.
Donate $179 and get the "Kleynimals Package." With this perk you will receive one set of Kleynimals toy keys shipped immediately and one two-piece baby set when flatware is ready.  
Donate $80 and get one set of Kleynimals toy keys shipped to you immediately. 
Donate $49 and get a Kleynimals feeder spoon with Leo the Lion on it. Will ship after campaign is done and first product batch is produced.
Donate $20 and receive a special edition bag for your Kleynimals toy keys featuring Eli, Gus, and Leo. 

                                           

   Adorable Kleynimals animal design that will 

be pictured on special edition bag.

Donate $35 and get a special edition organic Kleynimals onesie. Onesies will sport a "Proudly made in the USA logo" and our animals holding a flag.

 

Join us in spreading the Kleynimals name.  Not enough people know about Kleynimals toy keys, so your help in sharing this campaign will help spread the word about our company and both products we hope to offer soon.  

Please use the IndieGoGo sharing tools to tell your friends about Kleynimals toy keys and flatware!

material. 









The Inspiration for Kleynimals 

My name is Kirsten Chapman, and I am a mom of two boys, currently ages 10 and 7.  I invented Kleynimals - Clean Key Animals in 2008 because my youngest son put everything in his mouth.  I wanted a safe toy for his "oral fixation," and I could not find anything that satisfied either of us (safety for me, something akin to keys for him).  Stainless steel toy keys seemed like a logical toy to me.  They could be made of a safe material that could provide that cold metal feel and texture he seemed to desire.   




It took me two years to get my product to market as I navigated the new-to-me world of inventing, manufacturing, and marketing a children's product.  I was truly inspired to create a product that made parents feel confident that they were purchasing a safe product from a company that never compromises on integrity.  Hopefully, you take the time to watch my video and see that my toy keys have been an absolute labor of love.  Kleynimals have never been a money making proposition.  They have always been about providing the best product in the "right way."  Thus, to be honest, the only compromise has been on my end, with both my finances and my time.  






Kleynimals- ready to grow 

For the past 4 years, I have "piecemealed" my product together, getting parts from Chicago and Wisconsin shipped to me in Annapolis, Maryland.  A local organization that works with developmentally disabled people (The Providence Center) helped me assemble and wash my product.  A local welder welded and buffed the ring.  It was a hugely labor intensive process and it took a lot out of me, as the time investment on my end was huge.  

Thankfully, I recently learned that Sherrill Manufacturing was back in operation in upstate New York.  When I first looked to find a manufacturer for Kleynimals back in 2008, it made sense to me that I should find a flatware manufacturer.  However, after searching long and hard, I learned that NO ONE was making flatware in the USA, even if it was an American company.  Everything was manufactured overseas.  Thankfully, Sherrill started up the plant in NY again, and now that is where Kleynimals are made. I always hoped to create a Kleynimals "Line," but I did not have the time, nor did I have the manufacturing capabilities to keep up with any kind of demand prior to finding Sherrill.  Now that Kleynimals are assembled and welded in one stop (the ring is still from Wisconsin), I am excited to be able to introduce a new product!





Sketches of our Kleynimals Flatware featuring Eli the Elephant, Gus the Giraffe and Leo the Lion.


Made in the USA
Thankfully, there is a big focus on finding products Made in the USA now, and bringing manufacturing jobs "back to America."  But, when I first set out to make Kleynimals, that was not necessarily the case.  I feel passionately about making more safe products in the USA, thus providing more options to parents who think it's important to provide their babies with trustworthy products and who value supporting the American economy with their purchases.  





The making of our first prototype at Sherrill Manufacturing. 



Honesty is hugely important to me, so at the risk of "oversharing," I will share with you the financial situation for me with Kleynimals.  When I started Kleynimals, I did so with personal money and a gift from my parents.  I have always tried to run Kleynimals really "leanly," and have never been in a position to pay myself.  All of the revenue I make goes back into the company.  I have had a couple of barely profitable years, that essentially just mean that I owe money in taxes!  My former manufacturing process did not always produce ideal product, which meant I ended up having to recycle a lot of product that did not meet my high standards.  As a result, I was spending a lot of money on product that I could not sell, which is never good for the bottom line. 

As far as revenue and sales go, while the people that know Kleynimals love Kleynimals, not enough people know about them.  But honestly, with the manufacturing process the way it was, I was almost nervous to have a "big break," as I wasn't sure that I could meet the demand.  


Truly, a "labor of love"
So, given all of that, why do I continue with this business that doesn't generate personal cash flow?  I do it because I love it.  I thrive off of the positive feedback I receive from parents who tell me that Kleynimals are a family favorite.  I LOVE hearing the jingling sound of Kleynimals on a plane or in another public setting.  While most people wouldn't notice it, I can hear the jingle from a mile away and I am then on the lookout for the Kleynimals loving baby!  It makes me so happy to think that Kleynimals are bringing joy to a child and that parents can feel confident in their safety.  


What I need from you
So, since I don't make enough money to pay myself, I also don't have the company funds to invest in new dies to make the new product, as well as the first batch to manufacture them.  If I can generate $22,000 in donations for this idea, I will have enough to back the first 1000 sets of Kleynimals flatware.  The majority of the funding will go towards the dies, which will be a fixed asset that I can use time and time again to produce more sets of flatware.  If I do not reach the entire goal, the funds will still go towards this effort to make Kleynimals flatware.  However, it may delay the time in which I can launch the product, as I will have to seek another revenue source in the meantime.  





Exciting perk offers
Don't miss out on our perks:Donate $200 and get a free flatware setDonate $100 and get a free engraving on your Kleynimals (toy keys only)Donate $50 and get free shipping on your next Kleynimals purchase Donate $25 and 5 of those dollars will go to our nonprofit partners (Healthy Child, Healthy World, and World Wildlife Fund)


New perk offers!
Donate $400 and get a progressive baby and child flatware set of 6 (feeder spoon, baby fork and spoon, child fork, spoon and knife). Will be shipped when flatware is ready.
Donate $179 and get the "Kleynimals Package." With this perk you will receive one set of Kleynimals toy keys shipped immediately and one two-piece baby set when flatware is ready.  
Donate $80 and get one set of Kleynimals toy keys shipped to you immediately. 
Donate $49 and get a Kleynimals feeder spoon with Leo the Lion on it. Will ship after campaign is done and first product batch is produced.
Donate $20 and receive a special edition bag for your Kleynimals toy keys featuring Eli, Gus, and Leo.    
                                           
   Adorable Kleynimals animal design that will 
be pictured on special edition bag.
Donate $35 and get a special edition organic Kleynimals onesie. Onesies will sport a "Proudly made in the USA logo" and our animals holding a flag.

 

Join us in spreading the Kleynimals name.  Not enough people know about Kleynimals toy keys, so your help in sharing this campaign will help spread the word about our company and both products we hope to offer soon.  
Please use the IndieGoGo sharing tools to tell your friends about Kleynimals toy keys and flatware!

story:
This bumper sticker is poking just a bit of fun at Ken Buck, but it's really in support of Vic Meyers...

...our congressional candidate for the 4th CD here in Colorado. He is a strictly grassroots funded candidate. He is relying on people powered promotion. Check him out on vicmeyersforcongress.com. He's the real deal. 

I made the 3" x 5" bumper sticker pink because women in the 4th District are sick and tired of old white men like Ken Buck trying to tell us what to do with our bodies! I envision us progressive gals all over the 4th District proudly displaying these pink emblems of "fierce feminosity"!

A little about myself...

I'm a graphic designer who is also a politically progressive activist here in Boulder County, Colorado. If you're a Democrat and you've received the BCDP Voter Guide — I designed that. I've designed the campaigns for several great democratic candidates. My history is in magazine and book publishing, but in recent years, I've had several opportunities to align my profession with my politics. With all the noise that's out there, especially in politics, message is king. The question is, what's the message?

Heavily financed media machines don't necessarily know what people care about. If you volunteer to get out the vote, if you care about supporting honest and real grassroots candidates, you can be frustrated with what tools are available to ordinary people to get that message out there. That's why I'm here at indiegogo. I've financed projects of my own before, but this time, I've tested the idea with a few folks and it's getting good response, so I need your help with production.

I need funds to cover my design costs, printing and postage — for those of you who contribute (and provide your address), I'll send you a bumper sticker!

(The smallest amount you can have an indiegogo campaign for is $500, but the first 100 bumper stickers will cost me far less than that. If I get good response, I'll just keep printing stickers with what funds this campaign generates.)

THANK YOU

...for reading about my campaign, for your interest, and for your support. If you decide not to contribute, please pass on this campaign to others you think might be interested. ~Marisa

story:
I am Adriana Bertini an Artvist from south of Brazil. I was born in 02/02/1971.

Since 1995 I have worked as an artist and activist in the fight against AIDS in Brazil and worldwide.

Dress Up Against AIDS are costumes that I create with condoms that are part of industrial production fault, I propose through the art exhibition multidisciplinary debate to prevent HIV/AIDS.

From 20 to July 25, 2014 Happens 20th International AIDS Conference in Melbourne, Australia.

It is the biggest event which brings together more than 20 thousand people from all over the world. Activist, doctors, scientists, health officials, opinion leaders etc … with the same goal in common: to study, learn and share experiences against HIV / AIDS.

I have the support of the National STD / AIDS of the Ministry of Health of Brazil to attend the conference.

What do we do at the conference:

The exhibition Dress Up Against AIDS, with 5 condom dresses, monitoring with reflections with the public, presenting an unprecedented tool through art to break the taboo providing dialogue humorously.

What we need: 

1 round trip from São Paulo / Melbourne / São Paulo 

USD 5.000, 

Print 2,000 folders

USD 2,200

Your support is very important for us!

Thank you so much!


Campanha de Doação

Como vocês sabem desde 1995 tenho atuado como artista plástica e ativista na luta contra a aids na minha comunidade, no Brasil e no mundo.

Vista-se Contra a AIDS:  São figurinos que eu crio com camisinhas que fazem parte da falha de produção industrial, proponho através da exposição de arte um debate multidisciplinar para a prevenção a HIV/AIDS.

De 20 a 25 de Julho de 2014 acontece a 20th International AIDS Conference em Melbourne, Australia.

É o maior evento onde reúne mais de 20 mil pessoas de toda parte do mundo. Ativista, médicos, cientistas, agentes de saúde, formadores de opinião,  etc… com 1 objetivo: estudar, aprender, compartilhar experiências contra a epidemia.

Eu tenho o apoio do Programa Nacional de DST/AIDS do Ministério da Saúde do Brasil para participar da conferência.

Mas não consegui ainda o suporte para levar a Joana minha assistente. Ela é fundamental para a exposição, pois fazer a montagem, desmontagem e atenter mais de 20 mil pessoas sozinha na conferencia é impossivel uma vez que trabalho a 4 mãos! Por isso tive a ideia de fazer esta campanha de arrecadação de dinheiro de vocês meus amigos do face.

Minha pergunta é voce poderia doar R$ 5, 10, 15, 20 ou R$ 50 reais para o meu projeto?

O dinheiro doado vai ser investido em:

1 passagem aérea floripa/ melbourne/floripa

e para  impressão de 2.000 folfers.

Se você acredita que meu trabalho pode fazer a diferença em educar uma poplulação em risco do hiv por favor doe o quanto puder!

Para doar é facil basta ter cartao de credito ou uma conta no paypal, quando a campanha tiver atingido a meta ela se encerra!

Muito muito obrigada mas por favor seja rapido pois o prazo é de 15 dias!

story:
What is Quite a Quote?

Quite-a-Quote is a fusion of an Art and Typography. We are two friends with these very different passions and skills. We managed to pair them up in vintage style quote wall decorations. While we have created hand drawn plain blackboard’n’chalk designs in bars and shops before - we cannot go everywhere ourselves. We decided to find a way to bring that to everyone and every wall that lacks that little something to make it THE wall.


We did it! The solution is wall decals or otherwise known as murals, but we need your help to make it happen.

Our dream.

Conventional decoration of this type is simple and inexpensive – a tin of blackboard paint and a chalk or a chalk marker. Vinyl wall decorations on other hand require a workplace, a cutter machine, and a software and wall decal material. While currently we’re borrowing the cutter and working on friend’s sign maker software we would love to set up our own workshop and an easy to use and browse online e-gallery where everyone can see what we do and buy it if they see something they like. Any contribution to help us reach that goal would be much appreciated and every single one will be thanked in the webpage when it’s live.

Why wall decal? Why not poster or other printed media?

The beauty of wall decal is that it looks like painted directly on the wall but it’s completely mess free and is so easy to apply. It becomes one with the wall. We are aiming for that stylish and laconic look with a good dash of vintage style.

Creation of the design and the decal.

Every decal design starts off with the blank blackboard and the design is hand sketched on it. The sketch is loaded into a computer and is converted into line drawing. The line pattern is then cut into a very thin vinyl film. Then the excess vinyl is removed from the rest of the design and it is covered with so called transfer film. Design is ready to travel. Please watch our stop motion video to show this process.


What we’re offering right now.

We have created 14 unique vintage style quote designs and we plan to offer them in two sizes:

  • Smaller size quote decal: 22 inches high and 15 – 19 inches wide (depending on the quote)
  • Bigger size quote decal: 30 – 45 inches high (depending on the design) and 22 inches wide
  • Custom quote of your choosing (up to 15 words long).
  • One-of-a-Kind Custom quote of your choosing.
All quote decals will be shipped in a hard case tube with easy to follow step-by-step instructions and application tool.

                                      

If you're a contributor - we will contact you after our campaign has ended to let you know shipping day which will be within 30 days after campaign has ended.

Thank you for supporting independent artists.

If you like what you see here but don’t feel you have a place for this type decor – Like, Share, Tweet and talk about it. Maybe this is exactly what your friend is looking for.

story:
ABOUT US

Founded in 2012 by Kevin Vegh, on the beautiful Shores North of bustling Montréal, The North Shore Rebellion began as a creative extension of Kevin’s work and influences. With clothing as the main focus, the designs are inspired by the places we live in, the places we’ve come from, and the interesting and peculiar things that inspire us.

North Shore Rebellion is rooted in the ideals of variety and expression; it is for the confident individual who can appreciate quality products & clean design. Stay tuned for the next chapter, much more to come from North Shore Rebellion.

WHY DO WE NEED YOUR HELP?

We are raising funds to get the first run of 4 designs printed and put up on our web shop.

We have many more designs in the pipeline so hopefully we will receive the funding necessary for the first run and we can put out a second collection of shirts.

We want to develop and expand the North Shore Rebellion brand both locally & globally by setting up a web shop as well as selling the shirts in local clothing retailers. But in order to do so we need to show there is a demand for the brand. By pledging you are helping us show there is an interest in the North Shore Rebellion brand as well as helping fund the 2013 collections by giving us the funds necessary to have new designs printed and custom tags fabricated.

So here is what we are offering in exchange for your Pledges! A small taste of what’s to come from North Shore Rebellion!

** We are only offering mens sizes at the moment, with additional funding over our goal we will be offering womens sizes on our next print run and following collections. **

What's the money being used for?

All funds go directly towards the raw pricing of the shirts and the screen printing as well as the set up of the North Shore Rebellion Web Shop.

All additional funding will be used towards an additional print run of the original 4 designs as well as funding the new collection.

International Backers & Shipping

Backers needing shipments to the U.S & Canada, shipping is FREE, don't worry it's on us! All we ask in return is to keep spreading the word!

For all other international orders, please add $5.00 to assist with covering the additional shipping costs.

F.A.Q.

Q. What currency is used for the contributions?

A. All contributions made are in USD, when you contribute the exchange will be made by either pay pal or your credit card provider.

Q. Do you need my choice of design and t-shirt size now?

A. No.  When funding is complete, I'll contact you via email so you can select your design(s), and size(s).

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thanks for taking the time to check out North Shore Rebellion.

Join the Rebellion!

story:
Short Summary

The Bikini Hockey League is giving hockey fans what they want: HOCKEY. With the NHL currently locked out and the cancelation of the Winter Classic, the BHL is stepping up to the rink to kick off 2013 with the first Bikini Hockey League Winter Classic!

The BHL started as a concept to generate a reality show and is currently in talks to get production going soon.  Initially, the concept revolved around roller hockey. But when the NHL started dragging negotiaions and BHL players wanted to fill the hockey void, these female athletes wanted to put their bikini's on ice. The first game will revive the NHL Winter Classic on New Year's Day in Detroit at the Greak Lakes Sport City.

The power of the bikini, hockey and hatred of your choice (NHL Commissioner Bettman or NHLPA) will fuel this game to a crescendo. While the NHL squabbles over millions, fans can watch the BHL live in Detroit or on pay-per-view and get their hockey fix. The BHL players are not only beautiful but talented and will give it all they've got for three intense periods. Check out the roster set in place for this years Winter Classic http://www.thebikinihockeyleague.com/winter-cla...


If contributors get behind this first game, it will fuel jobs, economics and fun. Not only are NHL players losing out, but arena's, food suppliers, team staffs and the hospitatliy industry are in a slump. By supporting the BHL, we can do our part by putting things back to work for a day and knowing the NHL will be back soon!

What We Need & What You Get

By funding the BHL Winter Classic, you are part of a ground movement supporting a fan-based hockey league.  No millions to squabble over. No big-budget ad campaigns to entice you.  Pure hockey by talented athletes who simply want to further their careers in a male dominated sport.

The funding will help bring together some of the finest femaie hockey players from across the US and Canada.  Funds are needed to bring all players together (travel) and then secure hotel, ground transportation and catering.  A venue has been located to pracitce and play the actual game.  Uniforms, coaches, referee's....the list goes on!

The budget calls for 60% of funding to come from sponsorships and 40% to come from ticket sales.  Funding secured through Indiegogo will be part of the 60% sponsorship estimate.

The Impact

Why not show the NHL that the fans can take matters into their own hands! Let's make them think next time they think lockout that people have a voice and have a say in where their dollars are spent!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, we completely understand and appreciate that you are here and showing your support by taking the time to read this. Other ways you can support us:

Follow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/BikiniHockey

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Bikini-Hockey-Lea...

And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Again, Thank you so much for your time and consideration. Now let's play HOCKEY!
story_txt:
Short Summary
The Bikini Hockey League is giving hockey fans what they want: HOCKEY. With the NHL currently locked out and the cancelation of the Winter Classic, the BHL is stepping up to the rink to kick off 2013 with the first Bikini Hockey League Winter Classic!
The BHL started as a concept to generate a reality show and is currently in talks to get production going soon.  Initially, the concept revolved around roller hockey. But when the NHL started dragging negotiaions and BHL players wanted to fill the hockey void, these female athletes wanted to put their bikini's on ice. The first game will revive the NHL Winter Classic on New Year's Day in Detroit at the Greak Lakes Sport City.
The power of the bikini, hockey and hatred of your choice (NHL Commissioner Bettman or NHLPA) will fuel this game to a crescendo. While the NHL squabbles over millions, fans can watch the BHL live in Detroit or on pay-per-view and get their hockey fix. The BHL players are not only beautiful but talented and will give it all they've got for three intense periods. Check out the roster set in place for this years Winter Classic http://www.thebikinihockeyleague.com/winter-cla...
If contributors get behind this first game, it will fuel jobs, economics and fun. Not only are NHL players losing out, but arena's, food suppliers, team staffs and the hospitatliy industry are in a slump. By supporting the BHL, we can do our part by putting things back to work for a day and knowing the NHL will be back soon!


What We Need & What You Get
By funding the BHL Winter Classic, you are part of a ground movement supporting a fan-based hockey league.  No millions to squabble over. No big-budget ad campaigns to entice you.  Pure hockey by talented athletes who simply want to further their careers in a male dominated sport.
The funding will help bring together some of the finest femaie hockey players from across the US and Canada.  Funds are needed to bring all players together (travel) and then secure hotel, ground transportation and catering.  A venue has been located to pracitce and play the actual game.  Uniforms, coaches, referee's....the list goes on!
The budget calls for 60% of funding to come from sponsorships and 40% to come from ticket sales.  Funding secured through Indiegogo will be part of the 60% sponsorship estimate.


The Impact
Why not show the NHL that the fans can take matters into their own hands! Let's make them think next time they think lockout that people have a voice and have a say in where their dollars are spent!


Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, we completely understand and appreciate that you are here and showing your support by taking the time to read this. Other ways you can support us:
Follow us on Twitter:https://twitter.com/BikiniHockey
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Bikini-Hockey-Lea...
And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Again, Thank you so much for your time and consideration. Now let's play HOCKEY!

story:
PLEASE READ - THIS EXPLAINS EVERYTHING!

LoudFabric is like Frankenstein!

It turned into a monster that I cannot control! Ideas sprout from everywhere. I could be doing something very serious and the most ridiculously thought could pop into my mind... at that point I MUST design! Really, LoudFabric is about expression, CONFIDENCE, enjoying life, having a sense of humor, HAVING FUN and staying positive! The concept of LoudFabric came about for 3 reasons that I can recall: 

  • 1. I personally wear T-shirts and look at them as more than just an article of clothing. they are seen as an outlet for expression in my opinion and SAY a great deal about the wearer of said fabric.
  • 2. I always have random thoughts and most of the time I'm left with "I need a t-shirt that says that."
  • 3. I like to connect with people! It's a great feeling to be somewhere and someone randomly comments on how they can relate to the shirt that you have on. That is a great feeling and I want to help others meet new people without saying a word!

There is ONLY ONE PROBLEM!

  • I DON'T HAVE THE INITIAL FUNDING TO GET THE FINISHED PRODUCT IN FRONT OF THE PEOPLE THAT WOULD LOVE TO WEAR OUTSPOKEN SHIRTS THAT SAY WHAT THEY THINK

Here is the deal... I have been approached by people on many occasions that want to know how they can get a t-shirt adorned in one of my OUTRAGEOUSLY CLEVER designs.

Attention!... Neiro Black dusted off his guitar and wrote a little song to express how he feels about the situation at hand. Listen as he pours out his heart in the Original LoudFabric "Help!" Song... 

The LoudFabric "Help!" Song by neiroblack

The Goal Is Two-Fold:

1. Raise the funds to get this party started right! (This is how your gracious donations will be used)

  • TSHIRTS!
  • Website upgrades
  • Marketing materials
  • Signage and equipment for a simple setup at festivals and trade shows
  • Packaging materials for store and online purchases (I have a vision people)

2. Create brand awareness by initiating a few hundred-million people into the LOUDFABFAM (anybody that embraces the LoudFabric Brand). We can do it! 

So... select the award you want and make a pledge, it's that simple.

How will the shirts be made? What kind of quality should we expect... you ask?

The designs will be printed using hand-pressed vinyl or screen printed depending on the how many shirts are needed per design. They will be printed on the softest, most comfortable shirts available in their respective colors (colors may vary from image). These shirts will be available in men and women styled tees and I will contact every Supporter for size information once the LoudFabric Super Soft Hand-Pressed Vinyl T-Shirt Project has been successfully funded. 

Women's:

Men's:

CHECK OUT THE DESIGNS YOU CAN CHOOSE:

I know times are tough and if you cannot afford to support financially at this time, there are other ways you can Help!

  • Help get the word out and make some noise about the LoudFabric project.
  • Also, use the Indiegogo share tools to tell everyone you know about this project!

And that’s all there is to it.

There is a STRONG possibility that I will have more designs to choose from by the time this project is completed! 

Thank ya kindly.

story:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Alle Neuigkeiten rund um Swapaholics findet ihr unter der Rubrik "Updates" (zweiter Tab über dem Video)!
Und natürlich auf Facebook (www.facebook.com/swapyourcloset) und Twitter (https://twitter.com/Swapaholics_Dtl).

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Die Idee

Wie die Mutter, so die Tochter - Den Kleiderschrank voller Klamotten, aber doch nichts zum anziehen! Mit dem ziemlich sicheren Wissen, nicht als Einzige mit diesem Problem konfrontiert zu sein, kam Cornelia und Viktoria Ngotse die Idee zu 'Swapaholics'.

Wer kennt es nicht: Irgendwie passt das Shirt vom letzten Sommer nicht mehr so recht zu deinem Stil, die neue Jeans sitzt doch nicht so gut und den Pulli, der eigentlich so toll war, zieht man nie an. Die besten Freundinnen sind zum tauschen zu weit weg. Zum Wegschmeißen ist diese Kleidung zu schade, aber stundenlang auf dem Flohmarkt sitzen möchte man auch nicht. Bei 'Swapaholics' erhält jeder die Möglichkeit, mit Millionen von Usern zu tauschen und somit praktisch virtuell z.B. in den Kleiderschränken der Freundinnen oder der Lieblingsbloggerin zu stöbern.

Eine moderne Plattform gegen Verschwendung...

'Swapaholics' entlastet nicht nur euren Geldbeutel sondern hilft vor allem der Umwelt. Recycling 2.0. Anstatt wertvolle Kleidung (falsch) zu entsorgen, findet sie auf Swapaholics einen neuen Besitzer, der sie lieben wird.

Und so funktioniert's!

Ob Frau, Mann oder Kind: Jeder kann seine gut erhaltene Kleidung auf Swapaholics einstellen. Im Gegenzug erhaltet ihr für eure eingestellten Kleidungsstücke Swap-Chips auf eurem Nutzerkonto gutgeschrieben. Diese Swap-Chips sind das 'Zahlungsmittel' bei den Swapaholics.
Deine ungetragene Jacke ist dir zu wertvoll? Dann halte diese einfach zurück, bis dich ein passendes Angebot erreicht!

Jetzt kommt ihr ins Spiel!

Das durch das Crowdfunding eingenommene Geld soll uns Gründerinnen unterstützen, die Entwicklungs- und Infrastruktur in den ersten Monaten (Büroplatz/Miete, Webentwickler, medienrechtliche Beratung) zu finanzieren, um so die Umsetzung der Website zügig sowie erfolgreich realisieren zu können.

Für eure Unterstützung möchten wir uns natürlich mit  kleinen Aufmerksamkeiten bedanken, welche ihr der Liste "Perks" entnehmen könnt.

Was passiert mit den Einnahmen, wenn wir unser Funding-Ziel nicht erreichen sollten:
Keine Angst, eure Spenden helfen uns trotzdem. Wir werden jeden Cent in den Aufbau der Website stecken und unser Bestes geben, damit ihr euch so bald wie möglich auf Swapaholics austoben und euch neue Kleidungsstücke ertauschen könnt!

 

Ein kleiner Klick für euch...

...eine riesige Unterstützung für Swapaholics!
Wenn ihr uns gerade finanziell nicht unterstützen könnt - spread the word! Erzählt eurer besten Freundin, eurem Bäcker, dem Mann neben euch in der U-Bahn (dem mit dem Anzug und der Financial Times natürlich ;)) von Swapaholics und leitet unseren Kampagnenlink über Facebook, Twitter oder Google+ weiter.
Somit helft ihr uns, viele Menschen und potenzielle Unterstützer zu erreichen.

 

Dankeschön!

story:
RULLI TORRES        w w w . r u l l i t o r r e s . c o m

My name is Raul "Rulli" Torres. I'm a Fashion Designer based in Dallas, Texas. The Fashion Industry has exploded and now everyone wants to be part of it. Fashion is easier said than done! The Glamour and spotlight are amazing but not everyone knows how much work is involved. I've spent sleepless nights working on garments for customers and fashion shows but I absolutely love it. I wouldn't change it for anything in the world. As we all know it's almost impossible to get bank loans. That is why I am seeking your help. I know I have a shot in the industry. Below are some images of my work and items that will be be sold on my online store. Please message me if you have any suggestions. Thank you! 

I am currently working with some suppliers to retail items on line. I will also be working with them to mass produce "some" of my designs. As we all know it is not cheap to mass produce anything. 

This campaign is important to me because I know I have a shot at making it in the Fashion Industry. I can't do it on my own. I need your help. I need your help to achieve my dream. I'm always giving back to non-profit organizations and our community one way or another. I always give people an opportunity to be part of my fashion shows. This is a unique and wonderful experience. I will continue to do so because you all have been very supportive of my career. I want to continue to inspire others. If you stay true to your self, accept failures, get back up, keep trying, don't give up and eventually you will achieve your goals and dreams. 

I have a few perks on here. I want you to receive something in return for your donation. You have the option of choosing a perk. You will receive your item/perk as on the date indicated after the campaign is over. Some of these perks will help me promote my brand and will help me to invest in some more inventory. Lets say I make $5000 on the t-shirts. I will take that money and invest it on purchasing some obviously. I want to continue to sell t-shirts, blazers, hats, and add to my online store. 
Below are photos are some of the items I will be selling online. Mostly everything will be ready to wear and "Normal size" other wise know as Plus size. Note: Not all of the items will be designed by me. Most of them items will be retail (bought from suppliers to sell online)




I also have a few perks where are pure contributions and will not receive anything in return. 
Please message me if you have any questions, concerns, opinions, or how I can improve my campaign. Please share with friends and anyone who might be interested in helping me out. 

SOME MORE PHOTOS OF MY WORK BELOW! photos by: Thomas Garza

story:
BAU 963 is available in two different settings: leather and NATO straps. For confident professionals, for fashion-aware people willing to gleam up while sportive, for minimalist design lovers, BAU 963 provides the setting that best fits your spirit.

 

 

 

 

For over a year we have worked in the concept, functional design, factory audits and prototype manufacturing.

 

 

We started working on more than a dozen designs, and we refined the definitive one over and over, taking out all ornaments to finally get to the basic, minimalist and functional combination, the BAU 963, a design based on the purpose and function. 

 

We have carefully considered all details: hour and minutes hands visibility and proportion, seconds hands, hours and minutes lines, size and relative position of all elements, case material and geometry, movement and finishing... 

 

 

 

 

The result? An eye-catching, smart and minimal piece that will shine in any context. All this with minimal, ultra-functional design: you just can´t help staring at it!

 

 

Materials. We choose the classic, well tested 316L Stainless Steel for the case. Polished by hand, our solid steel case it will shine forever. 

 

 

3ATM Water Resistant: A great companion for all situations.

 

 

Size. 40 mm width. Great for both men and women, with the space that a great design requires. Height: 8 mm, giving a solid feeling without compromising comfort. 

This size can be worn casually as well as in a formal ocassion. Great for both men and women.

 

 

 

 

Dial Colour. Is it white? Just white? Of course not! it´s a lovely, elegant eggshell white, with a superb and delicate fine grain. 

 

 

Straps. We have 3 options! The classic genuine leather black (included by default in all the BAU 963 watches), and two stunning Nato Nylon options: the GALIA strap, and the NAVY strap. 

Check the rewards options and get your set!

 

 

Movement. The best and yet cost effective: Citizen Miyota 2035. The fresh battery supplied with the watch will run for years. 

 

 

Glass. Mineral-hardened scratch-resistant domed crystal. 

 

 

 

 

                  

  • Case Diameter: 40 mm  
  • Case Thickness: 8 mm  
  • Strap Width: 20mm  
  • Domed Mineral Crystal
  • Solid Stainless Steel 316L Case & Caseback  
  • Japanese Miyota Movement
  • 20 mm Genuine leather Strap 
  • 20 mm Extra Nylon Natro Straps 
  • 3 ATM Water Resistance  
  • BAU Watches presentation box

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Be the first one to know about new crowdfunding launches, new perks and special flash offers by leaving your email at www.bauwatches.com

story:
As my wife and I were starting a small screen-printing business out of our garage, we sat up one night talking about how we wanted to do something that impacted people more than just 'another t-shirt shop'. After months of throwing our idea around, we thought we'd try it out and see where it went. Threads for US was born the summer of 2013. Once friends and family showed interest in what we were doing, we decided to do a pre-order through our Facebook to see how many shirts we could sell. We started the pre-order in mid October, 2013 and it ran for a month. We sold quite a few shirts and learned a lot during the process. This experience is what motivated us to start our campaign.


Our focus has shifted primarily to Threads for US because we feel our idea can not only help provide for our small family, but can also help many more families throughout the U.S. We are still doing printing jobs for local businesses to help gain skill, knowledge, and an income for our family, but all with the goal to bring Threads for US to the next level.

What is Threads for US?

Threads for US is a t-shirt company with a simple business model. With every shirt sold, we make another one that is the same style and design on a youth shirt and donate it to a child in need. Not only are the shirts donated to children in the US, but they are also made and printed here as well. We aim to empower kids of all ages by providing them with high quality clothing with style. 

Who gets the donated shirts? 

We have been in contact with many different organizations throughout the country that primarily deal with children who are either homeless, abused, orphaned, or in a low-income home. Every three months we will choose a place where the shirts will be donated and deliver them there in person. Once Threads for US picks up, our goal is to do this every month! Each person that buys a shirt will receive an email when their shirt is donated to inform them which city and organization the donation was made to. Doing so allows the process to be more personal for everyone and will give you the satisfaction of knowing where your 'sister shirt' now lives!

What will we use the money for?

First, we would like to upgrade some of our equipment, which is all 20 to 25 years old. As of right now, we are able to print what we need, but there is a lot of room for improvement. With a new printing press, we can print more efficiently and precisely. This will allow the use of more colors in the designs and a quicker print time all around. Along with the press, we'd like to upgrade our conveyor dryer. It is not very energy efficient and takes a long time to reach the right operating temperature.

Second, we would like to start keeping a small stock of shirts so when orders come in, we can pack and ship them that week. We would keep this inventory to a minimum for now to ensure there is not too much over-stock.

We would also like to use the money to design some new graphics for Threads for US. What is available right now is just a small amount of what we would like to have. We want to have enough to keep people interested in us and to give kids more to choose from when the donations are made.

Here's the Break-Down!

  • $10,000 for upgrading equipment

  • $4,000 for Inventory, website and design development

  • $6,000 will go towards fulfilling rewards

  • $3,000 to fees with Indie Go-Go and Paypal

If our campaign does go above and beyond our goal, we will split that money into our equipment and inventory funds and upgrade even more!  This campaign is not to help line our pockets, but to help get Threads for US off the ground and providing kids with some awesome shirts!

Future Goals

As well as buying new printing equipment, starting a small inventory, and creating new designs, we would eventually like to grow our product line to be more than just shirts.  We would like to see Threads for US as a full apparel line with everything made and donated in America. We have a long journey ahead, but it is something that we are extremely passionate about.

Some samples of the shirts

Unisex Tri-Blend T-shirt - Threads for US "Badge" - XS - 3XL


Unisex Tri-Blend T-shirt - Threads for US "Shield" - XS - 3XL


Unisex Tri-Blend Tank - Threads for US "Badge" - XS - 2XL


Unisex Tri-Blend Tank - Threads for US "Shield" - XS - 2XL


Womens Tri-Blend T-shirt - Threads for US "Badge" S - 2XL


Womens Tri-Blend T-shirt - Threads for US "Shield" S - 2XL


Womens Racerback Tank - Threads for US "Badge" - XS - 2XL


Unisex Tri-Blend Pullover - Threads for US "Badge" XS - 3XL


All Shirts are Tri-Blend (50% poly, 37% cotton, 13% rayon), which means they are VERY soft and light weight. They are printed with a process called discharge. Using this technique gives the design on the shirt little to no feel at all!
story_txt:
As
my wife and I were starting a small screen-printing business out of
our garage, we sat up one night talking about how we wanted to do
something that impacted people more than just 'another t-shirt shop'.
After months of throwing our idea around, we thought we'd try it out
and see where it went. Threads
for US was
born the summer of 2013. Once friends and family showed interest in
what we were doing, we decided to do a pre-order through our Facebook
to see how many shirts we could sell. We started the pre-order in mid
October, 2013 and it ran for a month. We sold quite a few shirts and
learned a lot during the process. This experience is what motivated
us to start our campaign.

Our
focus has shifted primarily to Threads
for US because
we feel our idea can not only help provide for our small family, but
can also help many more families throughout the U.S. We are still
doing printing jobs for local businesses to help gain skill,
knowledge, and an income for our family, but all with the goal to
bring Threads
for US to
the next level.What is Threads for US?Threads for US is a t-shirt company with a simple business model. With every shirt sold, we make another one that is the same style and design on a youth shirt and donate it to a child in need. Not only are the shirts donated to children in the US, but they are also made and printed here as well. We aim to empower kids of all ages by providing them with high quality clothing with style. Who
gets the donated shirts? 
We have been in contact with many different organizations throughout the
country that primarily deal with children who are either homeless,
abused, orphaned, or in a low-income home. Every three months we will
choose a place where the shirts will be donated and deliver them
there in person. Once Threads
for US picks
up, our goal is to do this every month! Each person that buys a shirt
will receive an email when their shirt is donated to inform them
which city and organization the donation was made to. Doing so allows
the process to be more personal for everyone and will give you the
satisfaction of knowing where your 'sister shirt' now lives!

What will
we use the money for?

First, we would like to upgrade some of our equipment, which is all 20 to 25
years old. As of right now, we are able to print what we need, but
there is a lot of room for improvement. With a new printing press, we can print more efficiently and precisely. This will allow the use of
more colors in the designs and a quicker print time all around. Along
with the press, we'd like to upgrade our conveyor dryer. It is not
very energy efficient and takes a long time to reach the right
operating temperature.

Second, we would like to start keeping a small stock of shirts so when orders
come in, we can pack and ship them that week. We would keep this
inventory to a minimum for now to ensure there is not too much
over-stock.

We
would also like to use the money to design some new graphics
for Threads
for US.
What is available right now is just a small amount of what we would
like to have. We want to have enough to keep people interested in us
and to give kids more to choose from when the donations are made.

Here's the
Break-Down!



	$10,000 for
	upgrading equipment



	$4,000 for
	Inventory, website and design development


	$6,000 will
	go towards fulfilling rewards
$3,000 to fees with Indie Go-Go and Paypal

If
our campaign does go above and beyond our goal, we will split that
money into our equipment and inventory funds and upgrade even more!
 This campaign is not to help line our pockets, but to help
get Threads
for US off
the ground and providing kids with some awesome shirts!Future GoalsAs well as buying new printing equipment, starting a small inventory, and creating new designs, we would eventually like to grow our product line to be more than just shirts.  We would like to see Threads for US as a full apparel line with everything made and donated in America. story:
Our New Campaign is live! Check out Craft Wallet 2.0

 

The Craft Wallet

After searching for a small wallet that could carry more than just cards I decided to make the Craft Wallet.
The Craft Wallet is both very practical and thin. With just 8mm of thickness it can hold up to 7 normal cards and it couldn't be easier to take them out.
  
Just Push The Button 
The Craft Wallet mechanical system allows you to slide out your cards in a second and choose easily because they will come out in stair.
 
Because a Wallet isn't just for cards, on the back of the Craft Wallet there is a small pocket where you can store up to 5 cards, coins and bills so that you can be ready for anything that comes in your day while keeping a thin and small wallet.
 

On our website you can costumize your wallet choosing between the 7 diferent leather colors available and the two anodization colors available.

 

 

 

 

Stretch Goals

1st Stretch Goal - At $10,000 the Craft Wallet Clip will be available as an add-on.
After talking with my manufacturer I was able to lower quantities required so I was able to make the Craft Wallet Clip sooner!!

 

 



2nd Stretch Goal - At $14,000 the Craft Wallet Pounch will be available as a substitute for the Leather Pocket

See how well your cards are secured with the Craft Wallet

 

Check out Roy's review at bestslimwallet.com:

 

Check out Jonathan Podcast at:

www.crowdfundingcast.tk

 

What does the Craft Wallet means for me?

My dream is to see people using my products and make them part of your everyday life. The Craft Wallet is perfect for this because it is aimed for all the people who are tired of using the same old bulky wallet but are not ready to ditch functionality and ease of use.

 

Risks and Challenges 

Having experience in production and excelent partners that never failed I think that the risk of the wallet not being produce is null.

My biggest concern is really the delivery on time which I don't expect to have problems with.

 

Other ways you can help

If you believe on the utility of this wallet and you want to see it in your pocket but you don't really feel comfortable to contribute now you can still help me. I need to make as much noise as possible so if you could share this campaign it would be a huge help.

 

FAQ

How do I choose the leather color?

You can visit the Craft Wallet website to see the available colors. www.craft-wallet.com and after buying the Craft Wallet you can choose your Craft Wallet here: http://goo.gl/forms/L8B23tjxpg 

Can I change leathers after I buy the wallet?

The leather is glued to the wallet because when you apply force to the button to take out the cards it would slide if it wasn't glued. But we will offer a service where you can send back the wallet and we will change and glue a new leather for 8USD plus shipping.

story:
Hi everybody, thank you for visiting our indigogo page! We are a couple of guys who share a passion for watches and vintage motor sport, therefore we decided to create an elegant and timeless watch brand in spirit of vintage motorsport.

Camber Watches are all about fine watch making and vintage motorsport. We are planning to create different chapters of this story. Our first chapter tells the story of one of the oldest forms of motor sport: The Hillclimb

Hill Climbing is one of the oldest forms of Motorsport. It is a branch of Motorsport in which drivers compete against time to complete an uphill course and is therefore a battle against time. As the drivers climb toward the summit, the thin air slows reflexes and reduces muscle strength. The thin air also robs engines of to 30% of their power. Competitors and vehicles must be in top shape simply to finish…let alone win!

In hill climbing every tenth of a second counts; therefore we decided to create a timepiece with a special chronograph movement which is able to measure time down to one tenth of a second. It’s dial is inspired by the early mechanical stop watches who where used at motor sporting events.

 Steel combination

 Blacksteel combination

Roségold plated combination

Especially for this kickstarter campaign we managed to create great watch sets complete with matching cufflinks and original packaging for all backers for only €88 ($98) including free world wide shipping! Sets of multiple watches are even less expensive

A litle extra: Because we already reached our stretch goals earlier we will provide EVERY Camber watch set with 2 extra watch straps!

1: Nato strap

2: Tyre track strap



  • Case Diameter : 42 mm 
  • Case Thickness : 13 mm 
  • Lug Width : 20 mm 
  • Lug-to-Lug : 52 mm 
  • Crown : 7x3 mm, engraved with logo 
  • Weight : 78 gram
  • Crystal : Mineral, slightly domed 
  • Case Material : Alloy, Black PVD, Rose gold plated 
  • Case back : Stainless steel 
  • Movement : Quartz Chronograph, Sunon Caliber PE903 
  • Genuine leather strap : 20 mm, leather, tapers down to 18 mm 
  • Clasp : 18 mm signed pin buckle 
  • Water Resistance : 3 ATM (50 m) 
  • Dial: ivory and black

 
To complete you appearance we designed a special vintage steering wheel shaped cufflinks, matching the watch.

Because it’s such a great story we designed a special book shaped watch and cufflinks box. This Book shaped box will give the perfect shelter for your watch and cufflinks. Also we are planning to keep this packaging for future editions so it’s a great feature to collect all the different chapters next to each other. We put a great deal of details in the design of the box, such as linen cover, marble printed inside cover, embossed details and vintage high gloss photograph.

We spend a year to find the right manufacturer for our watches, cufflinks and packaging and we found great partners, after thorough inspection of there quality standard and supply chain reliability. We are a 100% confident that we can deliver a great products in a short amount of time for just the right price!

 To start this brand we need a plede of 18 800euro (approx. $21000) Please help us by backing this project and become one of our first brand ambassadors and we will not let you down for great future editions.

All the ideas we had for camber watches came to life with the amazing work of Bart de Keyzer of www.3rd-floor.org and all the great pictures are made by Eva Meijer www.evameijer.com

Risks and challenges

Because of our thorough investigation of our production process and excessive sample testing we are very confident that the will not be greats risks or challenges to this project, the only reel challenge is to get enough support from the indigogo community to set all wheels in motion

story_txt: a

story:
Let’s face it; working out can be tough. Where to do it, when to do it and of course the time to do it. Plus, there’s all the workout equipment, the travel and the thought of being stuck inside the gym. There is a need for a practical way to workout that fits every lifestyle.

The EMPACK answers the call. It’s about Evolving Motion. Changing the way we think about fitness and the equipment you’ve been stuck with for years. It’s the FIRST AND ONLY backpack designed to serve as a weight training pack. The water bladders allow you to add weight and incorporate it into your daily routine, replacing the need for constant upgrades in your equipment. It’s military-grade durability allows it to withstand serious wear and tear as well as Mother Nature. The EMPACK is about freeing your fitness so you can workout on your terms. 

The EMPACK is way more than just a fitness product. It’s a patent-pending, innovative way to do fitness- fun, out of the box, and evolved.   

BENEFITS: 

• Replaces the constant need for more weight. 
• Eliminate buying dumbbells. As you get stronger, add more water.
• Versatile for any kind of workout.
• Military-grade durability

• Portability to go wherever you do.

USAGES:

Use it like a barbell.

The two main handles are durable and shaped for all hand sizes. This is the bread and butter of the pack: deadlifts, weighted squats, power cleans, squat cleans, thrusters, bent over rows, lunges, good mornings...The list goes on and on.

Use it like a dumbbell.

Grab the handles on the top and bottom of the pack for variations even better than dumbbell movements: Russian twists (shown), overhead sit-ups, strict press, bench press, and more.

Use it like a kettlebell.

Grab the main handle and a side handle to use exactly like a kettlebell. Think kettlebell snatches, clean and presses, Turkish Get-Ups, single arm thrusters…the possibilities are endless.

Use it for weighted planks, use it for weighted push-ups.

 FEATURES: 

 

EmPack as a backpack has multiple features to make it the ultimate travel and lifestyle bag.

• Durable backpack straps that are not only comfortable and sturdy, but removable for when you are ready to turn this backpack into the ultimate training pack.
• A front side zipper that is just as convenient as my fanny pack.
• A laptop sleeve.
• Plenty of space for clothes, books, or a night out of town.
 
 

EmPack as a training pack takes this regular backpack into the unique, amazing product it is.

• 6 handles to allow for endless training possibilities, the two most used handles made with sturdy tubing for optimal holding.
• A separate sleeve directly behind the laptop sleeve for when using ONE water bladder to keep in a stable position without comprising the affects of training with an unstable load. 
• Capacity for FOUR water bladders at 15 pounds each, for a total capacity of 60 pounds, all in water bladders that are extremely compact for when not in use. 
• Military grade material to make it throwable, droppable, and life-proof!
 

MY INSPIRATION: 

 

The light bulb for the EMPACK came to me when I was at the CrossFit Games watching my girlfriend compete. I was stuck in a hotel with absolutely no gym, and I was desperate to workout. I didn't just want to do typical bodyweight movements, like air squats and burpees. I wanted to lift! So, I took a suitcase, stuffed it with everything remotely heavy in the hotel room, and I lifted. It was tough, I was sore, and it made me realize that I needed to create something that not only would allow for amazing, effective workouts wherever you were, but could help my clients easily increase weight as they got stronger without spending a fortune on equipment!

THE WEIGHT 

My double sealed water bladders are extremely durable yet take no room in your EMPACK when not in use. Keep them filled and in your car ready to go. Keep them filled and in your own gym. Empty them, travel, and fill as needed! Hike up a mountain or sprint up the stairs with the added weight, but save your knees for when you come back down! 

AS YOU GET STRONGER, YOU JUST ADD MORE WATER.

Each bladder holds 15 pounds of unstable weight, and the Pack holds 4 bladders total. This unstable weight that is shifting with you as you move makes the weight not only more challenging, but more effective. 

MADE FOR EVERY LIFESTYLE

The EMPACK was created to make working out seamless no matter where you go. From business trips to mountain hikes, it provides the flexibility and durability to go where life takes you.

DESIGN

This weight training pack was born out of the need for everyday people to get an everyday workout without all the equipment. Fit, form and function was key in its design. It fits smoothly to all body styles. The form is modern and stylish, and the function is flexible to meet your training needs. Its military-grade durability allows it to stand up to the toughest workouts and the harshest weather. The EMPACK was also designed with the versatility to go on the road, be kept in your car, or used at home.

PRODUCTION

Through lots of trial and error, time and money the EMPACK will be U.S. made in the Mile High City of Denver, Colorado. 

            

 My AskEm YouTube Series all about the details of the EmPack! 

A SINCERE THANK YOU

I truly appreciate everyone taking the time to support my EMPACK project! This has been a dream of mine for over a year, and I am thrilled at the opportunity to bring this idea to LIFE! 

Please help me spread the word to your friends and loved ones! 

xox

Em
story_txt:
THE WAIT IS OVER! HEAD OVER TO MY NEW WEBSITE and get your EmPack today! 
 

 
 
NO MORE PRE-ORDERS! We are up and running over at www.theempack.com! 
 
 
ADVENTURE AWAITS. 
Go see HERE how I filled the reservoirs up before this gorgeous Oregon hike. 
 Look at these snazzy things! It's coming together! New Expo Banner! Can't wait to start showing these Packs off to the world!  Water is not your typical stable weight. This thing gets HEAVY. Even my most intense exercisers will most likely stick with 3 water reservoirs, but I filled it up for a total of 55#s and it was super fun and challenging to run with!    THE THREE COLORS HAVE BEEN CONFIRMED!   


 Which color fits your Superhero self?! 
 New Details on this badass pack are in! We are officially happy and content with the design, the shape, the durability, and the awesomeness of this Pack and I want to share some details with you! 1. A hideaway zipper to stay out of the way when you are throwing this baby around getting strong:  2. Double backed stitching on every handle to ensure durability and longevity!
 3. Easy loophole straps to quickly tighten and release as needed when going from backpack mode to TRAINING mode. 
 4. Velcro addition to the end of the backpack straps while in use as a weighted vest! 
5. Look how much room this baby holds!!!This is first and foremost a convenient backpack with a laptop sleeve and a ton of room for any trip you might be going on!

THE WEIGHT 
My double sealed water bladders are extremely durable yet take no room in your EMPACK when not in use. Keep them filled and in your car ready to go. Keep them filled and in your own gym. Empty them, travel, and fill as needed! Hike up a mountain or sprint up the stairs with the added weight, but save your knees for when you come back down! 
AS YOU GET STRONGER, YOU JUST ADD MORE WATER.
Each bladder holds 15 pounds of unstable weight, and the Pack holds 4 bladders total. This unstable weight that is shifting with you as you move makes the weight not only more challenging, but more effective. 
MADE FOR EVERY LIFESTYLE
The EMPACK was created to make working out seamless no matter where you go. From business trips to mountain hikes, it provides the flexibility and durability to go where life takes you.
DESIGN
This weight training pack was born out of the need for everyday people to get an everyday workout without all the equipment. Fit, form and function was key in its design. It fits smoothly to all body styles. The form is modern and stylish, and the function is flexible to meet your training needs. Its military-grade durability allows it to stand up to the toughest workouts and the harshest weather. The EMPACK was also designed with the versatility to go on the road, be kept in your car, or used at home.
PRODUCTION
Through lots of trial and error, time and money the EMPACK will be U.S. made in the Mile High City of Denver, Colorado. 



 
             
  Filled and Unfilled Water Bladder 
  
  My AskEm YouTube Series all about the details of the EmPack! 
A SINCERE THANK YOU
I truly appreciate everyone taking the time to support my EMPACK project! This has been a dream of mine for over a year, and I am thrilled at the opportunity to bring this idea to LIFE! 
Please help me spread the word to your friends and loved ones! 
xox
Em

story:
My Passion

  My previous project was dedicated only to leathergoods. But this time I wanted to experiment with materials and I decided to combine perfect vegetable tanned leather with solid brass anchor. As finish we make plating with precious metals as gold and silver to make them shine bright!


Perks

ANCHOR BRACELET- is perfect men accessory, which will fit any style.

As guys don`t have great choice in accessory, we spent a lot of time to make anchor look perfect. To make your style luxury we can add silver or gold platting, to make it shine. As a finish you can choose different colors of leather or cord strap for perfect fitting your style.

  • Designed anchor
  • Finishing of anchor: silver plated, gold plated and rose gold plated
  • Strap color: leather (black, brown, beige), rope (blue, green, red)
  • Handmade grinding and polishing
  • Adjustable length (fits any size of wrist)
  • Dimension of anchor: length 34mm, width 25mm, weight 5,5 gram.

Prototypes and design

We have spent more than 3 weeks developing design. We want anchor to look like jewellery masterpiece. It was made by talented jewellery designer, who have 10 years experience.


Our team


Why do I need your support?

  I spend a lot time to make sure that I have nice designed and well made accessory. I need funds to make mould, pay craftsman for casting anchors, grinding, polishing and plating (when we make bulk order, it will reduce high cost of these operations).Also funds will be spent on assembling, packaging and shipping to YOU.

story:
GhostStryke™ Bluetooth All-In- One Earbuds offer the world’s first and only true all in one ear bud giving you the best performance in personal sound. 

 Hearing Enhancement

Hearing Protection

At the Same Time!

OR

Bluetooth audio for music & hands free communication

OR

You can choose to have all 3 features working at once!

Now you can have:

Your music playing clearly,

while controlling your ambient noise with both speech and background noise to the hearing level you desire,

while automatically blocking any loud sounds from entering into your ear canal causing the most damage.

All at the Same Time!

That's Right- You Can Choose One or the Other or All the Above At the Same Time!

 

Now you can get the most advanced hearing/sound enhancement with automatic hearing protection and the best audio for your music and hands free connectivity all in one pair of ear buds.

GhostStryke Bluetooth Earbuds allow you to cover all the features in all the above devices and for a small fraction of the price.

GhostStryke Bluetooth Earbuds can go with you everywhere and take care of all your hearing, music, hearing protection and hands free communication needs in one device and for a super affordable price. This is the world's first true ear buds that handle all these features with clarity, quality and simplicity.

REMEMBER- When it comes to hearing protection, plugging off the ear canal with a good seal is the best protection possible. Significantly better than large bulky head muffs.

 

Our patented ShortRounds™ is design to fit all ears. Simply rotate it to fit large to small ears. Plus you’ll experience the greatest comfort and most secure fit of any ear bud on the market- no matter how strenuous your activities are.

If you don’t need hearing protection for particular activities, simply replace them with our silicone tips to provide an ‘open ear’ experience and minimize that ‘plugged up’ feeling.

  • You’ll also get 12 hours of hearing enhancement with simultaneous hearing protection or 5 hours of audio/music streaming to listen to your favorite playlists.
  • Rechargeable Lithium Battery For Maximum Convenience 20 Minute Quick Charge gives you 2 hours of play time or 2 hours for full recharge. 
  • Dual Control Sticks to Properly Balance the Earbuds During Any Activity

 

Here’s what mattered to us and what we saw was needed in the market:

  • Truly comfortable earbuds that you could wear all day long and hardly notice you were wearing anything.
  • Properly designed earbuds to stay in your ears no matter how rigorous your activities. 
  • Excellent Music Audio
  • Excellent Voice Quality for Hands Free Communication
  • Hearing Enhancement with Simultaneous Hearing Protection to Hear What You Need to, Without Having to Pull Earbuds out of Your Ears.
  • Hearing/Sound Enhancement to Hear Life in Full Surround Sound No Matter Where You Are and What You are Doing Even in today’s world.

Few people realize how amazing they could be hearing all the great sounds of the outdoors with premium sound enhancement to bring you the best sounds of nature and beyond.

Plus so many other areas, where surround sound will help you tremendously

Work environments, construction, road crews, auto racing, mechanics and so many more where you need to be able to hear sounds easily, effortlessly and even better than your normal hearing (whether you have normal hearing or some degree of hearing loss). You’ll be blown away to hear how cool life sounds in full surround sound in your ears.

Most studies show that more than 150M Americans and more than 40% of the Rest of the World’s population needs a product that allows you to hear better while protecting your ears.

Instead of just plugging up your ears and blocking your ability to hear well get the GhostStryke™ Bluetooth for Ultimate Wireless Connectivity Sleek design and performance!

story:
WHAT'S THE CHARGE-BELT??

The Charge-Belt is an innovative and fashionable way to charge any USB device! That's right any USB device!  Everyone has been in a situation where their USB device has died during an important conversation, email, text meassage or even during that final stage of words with friends!  The creators of the Charge-Belt have solved the problem! You can now charge your USB device and at the same time look like your going down the catwalk during NYC fashion week! 

WHO WE ARE

The founders of the Charge-Belt are two innovative young entrepreneur who met each other via YouTube.  Marcus H. Mitchell is a national recording saxophone artist and GRAMMY AWARD VOTING MEMBER .  Paul Kyros is an up and coming technology WIZ KID based out of Pittsburgh PA.

The goal for funding for the expansion of the Charge-Belt is $50,000.  The funds will help to develop the Charge-Belt for production, testing and manufacturing.  The funding will also  help to pay for needed consulting services which will be provided by Daymond John. Daymond is the star of the hit ABC Show SHARK TANK!  Daymond will provide the Charge-Belt team with the needed expertise to make sure the product reaches the masses. 

PERKS

HERE'S THE BEST PART! THE PERKS!


For being apart of the movement, you will have a range of perks to choose from. Ranging from customize belts, attending the official launch party with celebrity guest and even becoming a CO-FOUNDER!  If we don't reach our goal, we will still use the funds for further development of the product.

WHY THE CHARGE BELT IS IMPORTANT TO THE WORLD!!

The Charge-Belt solves the growing need and demand for every USB device owner.  With just a click, your USB device can now be fully charged and you can now worry about more important things in life! 

 

Frequently Asked Questions.

Q. How do you plan to develop the concept more?

 A The goal will be to obtain expert consulting and advice from Daymond John.  From there, create a quality product for you the customer.  Also, TESTING, TESTING, TESTING!  The Charge-Belt will undergo a series of wide ranged testing to secure satisfaction.

 

Q. How much will the Charge-Belt cost?

A  We will know final costs to produce the charge belt after we optimize the Charge-Belt with results from test and begin manufacturing plans for scale. We then will begin preparing the Charge-Belt  for price points in each speciifc market, focused particularly on making it affordable in developing economies and regions.

Risks

We are committed to developing the Charge-Belt to it's full potential. We also know that many things can arise and cause some risk factors.

Delays- With any new company, we expect delays in product development and manufacturing. Our goal is to deliver a quality product so are customers are fully statisfied. 

Any other questions, ask away!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help in so many other ways as well! Share with your friends via facebook, twitter etc. Also, make sure to use the Indiegogo share tools!  Thanks for your support!

 

THE CHARGE-BELT IS A PATENT PENDING PRODUCT.
