story:
We are Seoul based brand making products based on MOLLE system. MOLLE is Modular Lightweight Load-carrying Equipment. Molle backpacks are widely utilized by a number of NATO armed forces, especially the United States Army and Ashena Unit (Afghanistan based South Korean troop). Molle is the system that compatible pouchs and accessories can be attached to rows of heavy-duty nylon stitches on backpacks and vest.


Our MOLLE is consisting of Nylon Webbing and Velcro this time. 

This clip below explains and shows how our MOLLE system works: 


The Tactical City Pack is a backpack that's inspired by military gears and designed for everyone to carry in the city and outdoors. It can carry 17" laptop, iPAD, portable mobile battery and the hydration bladder. The fundamental design of Tactical City Pack came with the MOLLE attachment system. 

Here is the clip for the features of the Tactical City Pack:


19 features of the Tactical City Pack.


And it also comes in NAVY.



To View Tactical City Pack-NAVY On PC, CLICK HERE!

To View Tactical City Pack-NAVY On Mobile, CLICK HERE!


Tactical City Pouch is a set of MOLLE accessories consisting of Big Pouch Waist Bag, Medium Pouch, and Small Pouch. All Tactical City Pouches are made of Cordura 1000D, Nylong webbings, and Genuine Leather and enable to attach with each other and Tactical City Pack. Tactical City Pouch is the best set of small bag for work, outdoors, travel, gym and daily essentials.  

This explains why:


Big Pouch Waist Bag is a bag that modules with Medium Pouch, Small Pouch and Tactical City Pack.  

Big Pouch Waist Bag is the best pouch as a toiletry case complete when you go to travel and the best waist bag when you go to the gym or ride a bike.



To View Big Pouch Waist Bag-NAVY On PC, CLICK HERE!

To View Big Pouch Waist Bag-NAVY On Mobile, CLICK HERE!


Medium Pouch is a little bag that's attachable to Big Pouch Waist Bag and Tactical City Pack. Medium Pouch can be awesomely used in 3 ways.  

1st. As an extra battery, cable, or charger carry pouch attached to the Tactical City Pack, when you go to travel.

2nd. As an outdoor stuff carry pouch attached to Big Pouch Waist Bag, when you go to the gym.

3rd. As a daily essential carry pouch hung on pants, when you go to a casual place.


To View Medium Pouch-NAVY On PC, CLICK HERE!

To View Medium Pouch-NAVY On Mobile, CLICK HERE!


Small Pouch is a little bag that's attachable to the Big Pouch Waist Bag and Tactical City Pack. Medium Pouch can be awesomely used in 3 ways. 

1st. As a passport, ID, or travel essential carry pouch attached to shoulder strap of the Tactical City Pack, when you go to travel.  

2nd. As an outdoor stuff carry pouch attached to Big Pouch Waist Bag, when you go to the gym.

3rd. As a daily essential carry pouch hung on pants, when you go to a casual place.



To View Small Pouch-NAVY On PC, CLICK HERE!

To View Small Pouch-NAVY On Mobile, CLICK HERE!




"In 2010, I came to South Korea from Texas to join army. And in June 2011, I was shipped to Afghanistan as 3rd deployment of Ashena unit, Afghanistan based South Korean troop. While participating 30 missions for 6 months, two things always inspired me."

First - "While participating 30 missions for 6 months, I have used many military gears and backpack was my personal favorite. Military backpack I used was strong, tough, and durable. However, military backpack  was not perfect for my electronic devices since I liked to carry electronic devices out of the base. So I thought that military backpack would be a great functional bag if it has functionality that stores and protects electronic devices."

Second - "One day, I went on a mission and saw a lot of children living in poor conditions and asking for pen and paper. A little later I found out that Afghan children work, starve, and have had hard access to opportunity of education due to the long period of war. I wanted to help children through 1:1 supportive program upon arrival in South Korea home. However, there was no such program. I wanted to do something. Then military backpack crossed my mind and thought that it would an exciting project if I put the bag business idea with helping children in war."

Eshena has been named after Ashena unit in Afghanistan based South Korean troop. Ashena means ‘friend’ in Afghan local language. As we focus on functionality and purpose, we are trying to make functional products based on experience in military and run business with the purpose of helping Afghan children get an opportunity of education.

"I know those ideas and actions won't change the world much, but I felt like I have to do this project since I am one of a few who has experienced military gears through war and seen Afghan children."



WEBSITE: WWW.ESHENAGEAR.COM

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/AshenaPage/

INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/eshenagear/

TWITTER: https://twitter.com/eshenagear


Please note that we provide 1 year of warranty from the day of purchase (based on delivery confirmation) only for breakdown of zippers (including zipper pulls). If the zippers of your bag break, email us at eshena.official@gmail.com and we will let you know what to do.

If you are not completely satisfied with your product(s) and want to exchange, we can help you out, but please understand that you are responsible for the two way shipping since international shipping cost is high. You can send us product(s) within 30 days of purchase (based on delivery confirmation) and please make sure product(s) including tags, inside packages, and included items should not be damaged or worn. 

Please note that we don't unfortunately accept returns that are sold on Kickstarter as we are selling at highly discounted prices.


All rewards will be shipped from the warehouse in Seoul, South Korea and please note that import duties are not included in the item price or shipping cost. It depends on countries but buyers normally pay the import duties when order is over $200.

Risks and challenges

Did you know that most outdoor gear is manufactured by Korean owned factories? Korea is the number 2 market for outdoor gear sales. Over 2 years of research, we found out Korean manufacturer with factories in Korea, China, and Vietnam. All factories are fully under control and keep the same highest quality. We are using materials most outdoor and military manufacturers use around the world and our manufacturer has been producing outdoor gears over 20 years and done producing global brand gears many times. We have built strong relationship with our manufacturer over 2 years. We normally buy materials and make products through Korean manufacturers. However, over 1,000 order, we will make products through factories in China or Vietnam.

DELAYS

We are committed to delivering our products to our backers, and make sure all backers get our great products. If any unexpected delays happen, backers are first to know about it.

story:
Save time. Save space. Save energy.

Save your jeans!

The Problem:

Jeans have been around for over 100 years and yet there is no good way to hang or dry them. Yes, isn't that crazy? Folding your jeans causes wrinkles and creases. Drying your jeans in a clothes dryer not only shrinks your jeans but damages the denim over time. Using drying racks to dry your jeans is way too time consuming. Standard clip pant hangers take too much time to use, don't work properly, break easily and they can damage your jeans.

The Solution:

A jean hanger that delicately holds your jeans, is easy to use, never creates wrinkles or creases and also helps dry your jeans; all at the same time.

As a designer I have spent my life creating functional apparel and products. When I started working for a jean maker I realized that standard pant hangers were not functional. I also wanted to save energy, and not shrink or damage my jeans by putting them in a clothes dryer. So I decided to design a solution that would be simple, long lasting and effective. 


Design Details: 


1) Easy to use.

2) No more creases or wrinkles from folding.

3) Fits on all jeans or pants with standard belt loops

4) Easy solution for drying jeans

5) No moving parts

6) Lasts a lifetime



Yes, a quality product that will last a lifetime.

The Jean Hanger is a one solid piece of beech wood with no moving parts. Therefore it will not be prone to breaking like other pant hangers. The hanger is .5 inches wide so it is very sturdy. As well, the hook is is screwed into the wood so that it is secure. If the hook ever breaks, which is highly unlikely, it can be easily replaced (by me) without having to throw away the essential wood component.

Sizing:

The jean hanger fits a 22 inch waist to a 44 inch waist jean or pant.

The Jean Hanger(19 inches) is barely wider than a regular top hanger(18 inches) so it fits easily in any closet. Fits any waist size.

The jean hanger prototypes were built over the course of a year at the Makerlab in Vancouver, BC. Pictures of the process are featured below:

Final thoughts: 

With your support this will be the first of many smart designs to come. Our goal, like the jean hanger, will be to create functionally better products for everyday use, energy savings and convenience. Thank you for your support!

Sincerely,

Steven Sal Debus

story:
Offering comfort, speed, style, and security...you'll never leave the house again without this premium modern day minimalist wallet.

Press // Contact MostRadco(at)gmail.com

Men's Journal: "His idea was the Minimalist, and, apparently, it's exactly what a lot of men had been searching for. We like it, too. It's all about security, speed, and a slim profile. But even without the RFID-blocking layer hidden behind the leather lining, this would still be an ideal wallet. With a profile just a bit bigger than that of a credit card, the front pocket-friendly Minimalist allows everything you really need but forces you to figure out what exactly that is. While there are two interior pockets, there's no billfold pocket. But there is an elastic bill band. Opposite that are three card slots. And on the outside of the wallet is a "slide pocket" – a card pocket with a thumb pathway cut out for easy proffering of your favorite plastic. Now add to all that the fact that the Minimalist barely breaks an ounce on the scale."

GearMoose: "...at only 1.2 ounces, you might forget that you’re even carrying it, which is exactly what we’re looking for in a minimalist wallet."

Crunchwear: "The first thing you’d notice about this wallet is the weight, in that it barely weighs anything."

Envynde: "Undoubtedly there is nothing cooler than whipping out your wallet and flicking out your bank card in a moment’s notice to complete a purchase."

Available Styles

Original Minimalist (Black w/Embossed Logo)

Executive Minimalist (Black or Brown w/No Logo) 

Indiegogo Minimalist (Black w/Blue Accents)

Redrum Minimalist (Black/Red Accents)

Kickstarter Minimalist (Black/Green Accents) 

For years, being known as "that guy" with the 5-pound wallet spewing out change, receipts, and gum wrappers every time it made an embarrassing appearance outside of my pants pocket, I realized it was time for a drastic change.

I hit the web and began what turned out to be a months long search for the "perfect" wallet.  I knew I needed to downsize, but all of the popular minimalist wallets were simply TOO minimal with slots for only cards and folded bills.  Call me "old fashioned", but I'd like to have a little extra space to store some other necessities in my wallet without going overboard.  This is when I knew I had to design my own.

At 3:00am one night back in February, I whipped out some duct tape and with this glorious design element I began to construct the first prototype.

After field testing the duct tape prototype for a few weeks, it was time to manufacture a real product.  Since I personally don't have the necessary resources to produce such a product, I hit the web in search of the perfect manufacturer.  Finding a manufacturer that could produce this wallet at a high quality and also meet my demands for integrated RFID protection was no easy task.

I mocked up the dimensions, showcased the features with a prototype, and then began emailing my inquiry to several manufacturers in hopes to find the perfect company to produce these wallets.  After discussing with dozens, I finally came in contact with an amazing large scale manufacturer that could fulfill all my requests. Using my Photoshop mock ups, they brought my vision to life and the first ever Most Rad™ Minimalist sample was delivered to my door.  

When designing the Most Rad™ Minimalist wallet, I had four main priorities in mind.  I wanted to bring the customer comfort, speed, style, and security all at an affordable price.

The Most Rad™ Minimalist offers three interior card slots, two interior pockets, an outside on-the-go slot for your favorite card and an elastic band to hold bills.

Comfort

With a depth of just 6.4mm, the Most Rad™ Minimalist wallet slips in your back or front pockets with ease.  Sit in comfort, you'll forget you're even carrying a wallet.

Speed

I've incorporated an on-the-go pocket on the back of the Most Rad™ Minimalist so you can utilize your favorite card without ever having to open your wallet.  In and out with just a slide!

Style

The Most Rad™ Minimalist retains classic and premium leather styling that most modern day minimalist wallets today simply lack.  Offering the quality and style of a designer brand wallet at a much more affordable price, the Most Rad™ Minimalist stands as the perfect alternative.

Security

With the increasing threats of wireless identity theft, I wanted to make sure my personal information was secure.  After contacting dozens of manufacturers, I finally came across one that was able to incorporate an RFID protective coating within the lining of the Most Rad™ Minimalist ensuring your protection and security against RFID identity theft.

The Most Rad™ Minimalist loaded with 12 cards.

The Most Rad™ Minimalist offers several different storage options for your necessities. 

If the money band doesn't attract you, you can easily store your bills in one of the side pockets the Most Rad™ Minimalist has to offer.  A great alternative for our International pledgers.  (The bills fit all the way inside the pockets.)

You may also find other uses for the card slots and pockets, as I have.  Keys, coins, cards, etc... all fit within the allotted slots. I know how important those Euro coins can be!

and for the adventurers...

The Most Rad™ Minimalist specifications are as follows...

3 7/8 x 3 x .25 (inches) or 98.4 x 76.2 x 6.4 (mm)

My iPhone 5 stacked on the Most Rad™ Minimalist compared to a traditional wallet.

The Most Rad™ Minimalist only weighs 1.2oz!

I've partnered up with an amazing manufacturing company to produce the Most Rad™ Minimalist in the highest quality.  They specialize in wallet production on a large scale basis and have perfectly transformed my vision into a real life product. 

The wallets are produced in house from start to finish at their facility.  The leather is layed out, measured, cut and then sewn precisely to specification.  From there they will be shipped to me to sort, package, and deliver to your doorstep.

With your pledges, I hope to reach the necessary minimum order quantity set by the manufacturer to produce the next run of Most Rad™ Minimalists.

Now add to all that the fact that the Minimalist barely breaks an ounce on the scale."GearMoose: "...at only 1.2 ounces, you might forget that you’re even carrying it, which is exactly what we’re looking for in a minimalist wallet."Crunchwear: "The first thing you’d notice about this wallet is the weight, in that it barely weighs anything."Envynde: "Undoubtedly there is nothing cooler than whipping out your wallet and flicking out your bank card in a moment’s notice to complete a purchase."Available StylesOriginal Minimalist (Black w/Embossed Logo)Executive Minimalist (Black or Brown w/No Logo) Indiegogo Minimalist (Black w/Blue Accents)Redrum Minimalist (Black/Red Accents)Kickstarter Minimalist (Black/Green Accents) For years, being known as "that guy" with the 5-pound wallet spewing out change, receipts, and gum wrappers every time it made an embarrassing appearance outside of my pants pocket, I realized it was time for a drastic change.I hit the web and began what turned out to be a months long search for the "perfect" wallet.  I knew I needed to downsize, but all of the popular minimalist wallets were simply TOO minimal with slots for only cards and folded bills.  Call me "old fashioned", but I'd like to have a little extra space to store some other necessities in my wallet without going overboard.  This is when I knew I had to design my own.At 3:00am one night back in February, I whipped out some duct tape and with this glorious design element I began to construct the first prototype.After field testing the duct tape prototype for a few weeks, it was time to manufacture a real product.  Since I personally don't have the necessary resources to produce such a product, I hit the web in search of the perfect manufacturer.  Finding a manufacturer that could produce this wallet at a high quality and also meet my demands for integrated RFID protection was no easy task.I mocked up the dimensions, showcased the features with a prototype, and then began emailing my inquiry to several manufacturers in hopes to find the perfect company to produce these wallets.  After discussing with dozens, I finally came in contact with an amazing large scale manufacturer that could fulfill all my requests. Using my Photoshop mock ups, they brought my vision to life and the first ever Most Rad™ Minimalist sample was delivered to my door.  When designing the Most Rad™ Minimalist wallet, I had four main priorities in mind.  I wanted to bring the customer comfort, speed, style, and security all at an affordable price.The Most Rad™ Minimalist offers three interior card slots, two interior pockets, an outside on-the-go slot for your favorite card and an elastic band to hold bills.ComfortWith a depth of just 6.4mm, the Most Rad™ Minimalist wallet slips in your back or front pockets with ease.  Sit in comfort, you'll forget you're even carrying a wallet.SpeedI've incorporated an on-the-go pocket on the back of the Most Rad™ Minimalist so you can utilize your favorite card without ever having to open your wallet.  In and out with just a slide!StyleThe Most Rad™ Minimalist retains classic and premium leather styling that most modern day minimalist wallets today simply lack.  Offering the quality and style of a designer brand wallet at a much more affordable price, the Most Rad™ Minimalist stands as the perfect alternative.SecurityWith the increasing threats of wireless identity theft, I wanted to make sure my personal information was secure.  After contacting dozens of manufacturers, I finally came across one that was able to incorporate an RFID protective coating within the lining of the Most Rad™ Minimalist ensuring your protection and security against RFID identity theft.The Most Rad™ Minimalist loaded with 12 cards.The Most Rad™ Minimalist offers several different storage options for your necessities. If the money band doesn't attract you, you can easily store your bills in one of the side pockets the Most Rad™ Minimalist has to offer.  A great alternative for our International pledgers.  (The bills fit all the way inside the pockets.)You may also find other uses for the card slots and pockets, as I have.  Keys, coins, cards, etc... all fit within the allotted slots. I know how important those Euro coins can be!and for the adventurers...The Most Rad™ Minimalist specifications are as follows...3 7/8 x 3 x .25 (inches) or 98.4 x 76.2 x 6.4 (mm)My iPhone 5 stacked on the Most Rad™ Minimalist compared to a traditional wallet.The Most Rad™ Minimalist only weighs 1.2oz!I've partnered up with an amazing manufacturing company to produce the Most Rad™ Minimalist in the highest quality.  They specialize in wallet production on a large scale basis and have perfectly transformed my vision into a real life product. The wallets are produced in house from start to finish at their facility.  The leather is layed out, measured, cut and then sewn precisely to specification.  From there they will be shipped to me to sort, package, and deliver to your doorstep.With your pledges, I hope to reach the necessary minimum order quantity set by the manufacturer to produce the next run of Most Rad™ Minimalists.

story:
Breast-feeding is best for your baby. When you need an alternative, the Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker delivers perfectly blended baby formula at the right temperature. It’s safe, easy to use, and, best of all, the entire process takes less than two minutes.

PRESS & ATTENTION

Techcrunch http://techcrunch.com/2013/10/06/meet-piena-a-hassle-free-baby-formula-maker-developed-by-two-ex-samsung-engineers/

CNET  http://news.cnet.com/8301-17938_105-57606893-1/piena-is-like-a-coffee-maker-for-baby-formula/

5 Minutes for Mom http://www.5minutesformom.com/83398/piena-tender-touch-takes-the-hassle-out-of-mixing-baby-formula/

Mom Trends http://www.momtrends.com/2013/10/feeding-essentials-for-baby/

The RedFerret  http://www.redferret.net/?p=39700

A List Mom http://www.alistmom.com/2013/09/26/stress-free-parenting/

Cinnamon Hollow http://thecinnamonhollow.com/2013/10/01/piena-tender-touch-baby-formula-maker/

The Desitny of My Life  http://www.thedestinyofmylife.com/2013/10/piena-baby-formula-maker.html

Georyl http://georyl.com/2013/10/piena-worlds-first-baby-formula-maker/

Kids e-Connection  http://www.kids-e-connection.com/2013/09/worlds-first-baby-formula-maker.html

Couple Dumb http://www.coupledumb.com/2013/09/30/baby-bottle-maker/11177

Misadventures Mom  http://misadvmom.com/2013/09/the-piena-tender-touch-baby-formula-maker/

Simple Wyrdings  http://simplewyrdings.com/2013/10/formula-maker-could-be-a-boon-to-moms/

Swanky Baby  http://swankybaby.net/2013/10/piena-baby-formula-maker.html

Tiger Startups  http://www.tigerstartups.com/blogs/949/former-samsung-engineers-invent-piena-a-hassle-free-baby-formula-maker


****** Help contribute to our campaign. No account registration needed! ******


ABOUT US

At Piena, we’re parents first. We understand the challenges that come with a new baby. Our goal is to make your life easier by creating innovative products that take some of the work out of raising a little one—and give you more time to focus on your baby and your family.

The Inspiration behind the Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker 
Our own experiences as parents inspired us to invent the Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker. When our son was a baby, there were times we needed to make him a bottle. The process—from boiling the water, measuring out the formula, and cooling the water to just the right temperature before adding the formula—took at least 10 minutes. There had to be a faster, more efficient way! We looked around for a baby formula maker. There were plenty of bottle warmers, but nothing that made mixing the formula for the bottle any easier. 

So we decided to create our own solution. We talked with moms in the neighborhood to find out what they wanted in a baby formula maker. The answers were always the same: fast, easy-to-use, sterile and safe. Engineers by training, we took what we learned and designed a baby formula maker that met everyone’s needs: the Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker.

We named our company “Piena,” an Italian word that means “overflow.” It represents the overflowing love parents have for their children. We are very proud of what we do. We want every family to enjoy their time together.

HOW TO USE

The Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker is quick and easy to assemble. Simply follow the step-by-step plans below. 

Set Up: Assemble powder container as shown in the picture below. Connect the power cord with wall outlet.



Step 1: Pour the entire can of baby powder into the detachable powder formula container. It holds up to 24oz. The unique and patented freshness seal guarantees the powder stays fresh and dry up to 4 weeks.

Step 2: Fill the water reservoir to the desired level (2oz/4oz/6oz/8oz), and close the lid.

Step 3: Push the start switch to “ON”. The water will come to a boil within 60 seconds. Then the water is cooled to near body temperature and automatically dispensed into the bottle.

Step 4: Turn the wheel to dispense just the right amount of baby formula powder into the bottle. 

2oz bottle – one wheel turn (90° turn to counter clockwise)
4oz bottle – two wheel turn (180° turn to counter clockwise)
6oz bottle – three wheel turn (270° turn to counter clockwise)
8oz bottle – four wheel turn (360° turn to counter clockwise)

Step 5: Remove the bottle from the Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker. Put on the nipple and the lid tightly. Shake the bottle and check the temperature of the formula by dabbing a drop of the liquid on your wrist. Now the bottle is ready for feeding your baby.

FEATURES

The Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker: 

  • Automatically boils, cools, and dispenses water at the safest temperature for your baby
  • Has a separate container to store and dispense formula powder
  • Does not require special bottles
  • Plus, you can easily adjust the height to fit all sizes of bottles

Key Features:  

Antimicrobial– The Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker is specially engineered to inhibit the growth of microorganisms with Microban® antimicrobial protection built-in inside. When microbes, such as bacteria, mold and mildew come in contact with the inner powder container surface and the water reservoir surface, antimicrobial protection penetrates the cell wall of the microbe and disrupts key cell functions so that the microbe cannot function, grow or reproduce. Plus any microorganisms in the water are destroyed during the boiling process.

BPA Free– The Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker is made of food grade, high-temperature resistant polypropylene (PP) material. It contains no harmful chemicals and is FDA approved. 

Boils (sterilizes) Water– The Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker boils water for sterilizing. 

Express Cool Function– Once the water reaches the boiling point, the Express Cool Function cools down the water quickly to the perfect temperature for your baby. 

Detachable Powder Can with Aluminum Finish– The detachable powder container can store up to 24 oz of powder baby formula. The aluminum container can is air and water tight, which prevents air and moisture from affecting the quality of the powder formula.

Dishwasher Safe– The powder container parts of the Piena Tender Touch are dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.

ETL Certified– The Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker is safety certified by Intertek, the leading global testing laboratory.

Microbiology Tested– An independent team of scientists tested the Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker to make sure no harmful microorganisms are present in the formula.

Patented & Patent Pending in the United States and worldwide– The Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker is protected by worldwide patents.

Easy to Use- There is no complicated process to follow. With a simple click of a button and turn of a wheel, you have a ready–to-use bottle of formula for your baby within two minutes. 

Saves Precious Time– Instead of spending 10 minutes or more to prepare your baby’s bottle, The Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker gives you a baby-ready bottle within two minutes, not 10. That means more time for you to cuddle with your precious baby while he/she enjoys perfectly blended formula, nestled in the safety of your arms. 

WHY PIENA

It’s 2:00a.m….

You hear your baby stirring. It’s time to eat. Making her a bottle—boiling the water, measuring the water, cooling the bottle by running cold tap water, measuring out the formula, then testing the mixture to make sure its not too hot—can take ten or more minutes. Your baby is hungry—and you are exhausted. You wish there was a quicker way. 

An Innovative Solution 

Piena Baby Tender Touch Formula Maker is an award-winning, innovative appliance specially designed to make parents lives easier and babies happier. With a quick turn of the wheel, the Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker dispenses a pre-measured amount of formula. Then it quickly heats the water to 212 degrees and cools it to the perfect temperature for your baby. The whole process takes just 2 minutes for a 4 oz standard bottle.

CONNECT WITH PIENA

Feel free to ask us any questions and share your Piena experience with us. We'll post news and updates too!

  • Facebook
  • Twitter

OUR STORY

Piena was founded in 2012 with the intention to create appliances that make taking care of babies easier. We wanted to create better, more efficient products for the baby care marketplace—and come up with entirely new products.

One of these new products is our baby formula maker. Before we started our design, we identified several features that we wanted to incorporate into the new product. Our plan was to create a simple yet elegant baby formula maker that was easy to use, fast, and efficient, as well as dishwasher safe.

In the beginning, we focused on finding an innovative solution for express cooling. we needed to find a technical solution that would cool down boiling water (212F) to near body temperature instantly and economically. Due to the lack of technology available, our R & D department had to start from ground zero to create the Express Cool Function. We also started working on an IC board that could safely control the boiling, cooling, and dispensing with efficient SMPS circuits, and began the hunt for the highest quality cooling components for use in the Express Cool Function.  

PCB thermal test results

The industry's most advanced IC board is custom-designed for use with the Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker. Our original baby formula maker prototype was created with the goal of demonstrating that it takes about 90 seconds to boil and then cool the water.

Although we were pleased with the initial result, the product wasn’t perfect. The first prototype was bulky and unattractive, and the control buttons were too complicated to use. So we created a new design with only one button for the whole process of boiling, express cooling, and dispensing water.

Product Design & 3D Rendering

After months of discussions and further refinement, we were able to condense the internal circuitry and functions resulting in a more compact version of the Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker. The Piena design team created a baby formula maker with a sophisticated, minimalist color profile and a sleek finish. 

In order to bring our development to reality, we needed to find a manufacturer willing to be contracted with us to produce the innovative product that we developed. After extensive research, many referrals, meetings, and negotiations we were able to find a manufacturer with a similar vision for baby appliances. 

In the last several weeks, we have continued to improve and refine the product by adding features such as the Microban – antimicrobial function.

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

It has now been a couple of years since we embarked on this journey, and we are finally satisfied with the product that we developed. The Piena Baby Formula Maker is a truly innovative contribution to simplify and improve the quality of family life. For this, we need your help. Your support will allow us to move into full production and manufacturing so we will be able to share this product with you and every other parent on the planet.

We are full of great ideas. We will also begin development of a new product. Your support will allow us to accelerate development of a new product. And again everyone will surprise and enjoy our next product as well.

PACKAGING

Packaging Design

With an effort to reduce complexity in Piena Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker, we’ve made the packaging simple and compact, to match the Piena goal to make parents’ lives easier. 

MANUFACTURING PLAN

Prior to Indiegogo launch ( - August 2013)

  • Market research for baby formula maker
  • Completed R&D and filed patents
  • Mold design 
  • Product testing & consumer testing 
  • Packaging design & marketing materials design
  • Website content and design

During Indiegogo (September 2013)

  • Production planning 
  • Raw materials, parts, and components procurement 
  • Obtain packaging materials 

After Indiegogo (October 2013 - December 2013)

  • Manufacturing of the Piena Maker 
  • Production inspection at China factory 
  • Product shipment to warehouse in Chicago
  • Delivery of Piena Maker to our backers (December 2013)

Factory in China

We are in the final stages of preparing for mass production. The contract manufacturer is one of the largest factories in Southern China so there would be no particular issues regarding production capability. It is possible that there might be unforeseen manufacturing delays, but we will make sure to solve any problems as soon as possible. We will communicate with you and keep you updated through our Facebook page and Twitter feed.

We plan to make the required quantity right after our successful Indiegogo campaign concludes. We will transport the product from China, by ship, to our logistic warehouse in Chicago. From there, we will ship out each product to our backers by courier. Each Piena T-shirt will be shipped from our headquarters in Los Angeles. You can email us at support@mypiena.com and we will answer and solve any issues.

FAQ

Q: Why boiled water?

  • A: Your baby’s immune system may take up to a year to fully develop.1
    The U.S. Department of Agriculture recommends boiling water used to prepare infant formula until your baby is three months old as
    a precaution against illness causing bacteria or if you are unsure about your water supply,2 for which the Pienan Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker gives you peace of mind.
    U.S. Food and Drug Administration recommends that in most situations, it is safe to mix formula using ordinary cold tap water that is brought to a boil, and bottled water should also be boiled before mixing with infant formula.3

    1 “Immune System Development,” Aliene Linwood RN, DPA, Thomson Gale, Gale, Detroit, Gale Encyclopedia of Children’s Health, 2006,
    2 “Infant Nutrition and Feeding: A Guide for Use in the WIC and CSF Programs,” Chapter 4, page 91, revised September 2008. http://www.nal.usda.gov/wicworks/Topics/Infant_Feeding_Guide.html
    3 “Guidance for Industry: Frequently Asked Questions about FDA’s Regulation of Infant Formula”, March 1, 2006

Q: How can I prepare formula feeding?

From Complete Feeding Guide US Department of Agriculture

Q: Why boiled water?

A: Your baby’s immune system may take up to a year to fully develop.1The U.S. Department of Agriculture recommends boiling water used to prepare infant formula until your baby is three months old asa precaution against illness causing bacteria or if you are unsure about your water supply,2 for which the Pienan Tender Touch Baby Formula Maker gives you peace of mind.U.S. Food and Drug Administration recommends that in most situations, it is safe to mix formula using ordinary cold tap water that is brought to a boil, and bottled water should also be boiled before mixing with infant formula.31 “Immune System Development,” Aliene Linwood RN, DPA, Thomson Gale, Gale, Detroit, Gale Encyclopedia of Children’s Health, 2006,2 “Infant Nutrition and Feeding: A Guide for Use in the WIC and CSF Programs,” Chapter 4, page 91, revised September 2008. http://www.nal.usda.gov/wicworks/Topics/Infant_Feeding_Guide.html3 “Guidance for Industry: Frequently Asked Questions about FDA’s Regulation of Infant Formula”, March 1, 2006


Q: How can I prepare formula feeding?



From Complete Feeding Guide US Department of Agriculture

story:
We founded PowerUp Women to utilized advanced technology in products that empower women to be proactive in their own personal safety.

We don’t focus on stats but we do want to affect them - they are staggering, every 2 minutes a women is sexually assaulted in the US – that is 1 in 6 women will experience an attempted attack in their lifetime.  

In more than 95% of all attacks on women there are three consistent factors:

  1. The women is alone.
  2. The women does not have the ability to defend herself.  
  3. The women is unable to summon help either directly or via phone.

Given these three realities, we realized that arming a women with a capability that is always on her, does not need to be retrieved from her purse or car, that can instantly make a difference, would change the game, change the stats. 

These products can help being a quick conclusion to an attack by giving the women an ability to fight back with a disabling stun to the attacker.  Stun and Run.

                  

Our functional products are shockingly good-looking and designed specifically for women to deliver a knock out electric shock at the direction of the wearer.  

Together, we can equip women today with simple products that are always accessible to help defeat, detour and thwart a personal attack.

Now, that's powerful stuff.

Our founders have worked together for decades - in technology, marketing, start ups and other companies from scratch, as well as, working with partners to launch many new brands and products. 

MEET BETH: Parent and successful small business owner, marketing genius having worked on some of the biggest brands in the US. Beth has been spent her entire career empowering people and her positive energy is highly infectious.

MEET LISA: Parent and seasoned business builder. Lisa has worked with industry leading sports, marketing, entertainment and technology companies throughout her career, loves smart stuff and is now ready to PowerUp!

Combined, they have more than four decades of business building experience. With experience in overseas production, celebrity and product placement, non-profit management, community event production, multi-city/national product roll out, online content management and business admin, this company will be well run.  

We put together a group of our colleagues who are engineers, designers and others who have helped develop these new technologies into these great products.

On a personal note, the founders have kids in college, and they wanted to send their young women to school as emPOWERed as possible.  

PowerUp will launch with two bracelet products and a totally stunning ring. The patent pending designs have been in development for 12 months, take a look. 

We think you will feel electrified with excitement.  We know that we are.

Our ATHLETIC style bracelet is minimal, easy to wear, lightweight, and simply designed for everyday use and night wear in all kinds of weather.  With a silicone gel rubberized band, it's one size fits all is easy to get on and off. 

The power is released from the two points that emerge on the silver face of the bracelet when it is armed.  For runners, walkers, dog walkers, staying at home, going out, going to the store, going on the road or going around the world.The key to our jewelry is the always lowered posts in the off position and not noticeable.  When you slide the lever to "On", the posts rise from the face of the jewelry, are armed and ready to deliver a powerful jolt. 

Our stylish metal BANGLE bracelet is about an inch wide and medium weight.  It is designed for work or a more dressed up occasion.  The bracelet features points on the top, which is where the shock is released and are coated on the inside so the wear can not receive a shock.  The bracelet features our SureFit design which makes sure the bangle stays correctly on your wrist, ready to be armed if needed. 



All products are lined with a protective layer  –  so wearer is safe from the shock. The shock is omitted from the posts on the top, and is only felt between the posts where contact is made - delivering a powerful jolt. 

One of the key issues in personal safety, is preparedness or the element of surprise.  Predators look for women on their phones, distracted, or in a hurry – so even if a women carries a safety device in her purse or car - she may have it with her the the moment it's needed. In addition, research shows that a high percentage of attacks take place within a home and involve known people - so our product, which is literally at the women’s fingertips – is ready, accessible and empowers the women to protect herself at any time and any place that it is needed.

We say our products are for STUN & RUN -  giving you the power to get out of the situation. 

These items are designed to be disguised as regular accessories, so it is up to the wearer to share with friends they are actually are powerful defense devises.  

Launch T-Shirts:  These t-shirts are available for indiegogo supporters only.  We will continue to develop cool messages to go on the shirts, so feel free to give us some of your bright ideas - we love them. Who Is this product good for?  For You.  For all women and the men who love them - think about our products for a college student, wife, mom, sister, aunt, cousin, grandma, room-mate, or groups of people - running team, co-workers on the late shift, team mates or sorority - and you of course.  The bracelets are lightweight and simple to manage, but you do need to be over 18 years old.

                    

Using breakthroughs in ultra-capacitors and micro transformers these state of the art stun jewelry pieces allow for freedom from fear - knowing you can, if needed, defend yourself.  Feel the power sista.  The 130,000 volts of power, launched from these babies will stun and incapacitate an attacker. 

It only takes minutes to charge and the charge lasts for days so if the light on the bracelet is green you are good to go. If you need to use the stun feature you flip the switch on the side on the bracelet and the light turns red to let you know you are now armed and ready to stun.  At the same time, two posts emerge from the top, which is where the shocks are applied from (see product image for post locations). Whatever those two posts touch, feels the powers - it is instantly live by flipping the switch. 

These state of the art technologies, including ultra-conductors for immediate charge distribution and materials that protect the wearer but shock the aggressor - our patient pending products - are a must have.  These advances in technology have allowed us to create these small but powerful resources for women. 

You May Have Questions, And We Have Answers

How old do you have to be to buy a StunBracelet?  You must be 18 years old or older to purchase our products.

The Is it legal in all states? No, We can not sell or ship to the following states and a couple cities: HI, IL, MA, MD, MI, NJ, NY, RI, & WI and Denson/Crawford County, IA, District of Columbia & Philadelphia.

Can I purchase these from outside the US? Sorry no, unfortunately our stun product is only able to ship in the US.  

How does it charge? The jewelry plugs into a standard wall charger and are fully changed in a few minutes. Product comes with the charging cord.  

How can it change so fast?  The ultra-capacitor.  They absorb energy like a big sponge very quickly. It is so cool.

What keeps it charged? The ultra-capacitor stores energy in place of a traditional battery.

How do I know it is charged?  A small green light on the side of the item lets you know it is fully changed for (at least) the next 24 hours. 

How do I activate the Stun Capability & Is there a safety switch? Yes, there is an arming switch on the side of the jewelry, which must be switched manually to the on position.  This raises two posts on the front/top of the jewelry - before any shock could be transmitted.  It then requires you to press the surface into someone for the shock to discharge.  The product is made for what we call STUN and RUN. Designed so you can quickly stun an attacker - be released - so you can exit to safety. 

How do I know the shock charge is live?  A red dot illuminates on the side of closest to you - unnoticeable to the casual observer.  

Is it reusable?  Yes, the jewelry can be charged and discharged many times over its three year life.  

How many discharges do I get per charge?  One any given occasion, it will be a single discharge - per charge - each discharge is 130,000 volts.

What keeps me from being shocked?  The items are insulated closest to the wears skin, but the shock is released from the top of the items - not the bottom.  It is not impossible that you could be shocked if you touched the top of the jewelry, but it would be hard to do - like all safety devises, be careful.

What makes the shock go off?  The wearer forcefully presses the jewelry face/top into someone making content with the two posts  - these posts (1+ and 1- post) are what transmit the shock from the jewelry to the attacker.  Each of the images above, show these posts raised. 

Can the shock go thru clothing?  Yes, the shock goes thru most clothing, fabric shirt and pants - the shock will not go thru leather or bulky layered clothing - but in those instances, the armed jewelry should aimed for exposed skin. 

How is this different than a taser?  A taser is a gun like devise that shoots wires into the attacker - and sends voltage thru the wires to the attackers.

How much will these retail for? We anticipate the retail prices for the athletic style bracelets for $99.00, the bangle bracelets for $149.00 and the rings for $179.00.

What are the styles? We offer wristbands (athletic wear) in black in high quality poly urethane (rubber) like what you would see on a Nike bracelet. And a bangle style that is a metal bracelet with gold color finish - more formal. There is one ring style, it is chunky and silver. 

What keeps the Bangle right side up?  We have designed the bracelet so that it will not actually rotate away from the right side up orientation that way it stays in the right place for when you need it most.  

How about weather and water?  The jewelry can withstand weather, but should not be submerged in water.  In addition, the athletic bracelets can withstand any sweat issues as well. 

Please join us, your support is vital to our success.  Together, we can PowerUp Women all around the US and maybe even around the world.  We can create shockingly cool accessories to help women better protect themselves.  

Here is where we are at:

  1. Feature and functional design - DONE
  2. Prototyping, components, patent applications - DONE 
  3. Finalize the manufacturing process Q1
  4. Manufacturing implementation Q2
  5. Manufacturing roll out (indiegogo Shipments!) Q3
  6. Retail (Web sales) products rollout Q4 of 2014

Bracelets Will Be Available for Supporters: Athletic Bracelet - September 12, 2014, Bangle Bracelet is October 17, 2014 and the Rings will be available November 21, 2014 and retail products will be available for sale online during back to school in 2014. 

Together we believe that we can change the stats, we can empower sisters, daughters, moms, aunts, friends and even grand daughters - empower women with tools to protect themselves when ever and where ever thy might need it.

This is our first crowdfunding effort, but not our first rodeo.  We have built companies from idea to market - technology company and retail products - we want to create a movement to empower women when they need it most.  We promise if you support this here, you will not only feel the POWER - but there will be more empowerment products out of us and you will be the first to hear about them.  

And just as importantly, you will feel great pride, when you hear in the news that a women stopped an attack with ours, yes ours (we hope you are in that group too) - using her power, using this power, to change the stats.

Please join us.  

  • We are on an important mission, and we hope that you can join us.  Pick a perk now, or if you can, please help us spread the word about PowerUp.

++ PLEASE HELP US SPREAD THE WORD AND YOU GET REWARDS ++

We have created a referral program so you get rewards for helping us spread the word!  For every 10 backers that you refer that back us through the purchase of a bracelet or ring you will receive a free wristband to keep for yourself or gift to a loved one.

Tracking referrals is a built in capability here at Indiegogo and is easy to use. All you have to do is be signed into your Indiegogo account and use the Share buttons up at the top of our campaign (right under the video) we keep track of the rest.

Tip!You don't have to be a backer to earn rewards! Just be sure to be logged in when you share our campaign, using the share buttons, of course.

THANK YOU

Thank you for your time reviewing our project - we really appreciate it.  We hope you feel empowered yourself to have a fantastic day.  Again from Beth, Lisa and the many that you will empower... 

A special thanks to Gillicuddy for the music in our project video.  Check him out at http://gillicuddy.bandcamp.com. AMAZING.

story:
WAFFLES ARE SHIPPED ALL OVER THE WORLD! the shipping costs are included in the perks. So don't hesitate and be the first one to try them!

Delicious WAFFLES with sweet syrup!

Jens & Waffle is a creative and a delicious waffle filled with sweet syrup. The waffles are also known as "Stroopwafel". Everyone that tries a Jens & Waffle just once will fall in love with this delicious freshly baked waffle.

What Jens & Waffle makes different is that the waffles only consists natural ingredients and no preservatives. Therefore, they taste like they just come out of the oven!!!

If you pledge now 20 dollars or more you will get one or more packages of the Waffles delivered at your home (see the picture of the package). Shipping is FREE and can be done all over the world.

Why pledge for Jens & Waffle? This has been my dream to be able to deliver everyone this delicious waffle! It is my own created project and I will do everything I can to succeed in serving everyone those delicious waffles! With my International Business University background I can make this project happen with just a little bit of help from you!

It would be so amazing to reach my goal!!! When I will reach my goal a webshop will be opened and will be available for everyone and the first shipment will be send to America at coffee restaurants. I already have my customers (coffee restaurants), but I just need a little bit of financial support! 

If I don't reach my goal, everyone that pledged will of course still receive their waffles! And of course I will not quit, but I will work even harder to make my dream come true and the dream of many amazing potential customers!!!

Will you be a Jens & Waffle customer?

Every support is very much appreciated!!!

The video above explains how my idea was created! curious? just click and enjoy the video!!


Check out this amazing T-shirt (men/women different sizes)! I'm wafflelicious! you will get one + 3 packs of delicious waffles when you pledge 75 dollars!!! PERFECT COMBINATION yeahhh!


How is it made?

Jens & Waffle is made with love and lots of sweetness in a little bakery. The bakery only uses natural ingredients and no preservatives, which leads to a high taste sensation. It uses a family recipe that has been established many years ago. However, the waffles cannot be kept secret anymore!


Why do we need money?

Jens & Waffle need some monetary help to be able to ship the first load of Waffles to the U.S.A. And last but not least the money will be used to set up an online webshop to serve the world with the sweetness of Jens & Waffle.

With your support we can make this happen and make the American dream come true! Everyone deserves some delicious waffles stuffed with sweet syrup.

How can you help Jens & Waffle more?

It would also be really great if you can spread the word and like our facebook page: www.facebook.com/jensandwaffle 

Also visit our official website: www.jensandwaffle.com 


We appreciate your help! Thank you to all the supporters!!!

With your support we can make this happen and make the American dream come true! Everyone deserves some delicious waffles stuffed with sweet syrup.
How can you help Jens & Waffle more?
It would also be really great if you can spread the word and like our facebook page: www.facebook.com/jensandwaffle 
Also visit our official website: www.jensandwaffle.com 
We appreciate your help! Thank you to all the supporters!!!

story:
(click here to see the video with german subtitles on youtube.com)

 

www.nonessentials.org

In the modern consumer society goods are cranked out, independent of the actual demand. This method of production leads us to a wasteful society.

The manufacture of products on demand – made especially for the needs of every single person – has scarcity value.

 

 

Products on demand

nonessentials are earth-aware accessories which were born to create economic and sustainable product design, offering you objects that do not yet exist.

The main idea behind nonessentials is that all objects will be recently made to order.

The objects are made from rich birch plywood which is cut by a laser cutting machine and can be individualized by an engraving of the customer’s choice or colored in one of five different color variations.

 

About nonessentials:

nonessentials was called into existence in the context of my bachelor thesis in november 2012.

By then I never expected to have any response at all. Two weeks later - after nonessentials has been featured on a few design websites and in some magazines - I was overwhelmed by the huge amount of requests.

So nonessentials had to grow and people, who believe in the idea, came on board as volunteers’ temporarily.

But now we are a team, and to ensure that this team persists and hopefully grows we need some money. 

 

The future of nonessentials

To keep this project running at all, we need a realistic financial base.

As mentioned above the nonessentials team has to be paid for all its voluntary work, the nonessentials website has to be reprogrammed; we need to have a budget to invest in promotional issues and last but not least we have to improve the scalability of our company by creating an own 'production on demand' factory, in order to avoid mass-producing via off-shore labor.

 

Recently we stumbled across a huge opportunity and took it.

We rented a place downtown Bremen to become an open factory and show-room. Our thanks go to Z.Z.Z. Bremen who helped us finding this spot.

 

Currently we are remodeling and equipping the studio.

Besides of all the work involved, we also had to lean a lot of money from friends & family. This makes your help even more essential.

 

What nonessentials needs to survive:

  • Pay back the money, friends and family borrowed us for the startup with the studio (basic equipment like paint for walls & floor, euro-pallets for furniture, lighting …): 1.850 €

  • Hire a programmer to restructure the website (individualization preview, library of motives, account managing, and much more): 1.400 € 

  • Buy and build an open source laser cutting machine: 3100 €

  • Pay future renovation & equipment of the studio (build laser-room, customer-lounge, freezer, coffee-maker, storage shelves …): 2800 €

  • The indiegogo fees of approx. 700 €

When we extend the basic needs of 9850 € we can finally give back something to all the people who volunteered and help nonessentials to exist. 

Furthermore we will be able to buy more open source cnc machines (like a 3d printer and a cnc milling machine) and extend our open on-demand factory.

  

And our vision(s)

We are planning to use new materials and maybe move on to bigger objects like furniture or objects that include more advanced equipment, exploring other cnc techniques…

 

We got a constantly growing list of nonessential product ideas (48 at the moment) which- with your help- could be available soon.

Furthermore we are open-minded to all ideas and product proposals, as we want to work for and with our customers and not for our wallet.

 

You can help us to increase the team of “products on demand” lovers and enable us to spread nonessentials all over the world.

Please also spread the word! Even if you cannot afford to contribute money at this time you can take part and help by spreading the word about our project!

Thank you !

story:
The first product being introduced by Bigo brand is Bigo Bag Five. The Five, as its name implies, has 5 separate functions that provide all-round convenience and protection any time you need it.

The bag can easily be converted to a rain poncho, a baby sling, or a picnic blanket. You can even increase the carrying capacity of the bag by zipping two or more bags together. 

There is really no limit to how many bags you can zip together.

The Bigo brand aims to create products which are practical solutions to make your life easier. Every product we launch is created with the idea of multifunctionality in mind – something you'll have with you when you need it. Bigo is working on extending its portfolio with several practical and stylish accessories and products.

A side strap secures the bag safely and more comfortably on your back while riding a bicycle or doing any other outdoor activity.

Bigo is a perfect accessory with any kind of wear.

The Bigo Bag is designed in such a way as to distribute the weight of the bag over a larger surface area – over the whole shoulder and back – making it easy to wear.

A great advantage of the Bigo Bag Five is that when empty it is very compact, weighing a mere 830 grams.

Additionally, you can fold the whole bag back and pack it into its small internal pocket, enabling you to wear it as a bumbag. 


The True Story of Bigo Bag Five

George and Christian are graphic designers from Budapest and have worked in the ad industry for more than a decade.They wanted to explore their creativity and develop their own innovative product. As they have some experience working with textiles, they focused on fashion and clothing. While working on the prototype of something completely different it turned out that they had invented a bag unlike any other.


As they commute by bike in the city, they started to think about what other functions would be practical for urban bikers. The ideas came thick and fast.


The rain poncho and the picnic blanket were obvious. The shape of the bag reminded the guys of a baby sling, so just a few minor changes were needed to include this function.

They sketched out their vision for the bag, which would be comfortable and sit on your back naturally.

After they had the idea on paper, they made their first prototype followed by a whole year of product development. Through this process they wanted to try – just for fun –what might happen if they zipped two bags together.
And it worked! The fifth function was born.

Thanks to their ad agency experience, they are conscious of building an attractive and pure brand image. So, they've got the product, they've got the brand, now they want to take it to the world and build up a real company. They met Julius and Daniel; two guys who run an ad agency in Budapest and have considerable expereince in marketing and management. The newcomers fell in love with Bigo from the first moment, so they quickly got on board. After an additional half a year, they fine tuned all the details, and now they feel ready to present it people who are keen on trying great new things. So try our product. Help us to bring our dream come true, and have a lot of fun together with your friends and your Bigo.


# 1: 50 litre Backpack  

The size of the Bigo Bag Five varies depending on the contents of the bag.

Bigo Bags have a capacity of 50 litres. Another great advantage of the Bigo Bag Five is that in a single swing motion the contents of the bag are easily accessable.

The side strap gives you more freedom and security when you're on the go.

Swing the bag to your front so as not to disturb others and to keep your valuables safe when taking public transport.

There's a handy pouch on the shoulder strap where you can hold your phone, kleenex, sunglasses or any other pocket-sized item.

    


#2: Rain Poncho

With just a few adjustments the Bigo Bag Five becomes a rain poncho, short or long, just when you need it. Just the right protection whether you find yourself in a drizzle or a downpour. It's also good for light snow.


Water-resistant material


     


#3: Baby Sling

In one quick adjustment Bigo Bag Five becomes a safe and comfortable sling that both new mothers and fathers can use. Parents can hold their children close while at the same have their hands free for whatever they need to do. Mom, Dad and baby are all happy campers!

     


#4: Picnic Blanket

As a picnic blanket, the Bigo Bag Five is perfect in the park or anywhere outdoors; just pull it out, throw it down, kick back and read or chat with friends. And don't worry about wet grass – the Five is water-resistant.

     


#5: Expandable

You can zip a few Bigo Bag Fives together to make a much bigger bag; perfect for when you have too much to handle.





     


The Bigo Bag Five comes in twelve assorted colors made of water-resistant material and all the labels glow in the dark. That’s cool, isn’t it.


Limited edition of 1oo Bigo Bag Fives with polka dot or bikey pattern and...

...serial number on its label.



All the tags on a Bigo Bag Five are reflective.


Order your Bigo Bag Five with this small bag accessory. In case you get caught in the rain – just stuff everything into this little, handy bag. Or use it independently for when you have just a few small belongings to take.
An Angel Sack comes with every Bigo Bag Five in this campaign!

Reflective straps and accessories for added safety.

Every Bigo has a whistle on its side strap – useful in many situations!

Bigo Bag Five is a comfortable, practical solution for everyday situations that pop up in life. The Five is the first product we've created, but we have a lot more ideas for multifunctional products. With your support, we can create the Bigo brand which will provide practical, multifunctional solutions for everyday situations.

Now that we've made the first prototypes, we are looking for support to produce the bags in larger quantities at a higher level of production. So we come to you, Indiegogo users, and ask you to help us make your life easier.

Thanks in advance! 


We're asking for your support to help us launch Bigo into the world market, and create great stylish products for you. Here's how you can do it. Thanks in advance!

Risks & Challenges

The hard yards with suppliers and the fine tuning process has already been completed. Now we just need the necessary funding to get this project off the ground. From our experience in working with complex projects, we believe in cooperation and teamwork. From the initial stages of this project we have continually consulted with experts in various fields. We have also met other project creators to learn more about how to best deliver to this incredible community.

Having run several businesses successfully, we know that meeting deadlines is a crucial aspect of customer satisfaction. We have already contracted suppliers and partners for the manufacturing and delivery processes, and have carefully estimated delivery deadlines. The hard work and effort gone into this project thus far demonstrates our drive and capacity to deliver, not only on your expectations, but to exceed them. 

We know that one product is hardly enough to keep a brand alive. We have several ideas for products which will extend the Bigo brand portfolio. Some of these are alredy at the prototype creation stage.


From left to right:


Gyula Mihály

Julius is a co-founder of most! ad agency, based in Budapest. He has worked together with George and Christian on several projects. When they showed him their new invention, Gyula instantly became a Bigo fan. Gyula is responsible for managing Bigo Brand Ltd, and the whole process from the moment you order, till you get your Bigo.

Krisztián Rapali

Christian is one of the creators, who not only added great insight into the design, but was instrumental in the testing of the bag as well. He designed the logo and packaging.

György Halász

George is the other creator behind the Bigo Bag Five. He designed the first prototype and created the website.

Dániel Kocsis

Daniel is the other co-founder of most! ad agency. He is also a big fan of Bigo, and the energy it transmits. He is responsible for marketing, PR, and all the appearances of the Bigo brand.


We believe we have a strong team for the launch of our brand: two creative guys with a feel for management working on their own invention, and two managers with considerable experience in branding and communication.


Thanks!

We thank everyone who has helped us design and make the Bigo Bag Five. With your continued support we are going to make it a success! 

If you like it, please share it wtih your friends.

story:
Slïck Modern stands for three things: Simple. Modern. Slick.

Ever since I was little, I never liked how uncomfortable belts were, especially when they would cut into my stomach when I sat down. To solve this problem I ended up wearing a shoelace, which only temporarily worked throughout high school. But now, it’s time for a change. Since there was no belt on the market that solves all the problems that a bulky buckle poses, I decided to make one. Each new prototype is carefully crafted by hand, taking about 4 hours to make. I manually saw the metal clip and sew the leather, resulting in visual perfection.



SLÏCK Belts uses a patent-pending small clip to connect the two ends of the belt, with lots of room to adjust in a seemingly bulkless fit. Without the use of any buckle, tie or velcro, SLÏCK belts offers an extremely modern and comfortable belt. Being universally fit for a suit or just a classy night out on the town, SLÏCK Belts will have your pants held up in style.

Additional Benefits 

Being a belt that fits both men and women, it solves another issue that we just recently came across.

 If and women or men wear tight shirts, wearing a belt is quite a hassle, with an awkward bulge at the top of your waist. Fortunately with SLÏCK Belts there is no awkward bulge in the front having a streamline look.



This project doesn’t just stop at one SLÏCK Belt.  When we get the word out, we will start coming out with new colors, designs, and shapes to be able to appeal to everyone. I have had this vision for over 2 years now and I can’t wait for it to come to life!

SLÏCK was originally going to sell for $60; so by buying it, you save over 20%! The reason why we need to raise at least $2,000 is for the first line of production. After discussing production with manufacturers and machine shops, at least 50 belts need to be produced in order to bring the price down.



Shipping date: Estimated between  2-15-15 / 3-15-15
WE DO SHIP INTERNATIONALLY JUST ADD $10 TO THE AMOUNT!
Once the campaign is funded we will send out emails to all of our contributors and ask for waist sizes.

story:
We are happy to introduce the- K-BaG  


K-Bag has an aluminum structure, providing a huge durability . The bag itself is made out of crashworthiness plastic, with a zipper in order to open or close it.

           

           Quality Material    Careful Inspection 

                       Perfect Workmanship


How it started the K BaG
Having to travel a lot, I've questioned myself several times wether or not there was something that could make all of my journeys easier. And then I had this idea of, without occupying a ton of space in my bag, incorporating a scooter in it, providing an alternative and eco friendly means of transport.

                 The  K-BaG  registeredpatent - in the approval process

There's already a prototype . Once we raise enough funds to start manufacturing the bag, we'll adapt it to multiple situations, such as school backpacks, suitcases, purses and, probably most importantly, briefcases.

And all the people who help us must and I hope will make suggestions of what we can do better.

       The K-BaG is a community project that for please involve.




Wouldn't it be amazing if you could go to school or work without having to worry about your back pain, or even the struggle of finding a spot to put your scooter on? 

I can do this BUT just with your help, I thank you very much for your time and throw forget to throw a coin in the bucket.

With respect Luis Laranjeira.

story:
WE ARE SupaDopeFresh Clothing Company

A lifestyle brand deeply rooted in the hiphop culture that started by printing shirts on homemade screens in our kitchen, heat setting tshirts in the oven & giving them away at local Atlanta BBoy Events.

SUPA == Owner- Jerald Robinson aka "Bolo Fresche" is a (High School Teacher, BBoy, DJ, MC, Graffiti Artist, & Fine Artist)

DOPE == Street Savvy Coolness with HipHop Flavor.

FRESH == 24/7 dressed to impressed be it slacks, bowties or anything that separates you from the average.

1 We need your donations to be able to sponsor more causes, individuals and nonprofit organizations. We want to travel to more schools and events with Free Givaways & merchandise for kids.

2 We need your donations because desire better equipment & supplies, so that we can produce better quality product as we currently produce 100's of items per month from our home-based workshop.

*CLICK HERE TO MAKE A CONTRIBUTION!*

Buy supporting our campaign you will:

  • Become an ambassador for the SupaDopeFresh Brand
  • Get #DopeFreeKidz Tees and Glow-In-The-Dark  Wristbands
  • Recieve FREE Original SDF Tees and Hoodies
  • Be among the first to wear our NEW Sclusive Tees
  • Have the ability to stock your shelves with SupaDopeFresh Merch
  • Have your name or company name listed on our website (Jan1-Jun31, 2014)

*CLICK HERE TO MAKE A CONTRIBUTION!*

SupaDopeFresh STANDARD & SCLUSIVE Tee Designs

                                                   #ReturnOfTheDopeness

If you simply can't donate, it doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!
  • Share the links on FaceBook, Twitter, Instagram and whatever other social media you have!
  • Buy with a group of friends to get cheaper cost on bulk orders!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Call, text and email friends and family! Tell someone you don't even like!!

You or your cause could be next on our sponsor list, so help us change the world one tshirt at a time. We started from the bottom & now we're here.  And that’s all there is to it.

BOOOOM!!!    #ReturnOfTheDopeness


*CLICK HERE TO MAKE A CONTRIBUTION!*

  • How do I pledge?
    • Visit https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/supadopefresh-clothing-co-return-of-the-dopeness/contributions/new
    • Enter your pledge amount
    • Select your Perk/Gift
    • Submit the Transaction

  • How do I choose my size, cut and color?
    That’s the next step! When the campaign ends, we’ll send you a survey to complete, where you can let us know what size, cut and color you would like.
  • What if I order the wrong size?
    DON'T order the wrong size. Please doublecheck before ordering. These are print to order items so we won't have extra in stock for exchanges.
  • Is there any additional cost for international shipping?
    Please note: For all reward options, shipping is $3 flat rate for US addresses. Please add $10 to your total pledge for international orders. We will ask for your color preference and shipping address at the end of the campaign!
  • Where does the name SupaDopeFresh  est. 1977 come from?
    Bolo Fresche believes in looking fresh and feeling fresh at ALL times. Started at bboy jams when HBO Crew would come in & be the Freshest Crew in the Building. When we dressed SupaDopeFresh, we felt that we could not be topped. So the slogan “Can’t Git NO Fresher!” comes from that idea. Bolo Fresche born in 1977 believes the company start date shouldn’t be the first sale, but rather when he was born. Because he believes he was “Born to be Fresh”.
  • What happens if my address will change?
    Not a problem at all!  We will confirm your address with you right before we ship out so don't worry if you move over the next few weeks.
  • When is my credit card charged?
    When this project is completed, your credit card will be charged. The end date of the project is Dec25.
  • What if I want to change my pledge?
    You can change or cancel your pledge anytime before Wednesday December 25.
  • If this project is funded, how do I get my reward?
    When your reward is ready, Bolo Fresche will send you a survey to request info needed to deliver your reward (mailing address, T-shirt size, etc).

  • When will I get my gift?
    We need 30 days for the campaign, 2 weeks for us to get items printed and back to us and 2weeks for items to be shipped to you. Thank you for your patience. You can't rush perfection.

*CLICK HERE TO MAKE A CONTRIBUTION!*

    • Get Rooted /Nashville, TN(Rocketown Skate Park)
    • Good Foot  Jam/Augusta, GA
    • Dancer's Day Out/Atlanta, GA(Centennial Olympic Park)
    • Camp Rockwell/Kennesaw, GA(Honey Rockwell's Studio)
    • Atlanta HipHop Day/Atlanta, GA(Woodruff Park)
    • Southeast BBoy Championships(SEBC)/Asheville, NC(Asheville Masonic Lodge)
    • Smoked Out Dance Event/Atlanta, GA
    • Loose Screwz BBoy Jam/Atlanta, GA (Yearly in Atlanta, GA)

WE ARE SupaDopeFresh Clothing Company

A lifestyle brand deeply rooted in the hiphop culture that started by printing shirts on homemade screens in our kitchen, heat setting tshirts in the oven & giving them away at local Atlanta BBoy Events.
SUPA == Owner- Jerald Robinson aka "Bolo Fresche" is a (High School Teacher, BBoy,   DJ,  MC, Graffiti Artist, & Fine Artist)
DOPE == Street Savvy Coolness with HipHop Flavor.
